You want to talk hey? (Disgusted)Drop your shields and let's really get close and personal.
Oh hi! It's always a pleasure to see you out here, pilot.
Hey, how are you? It's been a while!
May the stars light your way, pilot. Goodbye.
If you've gotta take a leak, at least put your ship on autopilot.
I don't know whether to scream at you or kiss you! Move your ship!
You know, my mom used to fly like you. She didn't get very far.
(sarcastic)Could you go any faster? No, I don't think you could!
Oh no... this isn't the sector I had locked in. Anyone? I need a sector check!
Request current data on all trade material. Ship ID has been transmitted.
I don't have much in this world, but I know what's mine! Not this time, chelt-sucker!
You know, there's a lot I would do for a few credits... try me and find out!
How the hell am I supposed to fly with only one directional thruster?!
Not sure what you've been doing, but your hull looks fried. If I were you, I'd dock.
(very drunk)Ohhh, I've done it again. (sarcasm)I hope your friends are enjoying my unique... (hic)piloting skills.

page.title: Argon Border Patrol
page.t: Attention, pilot. Leave this sector immediately. Your current status prohibits you from entering all primary Argon sectors. Failure to leave will result in lethal force being directed against you. You have one mizura to comply.
You have failed to comply with our order to leave all Argon prime sectors. Attack vector authorised. Prepare to be boarded.

page.title: Boron Variation 6
page.t: You are firing at me - stop!
We are not afraid of giving fight!
Despite my warning you force me to call in a support ship!
We live for peace - someone please help me!
I'm running. Somebody please help me!
This is Boron captain - hopefully this was an accident.
Do you know how close to dying you are?
For the love of the Queen!
I do not want to talk to you!
Do not ask me such questions!
Please repeat the question - I cannot understand, we are at peace!
Do not ask such a question of me!
I will remember you - I'm leaving my ship, I wish to stay living!
I will remember you - I am dropping freight!
This captain does not want to talk with you!
A Boron captain's time is valuable!
You risk angering me. Do not offend me again!
Our Boron knowledge says that it is behind
Our Boron knowledge says that you are there.
We don't know of where you seek!
Boron captain is pleased to assist - You need to go to
The Boron are glad we could help you! Goodbye.
credits for every gate we go through.
This is the captain, We are fully occupied.
This is pointless talk - you cannot afford our services!
Captain speaking - We will follow you and charge for every gate we cross!
Captain speaking. I am very much afraid we have no space here. May I suggest we move somewhere else.
Captain speaking. Everything is fine. We will commence unloading freight now.
It has been a pleasure working for you.
Pilot - While we mean you no harm, Boron police demand you stop immediately! -We have found illegal goods aboard your ship. Drop them or we will fire!
Pilot - This is a member of the Boron Police - You are suspected of smuggling. Drop your freight immediately or we will be forced to fire!
We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thank you for your cooperation.
I am in a rush. I need to get to station quickly!
This Boron demands that you let them out at the next station!
We don't like killing - so you are advised to give up freight!
Your freight is better than your death - your surrender spares us both!
You have more freight - I know you do!
We would like to help but can't!
We don't like fight - but pirates must stick together!
(Hired)We have a deal. We'll follow you to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move the station to that location.
(new location confirmed)Affirmative. Moving station to requested location.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the job, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station to its new location.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
Hey, you'll really look cool as a bit of space debris!
I got a missile on my tail!
I've got a target lock on me!
By the Queen, the Boron gracefully request your assistance with a task of the highest order.
Our Queen thanks you. May your journey be graced by her light. Compensation for your efforts will soon be with you.
By the Queen, you are utterly useless! Our time has been wasted by your failure!
By the Queen! The Boron offer thanks for your assistance!
The Boron shall gracefully assist you, pilot.
Pilot, we gracefully ask you to journey elsewhere. The Boron sense much danger ahead.
Queen save us! Enemy ships incoming!
Our presence has been detected. Danger we must face, or hide our ships!
Grace of flight you seem to lack! Check your course!
Boron dislike this agitation! Please cease!
The Queen has shown us a clear path. Our journey will pass in safety.
Boron gracefully request assistance. Ship taking fire. Our enemies are upon us.
Menelaus save us! Our ship cannot last for much longer. Help us please!
By the Queen! Your intrusion is unwelcome!
We fare well, pilot. By the Queen, our journey shall be graced with peace.
Greetings pilot. The pleasure is ours.
Go with grace, for your journey may not always hold peace.
By the Queen! Take heart at this precious sight!
We gracefully ask you to move your ship. It hinders our path!
For the Queen! This journey grows tiresome! Raise your speed, please!
Boron fear much danger in this flight. Your speed concerns us!
The light of the Queen has deserted us. We are lost, truly lost.
Boron request latest price lists, please transmit. Menelaus awaits.
By the Queen, this is now of Boron ownership! Your claim no longer stands.
Our bodies are weak from lack of food. Assist us with credits or we will surely perish before we reach our destination!
By the Queen! We have sustained damage! Most costly will this be!
Your ship appears to be held together with spacefly droppings. Pitiful.
(hyperactive yet brain-dead, singing drunkenly)For the Queeeeen do we fly, so very highhh! (pause, change of tone as if distracted)Mmmmn, bofu!

page.title: Boron Variation 7
page.t: You have pushed my patience too far, help is on its way!
Now a Boron will show you how to fight!
Praise Queen Atreus - Boron transporter needs help!
For the love of the Queen!
No more please. I want peace!
No freight is worth the loss of life!
This Boron captain hopes you did not mean to do that!
I demand you stop firing instantly.
I apologise, but I am now forced to blow you to space debris!
I have the pleasure of asking how we can help?
I'm sorry but I do not have time to help you find the way.
The information you ask is Kingdom classified!
I'm sorry, this Boron is not responsible for that.
Please could you repeat - I cannot understand, we are at peace!
I will does not yield my freight that easily! This is illegal!
The Boron do not want violence - I am leaving my ship!
Please stop this violence - I am dropping my freight!
This Boron Captain is willing to listen to your incoming communication. What do you require?
I'm sorry I'm not going to give you that!
This Boron is busy at the moment.
You are enemy of the Boron and the captain does not communicate with such!
The Boron do not appreciate your actions. Now go before we take offence!
I am most sorry, but you are already there.
I'm sorry I can't help you with that, please accept my apologies.
The Boron race welcomes contact with such as you - The area you seek is behind...
The Boron are very glad to be of help! Good bye.
...credits for every gate we go through.
This is the captain, we are fully occupied.
This is not talk of worth - you cannot afford our services!
Captain speaking - we happily accept and will follow you, though we must charge for each gate we cross.
Captain speaking. I am very much afraid we have no space here. May I suggest we move somewhere else.
Captain speaking. Everything is fine. We will commence unloading the freight now.
It has been a pleasure working for you.
Boron Kingdom Police to pilot - we suspect you are carrying illegal goods - stop and drop your illegal freight or we will fire!
Pilot - when the Boron Police say drop illegal freight we meant NOW!
We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thank you for your cooperation.
I am in rush, please get me to the station at your fastest convenience!
Please let me out at the next station, my patience is exhausted!
We do not like killing - so you are advised to give up your freight!
It is better to give than to die!
You have more freight - I can detect it!
We would like to help but can't!
(Hired)We gratefully conclude deal. We will follow you to the station you wish moved.
(Not enough space for station)My apologies but we cannot move the station to there.
(new location confirmed)Certainly. We are moving the station to requested location.
(Location has become invalid)Apologies, we cannot complete our task, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station to its new location.
(Negative/can't execute command)I'm sorry can't do that.
(Negative/can't execute command)This is an impossibility, sir.
(Returning home)I am returning to home base.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
(Under attack)I am the victim of aggression!
Oh, dear, the reactor is about to blow!
There is a missile targeting me!
Hello, I have a job for you.
Thank you. You saved my life.
Pilot, we would be eternally grateful for your help. We have work in need of completion.
Your payment is being transferred now. The Boron thank you for your assistance.
You do us great injustice by failing to abide by our agreement. Failure was not an option.
We thank you for all you have done. You will always be welcome in the Boron kingdom.
We shall help you. By the Queen's light we are on our way.
There is much we can offer you pilot, but by the Queen, safety is not one of them.
Our enemies approach! We must take our leave now!
May the Queen blind those who seek to scan our ship. Sector patrols are near.
For the Queen, do us no harm!
By the Queen, please maintain peace!
By the light of Menelaus, we travel in peace and protection.
By the Queen, we have unfriendly ships in our domain, kindly assist us at your convenience.
We are under attack! The Queen has forsaken us! Save us! (half-mad with fear)Save us!!
The Boron request you withdraw communications. We must have quiet!
I am very well, thank you. May the Boron be blessed by your presence.
Welcome, in the name of the Queen!
The light of the Queen shall shine in all the dark places you must travel.
Pay heed pilot! Ahead lies a truly wondrous sight.
May your ship change course soon. We grow tired of seeing your engines.
Could you please go a little faster? My tentacles are drying up.
For the Queen! We do not wish to reach the afterlife so soon! Slow your ship!
This sector does not offer us the route we desired. Perhaps we shall turn back.
We gracefully request your trade material status.
For the grace of Menelaus, allow us our rights. This belongs to the Boron!
By the Queen, we have great need for assistance. Your credits would help us greatly.
The Boron have lost grace. Our damage is unworthy of the Queen's light.
By the Queen! If you were not to have shields active, you would indeed be taken by the afterlife.
(slow, slurred, and stoned)I cannot feel my tentacles... (squeal)Menelaus save me, my waters have broken!

page.title: Boron Border Patrol
page.t: The Boron gracefully request you leave this sector immediately. Your are prohibited from entering all primary Boron sectors due to your poor status. Failure to do so will result in force being directed against you. You have one mizura to comply with our wishes.
You have failed to comply with our order for you to leave all Boron Prime sectors. Intercept vector authorised. With regret we will now neutralise your ship.

page.title: Split Variation 6
page.t: Split hope that was accident! You shoot again you eat own liver!
Split say, if you look for fight - you get one!
Split Ship. Join battle. Being shot - bring ships to fight!
Split now show you how battle fought!
Shields going. Death in battle is my fate!
Peace wasn't my idea, try that again!
Next Split warning come with warhead!
Now Split get to blow you out of space!
Are you wanting something from the Split?
Split never talk to likes of you!
Split say you must be mistaken?
Split does not beg for life but offers ship! My death is for another day!
Split gives you freight! Another day I will take yours!
This is Captain of Split. What you want?
Split want no talk with you!
Come back when Split finished with enemy!
It is too late for talk with Split!
That is insult. The Split never surrender never forget!
Split say you are already there!
The Split offer help to such as you. Fly behind...
We have helped. Split Captain Out.
credits every gate we travel. Take it, leave it.
We already have full cargo, go away!
You cannot afford our services, speerak! We leave you. Maybe talk again if and when you can pay!
The Split will follow - but we charge for every gate!
Speerak - there's no space to drop freight. Move another place.
We have now finished working. Captain out.
Rhonkar Family Police demand you stop immediately! Illegal goods on ship. Drop or we destroy!
Pilot - Rhonkar Family Police demand you drop Illegal freight or we blow you into pieces!
Split scanned ship and find no illegal goods.
Pilot forget Split! Pilot find they lose head. Get to destination quickly.
Split make demand, drop at next station!
Split pirate unbeatable - give up freight!
Split pirate not fooled - you give all freight!
Split offer help to no one!
(Hired)Deal struck. We will follow to the station.
(Not enough space for station)It can't move there.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot do this, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station.
(Negative/can't execute command)There is no glory in that.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
There are many, it is a worthy fight.
Hello, I have a job for you.
You have my thanks. You saved my life.
Split need pilot for work! You have skill! Request you contact us!
Split offer thanks! Pay is here! We go now!
Split not happy! You fail! You bring shame on us!
Pilot save Split! Thanks we offer, and shame we hold! We go away!
Split shall aid pilot! Maintain position! Maintain survival!
Pilot! Bring weapons on-line! Much danger lurks. No time for heroes, you go!
Split see enemy nearby! Weapons ready! Split ready! We fight!
Split not want to risk goods! Keep cargo locked down! All ships evade!
Split have no battle here! Stop shooting!
Split scans negative. No enemy detected! We go freely!
Split request assistance, under fire! You assist us!
Split life in danger! No fight worth the loss of a Split life! You help Split! NOW!
Split not want you near! No talk! No scan! You go away!
Split not about to show status! You go away!
You leave now! Split resume business!
Split say weapons more important than shields. Shoot first. Ask questions later!
You look! Look now! Great things arise in this sector!
You in Split way! You move now!
Split have little time for snails! Snails for majaglit! Not for pilots!
Split not about to race! You slow down!
Split not know where ship is! I bring shame upon my family! Lost I am!
Split need prices! You transmit now! Split waiting!
Split not want to share! You not take! (screaming)You go AWAY!
Split not above you! Need credits! Hunger greater than shame!
Split in shame! Ship not worthy of combat! Not worthy of pilot!
Split see the ship of true fighter. Honoured we are to see such damage.
(slightly guilty, but mostly just wasted)Shame... much shame! And much spacefuel! Spaceweed! (delighted, drunken screech)Waheeey!!

page.title: Split Variation 7
page.t: Split hope that was accident! You shoot again you feel great fire, Split fire!
You have no shame! You die!
Split say, last battle upon you! You not live long!
Split Ship. Assist now! Under fire - bring ships to battle!
Split show you true fear, battle fought not over till your death!
Split feel your fear! You will die!
Shame is upon me! Shields no more! Death I see before me!
Peace not much fun, you try again foolish one!
Split not warn again, you soon no more than space debris!
Now Split get to blast you back to your mother!
You want something from Split? Show yourself!
Split not talk to one such as you! (screams, then says)You go away!
Split not in mood for smalltalk!
Split have no care for your problems. Cry elsewhere!
Split rather die before bring shame upon family!
Split say you smoke too much spaceweed?
I bring shame upon my line! Offer you ship! Death with honour another time!
Split give you cargo! Remember me, soon I will take yours!
This is Captain of Split. Why you bother us?
Split not about to talk with one such as you!
Split busy killing enemy. You come back later!
Time for talk long gone! No talk with Split now!
You insult family! Split remember you! Revenge is ours!
Split say you drink too much spacefuel, you are already there!
Split not know that sector! Look elsewhere pilot!
The Split give help to the shameless one. Fly behind...
We have assisted. Split Captain Out.
credits every gate we travel. Take it, leave it. Choice is yours!
We already have full cargo, go away! No time for you now!
You cannot afford our services, speerak! We leave you. Maybe talk again when you learn to count!
The Split will follow - but we collect credits for every gate we pass through!
Speerak - we see no space to drop freight. We move another place.
Rhonkar Family Police say you stop immediately! Illegal goods onboard! Empty bays or we attack!
Pilot - Rhonkar Family Police demand you drop Illegal freight or we spread your ashes across sector!
Split scan ship. We find no illegal goods. You go now!
Pilot forget Split! Pilot find they lose head. Waste too much time, fly faster!
Split demand you stop at next station! Split get off find better pilot!
Split pirate invincible - you not have chance! Give up cargo now!
Split pirate take freight! Pitiful fight do you give!
Split pirate not stupid - you give all freight or we burn you in ship!
Pirates - join battle now! Fight with honour!
Split not about to assist! No help to you!
Split will help only for honour and own need!
Until next battle, we salute you!
Split make deal. We follow to station.
It not move there. You think again stupid!
Split unable to do this, location specified no longer valid. Rethink! We wait!
There is no glory in that.
Hold on, help is under way.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
There are many, it is a worthy fight.
Raaka, I have a job for you!
You have my thanks. You saved my life.
Split want pilot. Much work ahead! You have skill! Request you contact us!
Split offer thanks! Pay is here! We go now!
Split not happy! You fail! You bring shame on us!
Pilot save Split! Thanks we offer, and shame we hold! We go away!
Split shall aid pilot! Maintain position! Maintain survival!
Pilot! Bring weapons on-line! Much danger lurks. No time for heroes, you go!
Split see enemy nearby! Weapons ready! Split ready! We fight!
Split not want to risk goods! Keep cargo locked down! All ships evade!
Ship too close! You move AWAY!
Split have no battle here! Stop shooting!
Split scans negative. No enemy detected! We go freely!
Split request assistance, under fire! You assist us!
Split life in danger! No fight worth the loss of a Split life! You help Split! NOW!
Split not want you near! No talk! No scan! You go away!
Split not about to show status! You go away!
You leave now! Split resume business!
Split say weapons more important than shields. Shoot first. Ask questions later!
You look! Look now! Great things arise in this sector!
You in Split way! You move now!
Split have little time for snails! Snails for majaglit! Not for pilots!
Split not about to race! You slow down!
Split not know where ship is! I bring shame upon my family! Lost I am!
Split need prices! You transmit now! Split waiting!
Split not want to share! You not take! You go AWAY!
Split not above you! Need credits! Hunger greater than shame!
Split in shame! Ship not worthy of combat! Not worthy of pilot!
Split see the ship of true fighter. Honoured we are to see such damage.
Shame... much shame! And much spacefuel! Spaceweed! Waheeey!!

page.title: Split Border Patrol
page.t: Split to Pilot! You leave sector immediately! Not allowed to be here! You not have rank high enough to enter all primary Split sectors. Failure to leave mean we use force against you! You have one mizura to comply.
You not comply with order to leave all Split Prime sectors. We set intercept vector for your ship! We attack now!

page.title: Paranid Variation 6
page.t: You give offence to the Paranid empire unclean one!
You will feel the wrath of the Paranid Empire!
For the honour of the Priest Emperor!
Support call! Paranid seeks vengeance against lowerlife aggressor!
See an end to your miserable life!
Do not trouble the Paranid empire.
The Priest Emperor Xaar's gunners have you in sights. We will be happy to purge ourselves of another unclean one!
Learn the error of your ways!
You want something from me? Are you empty of the mind?
I have no time for you lowlife!
Paranid's have better things to do than help pilots like you!
That is not the business of my magnificent self.
There is no honour in surrender!
My ears are deaf as you are blind to the power of the three!
Take my ship and know I despise you!
Take this freight! May it choke your life.
The Paranid Empire graciously answers your communication. What do you beg for?
Your capacity for stupidity is beyond measure!
The commander is busy - he advises you seek sterilisation to help the galactic gene pool!
Clear Paranid communication channels of your unpure voice!
Surrender? To someone of two dimensions?!
Your race is as empty as space. You are already here.
The Paranid empire will not trouble to answer that.
Paranid assistance is charity to lowerlife. Take leave from us.
Credits soothe the loss of honour in dealing with you.
payment is demanded for every gate we go through.
Paranid cargo bays are full we have no space for your custom, you seek our grace another time!
That is not enough to satisfy our honour!
Contract accepted. We will follow you to your destination! Every minute in your presence demeans our honour.
There is no space here, lowerlife. Try elsewhere.
We unload freight here and now.
Paranid honour is soothed by Credits. Praise Xaar.
This is a Police Enforcer of the Priest Emperor! We believe you carry illegal goods in Paranid Space. Drop them now or suffer the Emperor's wrath!
Drop your freight immediately or feel the power of the Empire!
No illegal goods detected. Paranid security suggests you leave.
My time is worth more than your useless genes. Take me to my destination!
Let me out at the next station, lowerlife!
Give us the freight and live, lowerlife!
This freight pays for the fact you have dishonoured my space!
Give me all the freight now!
We won't help you - fight better! !
We won't help - kill the Pirate yourself!
(greeting)I give you gracious leave to share my space.
(bye)Take leave and feel honoured by my presence
(excuse)If I were a low life you would receive an apology.
(Hired)You have engaged our services over our honour. We will follow you to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move the station to that location, lowerlife, engage your pitiful brain, unholy one.
(new location confirmed)Moving station to requested site. You are fortunate for our patience.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the duty, the location you specified is no longer valid. You have much to learn of the third dimension
(Successfully moved)We have moved the station and are sanitizing our connection cables.

(Player near Gate to closed sector)Paranid Central sectors are closed to all lower life forms by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Cease your approach, or see the end of your pitiful life.

(Player near Gate to clsoed sector)Paranid central sectors are closed by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Any attempt to enter will meet with lethal force and the ending of your pathetic life.
(Player entered closed sector)Central sectors are closed to inferior lifebeings. You have thirty sezuras to leave.
(Player entered closed sector)This is Paranid Border Control. Central sectors are closed to lower life forms. Depart alive by choice, or stay to die.
(Final warning)This is your final warning, continue your approach and see destruction.
(Attack)The great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia has decreed the destruction of any ship attempting to enter. Weapon systems are online. You are being targeted.
My ship is damaged, repairs required
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility
Hey, you'll really look cool as a bit of space debris!
I got a missile on my tail
I've got a target lock on me
The Priest Duke deigns to tolerate your assistance. Would the unholy one work for us?
The unholy one's work has been most impressive. A bounty in recognition of this shall be passed into your ownership.
Our faith in you was misplaced. Your failure was most unfortunate, unholy one.
Honour and strength have you shown. Our thanks we offer to you!
The Paranid have heeded the call of the unwashed. Patience little one, salvation is coming!
The holy light of the Priest Emperor Xaar will not protect your unholy form here.
Safety is not something you will find here. Be on your guard!
The unholy sector patrols are upon us. May their light not shine upon our cargo.
We fear collision. Do not defile our ship, pilot!
Your aggression brings danger to the affairs of Xaar. Stop immediately.
The Priest Xaar sends his compliments. We see the light once more, our path is clear.
The Paranid request the assistance of nearby ships. Our holy vessel comes under fire from the unclean.
I feel as if death is upon me. Priest Xaar forgive my sins. Assistance is urgently required... (solemn)but perhaps futile.
The unholy one would be wise to leave us in peace! Foolish are you for intruding upon us!
I do not care to speak of my status to the unholy one. My ship is sacrosanct.
The Paranid greet you with holy light.
The Paranid give thanks. Redemption is yours.
Choose your enemies with care, unholy one. Your world is finite.
The Priest Xaar commands your attention, unholy one. Behold!
Your course defiles the path of the Paranid. Move!
I feel as if I may die of old age before I reach my destination.
The unholy one clearly chooses to fly like a blinded heretic. I ask that you cease this madness.
Our course has brought us to places we do not recognise. Our concern grows.
The Priest Xaar sends word of trading pricing requirements. Please transmit your data to us.
Bounty is mine! The unholy one has chosen unwisely.
Honour and strength have deserted us. All I require are credits. Nothing else matters.
Core temperature is critical. If our ship is consumed, then by the light, I shall see you in hell!
It looks as if war you have seen. The Priest Xaar sends you his compliments.
(drunken, slurred)Shomethingsssh... are bedder left unsaid. (hic, struggling to sound serious and honest)No, matriarch, by the holy light I am quite... quite... sooober.

page.title: Paranid Variation 7
page.t: I recommend you stop shooting now, faithless one!
I give lowerlife one final warning then I extinguish you!
The empire will aid me, support contacted!
For the honour of Priest Emperor!
There will be no second chance!
Get here with rapidity aid bringers- shields are almost gone!
For the sake of Priest Emperor Xaar you try my patience lowerbeing!
It would bring my family pleasure to see your end, know this deficient one.
I have other things on my superior mind!
Such trivial matters are not my concern!
That is of no interest to me.
I would rather force feed myself to a rani!
My ears are deaf to you!
On this occasion you have bettered me, the ship is yours!
Paranid freight is being released, this action has been noted!
Your request has reached the Paranid Captain. How may we assist you?
Enemies of Paranid are not allowed to communicate!
Paranid captain is fully occupied. Take your offensive self off our communication channel immediately!
You dare to ask information? Do be careful not to offend Paranid!
Our Priest map puts it near to...
You confirm our view of your race, you are already there....
As our Priest map does not contain this information it can be of no relevance.
Word of your fame reaches the ears of Priest Emperor himself. We are instructed to help you, seek behind...
Paranid found you worthy of aid. You may now depart.
We will lower ourselves to aid you. Our service costs
Credits for every gate go through.
We are already transporting another customer's freight. Contact us once our job is finished!
You challenge our honour? You cannot afford our fee!
We accept and will follow you charging for every gate we cross.
There is no space here, lowerlife, we suggest you try somewhere else.
We are unloading your freight here and now before disinfecting our holds.
Your credits serve the emperor. Praise Xaar!
This is a Police Enforcer of the Priest Emperor - Stop immediately! - We believe you carry illegal goods, lowerlife. Drop them now or we will fire!
Pilot, drop your freight immediately or suffer the consequences of our Police action!
We have scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. The Paranid Empire gives you leave depart.
I do not wish to spend my entire life on this ship lowerlife, get to the destination quickly!
Let me off at the next station, unclean one!
Pirate ship damaged - I need help!
We cannot give help - we are too busy ourselves!
(greeting)I give you gracious leave to share my space.
(bye)Take leave and feel honoured by my presence.
(excuse)If I were a low life you would receive an apology.
(Hired)You have engaged our services over our honour. We will follow you to the station you wished moved.
(Not enough space for station)We cannot move the station to that location, lowerlife, engage your pitiful brain, unholy one.
(new location confirmed)Moving station to requested site. You are fortunate for our patience.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the duty, the location you specified is no longer valid. You have much to learn of the third dimension.
(Successfully moved)We have relocated the station and are sanitizing our connection cables.

(Player near Gate to closed sector) Paranid Central sectors are closed to all lower life forms by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Cease your approach, or see the end of your pitiful life.

(Player near Gate to closed sector)Paranid central sectors are closed by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Any attempt to enter will meet with lethal force and the ending of your pathetic life.
(Player entered closed sector)Central sectors are closed to inferior lifebeings. You have thirty sezuras to leave.
(Player entered closed sector)This is Paranid Border Control. Central sectors are closed to lower life forms. Depart alive by choice, or stay to die.
(Final warning)This is your final warning, continue your approach and see destruction.
(Attack)The great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia has decreed the destruction of any ship attempting to enter. Weapon systems are online. You are being targeted.
(Negative/can't execute command)That is not possible, sir
(assistance)Stay where you are, help is on the way!
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
I have an ememy in pursuit.
Suffer the wrath of the Paranid!
I bring your destruction with pleasure!
There's a missile got a lock on my ship!
Greetings, I have employment for you, lowerlife!
Are you willing to accept my gracious offer?
The job was well done, lowerbeing.
I am in need of assistance.
Unwashed and of little worth, yet worthy of our work you are. Make contact.
Our thanks, unholy one. A job truly well done; may salvation and honour shine upon you. Your reward awaits you.
Failure, ah yes, the Paranid are hardly surprised at your inability to perform.
Much have you done to aid us. The unholy one shall be praised. May the Priest Duke's light shine upon you.
Your distress is clear, unholy one. We shall assist you.
I do not feel as if luck you have, perhaps it is time to reconsider your journey.
I fear great loss may come upon us. Strength and honour in the battle ahead.
The sacred cargo of our ships is in peril. Fade away brethren. Patrol ships are near.
Your skills in piloting are weak, unholy one. Maintain your distance!
Silence weapons! Do not profane holy vessel!
The unholy choose not to disturb us. No threat appears to come our way.
The Priest Xaar requests assistance. Our sacred ship has fallen under attack.
I fear the end is upon me. Redeem yourselves, assist the Paranid in their time of great need!
The Priest Emperor Xaar sends you his displeasure at this intrusion. Be gone!
By the Priest's light we journey with strength and honour.
May you be cleansed by our contact. Welcome.
Until we meet again, may Xaar guide you.
Our light shines upon you, pilot. Thank you.
Strength, honour, courage - these you cannot buy, or sell, or win.
Pilot, take heed of the events around you! Wondrous they are!
Much you have to learn of navigation. You would be wise to adjust your course!
There are many qualities your unholy ship possesses. Speed apparently is not one of them.
Your ship chooses to fly at speeds I have no wish to experience. Slow down, unholy one.
We are truly with the unwashed in this place! Lost and without honour are the Paranid.
By the light of Priest Xaar, send your trade entity data. The Paranid await.
If your life do you value, you will honour us by leaving. This is ours!
Credits would indeed aid us in our journey. We ask of you little else.
There is much wrong with this ship. Very little right. There is no honour in flying such junk.
The holy light has indeed shone in your favour. You are alive and, though damaged, still worthy of our attention.
(half-drunken, guilty)I feel unholy, unwashed... Perhaps it was not wise to partake of the Argon elixir they call spacefuel.

page.title: Paranid Variation 8
page.t: You give offence to the Paranid empire unclean one!
You will feel the wrath of the Paranid Empire!
For the honour of the Priest Emperor!
Support call! Paranid seeks vengeance against lowerlife aggressor!
See an end to your miserable life!
Do not trouble the Paranid empire.
The Priest Emperor Xaar's gunners have you in sights. We will be happy to purge ourselves of another unclean one
Learn the error of your ways!
You want something from me? Are you empty of the mind?
I have no time for you lowlife!
Paranids have better things to do than help pilots like you!
That is not the business of my magnificent self.
There is no honour in surrender!
My ears are deaf as you are blind to the power of the three!
Take my ship and know I despise you!
Take this freight! May it choke your life.
The Paranid Empire graciously answers your communication. What do you beg for?
Your capacity for stupidity is beyond measure!
The commander is busy - he advises you seek sterilization to help the galactic genepool!
Clear Paranid communication channels of your unpure voice!
Surrender?! To someone of two dimensions?!.
Your race is as empty as space. You are already here.
The Paranid empire will not trouble to answer that.
Paranid assistance is charity to lowerlife. Take leave from us.
Credits soothe the loss of honour in dealing with you.
Payment is demanded for every gate we go through.
Paranid cargo bays are full we have no space for your custom, seek our grace another time!
That is not enough to satisfy our honour!
Contract accepted. We will follow you to your destination! Every minute in your presence demeans our honour.
There is no space here, lowerlife. Try elsewhere.
We unload freight here and now.
Paranid honour is soothed by credits. Praise Xaar.
This is a Police Enforcer of the Priest Emperor! We believe you carry illegal goods in Paranid Space. Drop them now or suffer the Emperor's wrath!
Drop your freight immediately or feel the power of the Empire!
No illegal goods detected. Paranid security suggests you leave.
My time is worth more than your useless genes. Take me to my destination!
Let me out at the next station, lowerlife!
Give me the freight and live lowerlife!
This freight pays for the fact you have dishonoured my space!
Give me all the freight now!
We won't help you - you fight better!
We won't help - kill the Pirate yourself!
(greeting)I give you gracious leave to share my space.
(bye)Take leave and feel honoured by my presence.
(excuse)If I were a low life you would receive an apology.
(Hired)You have engaged our services over our honour. We will follow you to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move the station to that location, lowerlife, engage your pitiful brain, unholy one.
(new location confirmed)Moving station to requested site. You are fortunate for our patience.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the duty, the location you specified is no longer valid. You have much to learn of the third dimension.
(Successfully moved)We have moved the station and are sanitizing our connection cables.

(Player near Gate to closed sector) Paranid Central sectors are closed to all lower life forms by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Cease your approach, or see the end of your pitiful life.

(Player near Gate to closed sector) Paranid central sectors are closed by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Any attempt to enter will meet with lethal force and the ending of your pathetic life.
(Player entered closed sector) Central sectors are closed to inferior lifebeings. You have thirty sezuras to leave.
(Player entered closed sector) This is Paranid Border Control. Central sectors are closed to lower life forms. Depart alive by choice, or stay to die.
(Final warning)This is your final warning, continue your approach and see destruction.
(Attack) The great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia has decreed the destruction of any ship attempting to enter. Weapon systems are online. You are being targeted.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
Hey, you'll really look cool as a bit of space debris!
I got a missile on my tail!
I've got a target lock on me!
Of great importance is this request. Even your assistance would be useful, lowerlife.
The Paranid have great pleasure in seeing our contract complete. May you take pleasure in the superior nature of our gift to you.
Perhaps we must look elsewhere, for you are clearly inferior to our needs.
There may be salvation for you yet. The Paranid thank you for your assistance.
We shall assist as much as we can. Patience pilot, for all things will come in time, even death.
The Priest offers you his compliments, but not his protection. You are far from home, unholy one.
Enemies approach. The Priest Xaar senses danger!
Fade into the darkness, for we are in danger of being detected. Evasion is yours to take.
I feel as if drunk you are. Your ship shows little control.
Paranid have no argument with you. Desist or lose your salvation!
We see little of any concern. Our journey shall pass with strength and honour.
We choose not to be defiled by the fire of enemy ships on this journey. May those around us assist in thwarting this unholy attack.
Perhaps this jazura is a good time to die. Perhaps the unholy will save me.
There is much we have to say, but none to you pilot! Leave us, unholy one!
The Paranid have little time to share with one such as you. Our superiority is unquestioned. Our future, however, remains uncertain.
By the light of the Priest Xaar, welcome my friend.
The priest Xaar bids you farewell.
Look beyond the eyes you hold, for great treasure lies in unfamiliar paths.
Truly a sign of our sacred origin, look ahead and acknowledge our superiority!
The unholy one chooses to interfere with our travels? Foolish are you!
Your speed bores me. I have seen Argnu run faster than your ship.
I feel as if my very limbs are about to tear asunder. Priest Xaar, save me from this senseless speed!
This place does not please the Priest Xaar. Errors we have made in our journey.
I feel as if prices I do require. The time for trade has come upon us. Transmit now.
You choose to take what is mine. You choose wrong. Think again, pilot!
The Paranid would request a few spare credits from the unholy one. Redeem your defiled soul with payment.
My displeasure grows. We should not have taken her out. She can barely lock in docking coordinates.
Your ship, while damaged, shows signs of honour and courage. We salute you.
(confused, tripping out on drugs)My eyes... from three to two have they gone! My world, it spins. May the Priest Xaar forgive me!

page.title: Paranid Variation 9
page.t: I recommend you stop shooting now, faithless one!
I give lowerlife one final warning then I extinguish you!
The empire will aid me, support contacted!
For the honour of Priest Emperor!
There will be no second chance!
Get here with rapidity aid bringers- shields are almost gone!
For the sake of Priest Emperor Xaar you try my patience lowerbeing!
It would bring my family pleasure to see your end, know this deficient one.
I have other things on my superior mind!
Such trivial matters are not my concern!
That is of no interest to me.
I would rather force feed myself to a rani!
My ears are deaf to you!
On this occasion you have bettered me, the ship is yours!
Paranid freight is being released, this action has been noted!
Your request has reached the Paranid Captain. How may we assist you?
Enemies of Paranid are not allowed to communicate!
Paranid captain is fully occupied. Take your offensive self off our communication channel immediately!
You dare to ask information? Do be careful not to offend Paranid!
Our Priest map puts it near to...
You confirm our view of your race, you are already there....
As our Priest map does not contain this information it can be of no relevance.
Word of your fame reaches the ears of Priest Emperor himself. We are instructed to help you, seek behind...
Paranid fid you worthy of aid. You may now depart.
We will lower ourselves to aid you. Our service costs...
We are already transporting another customer's freight. Contact us once our job is finished!
You challenge our honour? You cannot afford our fee!
We accept and will follow you charging for each gate we cross.
There is no space here, lowerlife, we suggest you try somewhere else.
We are unloading your freight here and now before disinfecting our holds.
Your credits serve the emperor. Praise Xaar!
This is a Police Enforcer of the Priest Emperor - Stop immediately! - We believe you carry illegal goods, lowerlife. Drop them now or we fire!
Pilot - Drop freight immediately or suffer the consequences of Police action!
We have scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. The Paranid Empire gives you leave to depart.
I do not wish to spend my entire life on this ship lowerlife, get to the destination quickly!
Let me off at the next station, unclean one!
Pirate ship damaged - I need help!
We cannot give help - we are too busy ourselves!
(greeting) I give you gracious leave to share my space.
(bye) Take leave and feel honoured by my presence.
(excuse) If I were a low life you would receive an apology.
(Hired) You have engaged our services over our honour. We will follow you to the station you wish moved.
(Not enough space for station) We cannot move the station to that location, lowerlife, engage your pitiful brain, unholy one.
(new location confirmed) Moving station to requested site. You are fortunate for our patience.
(Location has become invalid) We cannot complete the duty, the location you specified is no longer valid. You have much to learn of the third dimension
(Successfully moved)We have relocated the station and are sanitizing our connection cables.

(Player near Gate to closed sector)Paranid Central sectors are closed to all lower life forms by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Cease your approach, or see the end of your pitiful life.

(Player near Gate to clsoed sector)Paranid central sectors are closed by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Any attempt to enter will meet with lethal force and the ending of your pathetic life.
(Player entered closed sector)Central sectors are closed to inferior lifebeings. You have thirty sezuras to leave.
(Player entered closed sector)This is Paranid Border Control. Central sectors are closed to lower life forms. Depart alive by choice, or stay to die.
(Final warning)This is your final warning, continue your approach and see destruction.
(Attack)The great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia has decreed the destruction of any ship attempting to enter. Weapon systems are online. You are being targeted.
(Negative/can't execute command)That is not possible, sir
(assistance)Stay where you are, help is on the way
My ship is damaged, repairs required
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility
I have an enemy in pursuit
Suffer the wrath of the paranid!
I bring you destruction with pleasure.
There is a missile with a lock on my ship!
Greetings. I have employment for you lowerlife!
Are you willing to accept my gracious offer?
The job was well done lowerbeing.
I am in need of assistance.

page.title: Paranid Border Patrol
page.t: Unholy one, you would be wise to leave this sector immediately. Your current status prohibits you from entering all primary Paranid sectors. Failure to do so will result in lethal force being directed against you. You have one mizura to comply.
You have failed to comply with our order to leave all Paranid Prime sectors. Intercept vector authorised. Prepare to feel the wrath of the Priest Duke.

page.title: Teladi Variation 6
page.t: We hope that was an accident! Stop shooting!
You look for trouble? More shooting and I shall call support!
If you seek fight we are ready!
Emergency. Pilot going gun crazy. Request help!
You have no sense - you lose profit!
My shields going. Hiss Someone help to save profit!
Teladi command assumes that was an accident!
Now you feel full Teladi anger!
You are identified as an enemy of the Teladi. Surrender or we will destroy your ship!
Teladi don't want contact with you!
Can't you see Teladi is busy?
Teladi don't want talk with you!
Teladi is not responsible for that.
Teladi suggest that you might be making joke!
Teladi rather die than lose profit!
If you spare Teladi life I give my ship!
Teladi forced to yield. Give freight!
This is the captain of the Teladi Company Space Fleet. What do you want?
Hiisssssss.........! Teladi do not want to speak to you.!
We don't want to talk to you!
Is that is considered a joke in your race? !
I know the trading area. It is somewhere behind
I know the trading area. You are already there!
We are pleased to help. Try flying through
I am happy we could help! Good profit.
We welcome the chance to make profit with you. Our service will cost you only
Credits for every gate we go through.
It grieves us to say we are busy transporting freight for another customer. Please try contacting us again, and we will offer a good price!
We notice that you cannot afford our services - make profit to accumulate more!!
We will be hired by you. We'll follow you and make profit in every gate we cross!
We cannot make profit unloading where there is no space. Move where there is room to unload.
It is good to unload freight here.
It was a pleasure making profit with you. May profit go with you.
This is Teladi Company Police Security Force. Pilot we ask you to stop immediately! - Illegal goods are aboard your ship. Drop the cargo or we will fire!
Teladi Company Police Security Force to Pilot - we said drop goods - do it now or we fire!
This is Teladi Company Police Security Force. We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thanks for your cooperation.
Pilot, did you forget me? I have to get to my destination quickly before I lose profit!
I have lost my profit, I demand that you let me out at the next station!
You lose, so it's our profit!
We ask, all your freight give!
Fellow pirates - my ship needs help!
You are too far away. You must fight alone!
We are coming. We will fight together!
(Hired)We have a deal. We'll follow you to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move the station to that location.
(new location confirmed)Affirmative. Moving station to requested location.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the job, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station to its new location.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
Hey, you'll really look cool as a bit of space debris!
I got a missile on my tail!
I've got a target lock on me!
Our need for profits grows. We ask you to assist and gain many credits in doing so.
We thank you pilot. Your efforts have resulted in much profits. A commission worthy of one such as you is on its way.
Much profit have we lost. Your failure is unacceptable. Our contract is over!
You have saved our lives, and our profits. We thank you.
Our assistance will save much profits... we will join you, pilot.
There may be more danger than profits where you travel. Be wary, pilot.
Both profit and life stands in danger! Our enemies approach!
Our profit lies in clear view! We must hide! Go now, patrols are inbound!
Our ship requires greater distance. Adjust your course!
Our profits are safe. The journey ahead remains free of concern.
Our ship has come under attack. For the greater good of all profit, assist us!
My profits I will gladly forfeit, please assist! Our ship is failing under fire!
There is little profit in our annoyance. Your presence is not required.
Our profits are low, our commerce weak. We have little to be thankful for, pilot.
May profit be with you. Journey well.
Profits lie in many things. Do not be afraid to widen your commerce.
Teladi ask you to review your surroundings. There may well be more to life than profits!
Our profit, as well as our journey, is hindered by your ship. Please adjust your course.
Your speed troubles us. Engage your thrusters before our profits vanish.
Greater speed does not always mean greater profit. Your speed must be lowered!
Teladi know not where they have arrived. Our profit lies elsewhere.
Teladi request transmission of all profit-lists for goods!
Profits are ours! Claim we have taken! Your business lies elsewhere!
Our profits are low, our commerce weak. We request donations to aid our journey... it's an investment!
Profit is not guaranteed with such a ship as this. Unacceptable!
The Teladi assume you have been attempting contact with the Xenon, for your ship bears marks of war.
(slow, hissing much heavier than usual)Profits we will not make today, for today I am... I am... what am I again?

page.title: Teladi Variation 7
page.t: There is no profit in shooting!
We hope that was accident! You cost us profit in damage!
You look for trouble? More shooting and I call support!
If you seek fight we are ready!
Emergency. Pilot going gun crazy. Request help!
You have no sense - you lose profit!
My shields are going. Someone, help me save profit!
Teladi command assumes that was an accident!
You are identified as an enemy of the Teladi. Surrender or we will destroy your ship!
There is no profit in this conversation!
Can't you see Teladi is busy? Time is credits!
I don't want talk with you!
Teladi suggest that you might be making joke!
Teladi rather die than lose profit!
If you spare Teladi life I give my ship!
Teladi forced to yield. Give freight!
This is the captain of the Teladi Company Space Fleet. What do you want?
Hiisssssss.........! Teladi do not want to speak to you.!
We don't want to talk to you!
Is that is considered a joke in your race? !
I know the trading area. It is somewhere behind the
I know the trading area. You are already there!
We are pleased to help. Try flying through the
I am happy we could help! Good profit.
We welcome the chance to make profit with you. Our service will cost you only
Credits for every gate we go through.
It grieves us to say we are busy transporting freight for another customer. Please try contacting us again, and we will offer a good service!
We notice that you cannot afford our services - make profit to accumulate more!!
We will be hired by you. We'll follow you and make profit in every gate we cross!
We cannot make profit unloading where there is no space. Move where there is room to unload.
It is good to unload freight here.
It was a pleasure making profit with you. May profit go with you.
This is Teladi Company Police Security Force. Pilot we ask you to stop immediately! - Illegal goods are aboard your ship. Drop the cargo or we will fire!
Teladi Company Police Security Force to Pilot - we said drop goods - do it now or we fire!
This is Teladi Company Police Security Force. We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thanks for your cooperation.
Pilot, did you forget me? I have to get to my destination quickly before I lose profit!
I have lost my profit, I demand that you let me out at the next station!
You lose, so it's our profit!
We got your profit, learn from it!
We want all your freight to make ours, hand it over!
We are too far away. Fight for your own profit!
We are on our way. To the victor, a share of the profits.
(Hired)We have a deal. We'll follow you to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move the station to that location.
(new location confirmed)Affirmative. Moving station to requested location.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the job, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station to its new location.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
Hey, you'll really look cool as a bit of space debris!
I got a missile on my tail!
I've got a target lock on me!
The Teladi Company has a job of great commercial significance. Your assistance would be welcomed, pilot.
The Teladi Company offers thanks, and has great pleasure in seeing your contract completed. May your remuneration gain you much profit!
You show little skill in commerce! How could one such as you fail?
The Teladi offer their thanks for your actions. May profit shine upon you.
Your future holds great worth. We shall assist.
The Teladi ask you to reconsider your journey, safer commerce lies elsewhere.
Commerce must wait, we have enemy ships closing!
We risk loss of many credits! Engage evasive manoeuvres! Sector patrols are active!
You are no pilot! You are endangering our profit!
Hold fire! Do not endanger our profit!
Teladi confirm no known threat detected. Our journey towards profit continues.
Unknown ships are attempting to take from us what is not theirs! Please join with us!
Teladi urgently require help, we are under attack! We may survive without credits, but not without life support!
I do not wish to trade, to talk, or to listen. You will find no profit with me, pilot!
The Teladi hope that business improves for us. May profit go with you, pilot.
May profit shine upon you, my friend.
May profit go with you, pilot.
Loss is to be taken in clear knowledge that profit will in time shine through.
Much has happened here, much change - we request your attention, pilot!
The Teladi have much to teach you of navigation. Your ship requires a course correction!
We have little left to lose and much to gain should you choose to accelerate.
There may be greater commerce elsewhere, but we may not survive to profit from it, should you maintain this speed.
Our journey towards greater profits has ended abruptly. Perhaps this course is incorrect.
Please transmit all current price data. Profits await us all!
This one is not for you! This is marked for Teladi Corporations!
We have little else other than a dream of great fortune. Please help us, we ask for no more than a few of your valuable credits!
Perhaps commerce must wait until our ship is repaired. Most upsetting.
Much damage you have sustained. Perhaps you would be safer in trade than combat.
(happy, heavy hissing)Mmmn... spaceweed. Cover me in nostrop and send me hoooome!

page.title: Teladi Border Patrol
page.t: This is Teladi Company vessel to Pilot. Leave this sector immediately. Your current standing prohibits you from entering all primary Teladi sectors. Should you choose not to do so, you will lose more than profit! Lethal force will be used against you. You have one mizura to comply.
You have failed to adhere to our order to leave all Teladi Prime sectors. Authorisation to neutralise your ship has been given. Your time has come to an end here.

page.title: Beginner Tutorial 0
page.t: Welcome to the Argon Federation Space Academy, my name is Uri Seldom and I will be here to guide you through the key features of the interface for your ship computer. You may quit this tutorial at any time by pressing Shift-Q on your ships data interface.

You are currently sitting in an M5 Argon Discoverer. This is a small scout-class vessel, however the menu structure will remain the same regardless of which ship you pilot. This standardisation was introduced to prevent confusion not only for the different pilots but different races amongst the known universe.
Now, let's start off by showing you how to access you primary ship menu.
Press the Enter key on your ships Data Interface.
Good. You will now see an Information Panel appear, labelled Main Menu, along which you will see five icons, Pilot, Current Ship, Navigation, Target and Options.

You will notice that the icon for Navigation is slowly pulsing. This indicates that Navigation is currently your selected option. You can use your right or left arrow keys, or activate your ships Mobile Online Universal Sector Engagement device, or M.O.U.S.E to select the Navigation icon now.

Excellent, you have selected the Navigation Menu, which has now been opened to show you two additional options, Universe Map and Sector Map. The Universe Map will provide you with a clear idea of where you are, in relation to those sectors you have visited, or purchased maps for. This will often help you plan out flight routes or trading strategies.

Select the Universe Map option now. You will immediately see your sector represented by a circle enclosed by a square. Pressing Enter again will show you the same view as the Sector Map, allowing you to view all scanned ships, stations and other objects in range.

Pressing Esc on your ship data interface will bring you back one level, pressing it again will do the same. Once you have pressed Esc twice you will now be at the main menu. You can also use the down arrow to go back to the previous menu, this serves as an alternative to the Esc key.
You can access all other menus using the same commands, either with your M.O.U.S.E or by ship data interface.

On the main menu you will see four other menu options: Pilot, Current Ship, Target and Options. Opening the Pilot menu will enable to access all data and records that reference your personal status, from the time you have been flying, to how many credits you have, as well as the property you own. You will also be able to initiate an emergency eject from this menu using the Eject option. \(This will disengage your ships automatic safety mechanisms and allow you to break through the cockpit. Please ensure you are wearing your spacesuit before engaging Eject.\)

Now let's look at the Current Ship Menu, pressing Enter or using your M.O.U.S.E to select it with one left click will allow you to view all data for your current ship. This includes information such as your ship equipment, any cargo it is carrying, its weaponry and shield specification, as well as what class or capacity of cargo you are able to carry.

The submenu for your Current Ship will offer you four further options. Details will provide you with an in-depth look at your ship specification. The Weapons menu will show you which lasers and missiles are currently loaded into your mounts. The Orders menu will give you the option to command your ship using a variety of options and choices. And finally the freight menu will give you a rundown of what your ship is currently holding. On this menu you will also have the option to choose to eject any items you no longer wish to carry. To do so simply use the arrow keys to highlight the item, then select eject, and then specify how many of the item you wish to eject using either your numeric pad, or the arrow keys.
Now press ESC and then choose 'Target' from the Main Menu.

The Target menu offers you the chance to view detailed information about the ship or object you have locked on using your ships heads-up display system. This will include ship class, name, shields and weaponry, as well as other information that you are privileged to access.

Finally, the "Options" menu will allow you to configure the behaviour of the universe you are in. These items are explained in detail in your Ship Computer interface manual. Under the game menu you will also be able to access options to engage salvage insurance to save or load prior points in your progress. You will also be able to pause your current status, as well as depart from the X universe.
You have now seen the basic concepts and levels of information that you can obtain from your ships menu interface. We hope you will have an enjoyable flight.

page.title: Beginner Tutorial 1
page.descr: Beginner Tutorial 1: Basic Controls (spoken by Instructor)
page.t: You can look up ALL keys for various types of controllers in your printed manual or the most common ones from the HELP menu which opens up by pressing the H key. -- To familiarize yourself with the controls, a number of Kessler Rings have been activated. Your task is to pass all rings. Rings that you have not passed yet are marked with a green light. -- You control the ship steering with the "turn ship" and "roll ship"-keys as well as a wide set of (ADDED)"strafe" and(/ADDED) "speed control" keys. Look them up in the manual now and learn how to manoeuvre your ship through the rings.
You see the ship computer's main menu. Now leave the menu by pressing the "back" or the "Close menu" key.

Very well done. You have successfully collected a container which is now in your ship's freight bay. Now it's time for a space walk. -- A new ship has arrived near your location and waits to be boarded by you. Move in closer to the new ship, then leave your cockpit via "eject pilot from ship" in the ship menu.

page.title: Beginner Tutorial 2
page.t: Welcome back to the Argon federation space academy simulator. My name is Uri Seldom. In this simulation level we will concentrate on menu usage. I will also explain how to trade with stations and to have some fun you will be allowed to destroy a couple of ships using missiles. You can again quit this session at any time.
Very good! You are now docked to the station.

From the "Freight Bay"-menu you get an overview of wares you have on board and what upgrades are currently installed in the ship. Goods can be ejected here. -- You have some unnecessary plankton loaded. Eject all of it now by first selecting it and then selecting the amount with the "menu selection left/right" keys. -- Then confirm your selection with the "select" key. Please select the appropriate menu option now.
When the targeting system has locked onto the station open the Sector Map again.
Ok, the station's docking mechanism is ready for your ship to land. Now approach very carefully, otherwise you will collide with the station.

Good! This time your defenceless opponent is an M3-class ship. When you open the info menu for the target you see the ships' actual shield and hull strength. - Note that a ship's hull can only be damaged once the shield level reaches zero. -- However any damage you inflict on a ship's hull is permanent and would require a repair service offered by all shipyards. - Damage done to the shield of a ship on the other hand is only temporary. It regains its power after a short time. -- The Dragonfly missile has a destruction power a little more than the current shield and strength of this ship. So, if you launch this missile towards the ship, it will not just reduce the shield to zero but even harm the ship's hull already. To blow up the ship you need to destroy the ship hull completely!

page.title: Basic Tutorial 3
page.descr: texts for Basic Tutorial 3 (spoken by Instructor)
page.t: Good. You can now observe what's going on behind your ship in monitor nr. 1. -- But a monitor is not just a nice display. You can even take over the control of any monitor with just one button. Press the "activate next monitor"-key now.

With this key you can cycle through the connected monitors. (CUT) Once the monitor is active your controls are all mapped to this view. -- In an active monitor, you can now again cycle through the available views as well. Press the "next cockpit"-key one time now to switch to main-cockpit view in monitor 1.
OK. The TL has now docked here. Dock at the station and bring up the stations menu.

page.title: Advanced Tutorial 1
page.t: Good work - the transporter will now move on - heading to the Solar Power Plant. We'll care about it later on. As you own a second transporter, use it to get Ore automatically. -- Command "Transporter 2 of Forge" to "Buy ware..." and then choose "Ore" and as destination factory the "Ore Mine Alpha". -- This will make the ship fly to the specified station to get the resource but this time it will fly out only once.

Very well done! The transporter is on its way to get Ore for the Forge. -- Now we have to wait until "Transporter 1 of Forge" has landed at the Solar Power Plant. Meanwhile you could watch the transporter in a monitor...

"Transporter 1 of Forge" has landed at the Power Plant! Now you will find the menu-item "trade with station" in its ship menu allowing you to load the needed Energy Cells into the ship. Buy 600 Energy Cells right now.

"Transporter 1 of Forge" has landed at the Bakery. Please wait until the Cahoona Bakery has produced an amount of 100 Meatsteaks to load them into "Transporter 1 of Forge". By the way: You can look up the progress of the production in the station menu.

Very good - the ships are about to start and execute their tasks! Since a transporter from the forge is supposed to buy ware automatically later on, please set the following two parameters of the Forge: credits to 35000 and buying price of Ore to maximum.
Please wait until "Transporter 1 of Forge" has landed at the Solar Power Plant.
Please wait until "Transporter 1 of Forge" has landed at your Cahoona Bakery.
Please wait until "Transporter 1 of Forge" has landed at the Forge.

page.title: Boardcomp. Sectornames
page.descr: Names of all sectors (spoken by Boardcomputer)

page.title: Boardcomp. Misc
page.t: (not spoken)Betty's lines for Boarding Crews functionality.
Warning! One of your ships is being boarded, (sectorname)
Warning! One of your ships has been boarded, (sectorname)
Warning! One of your ships has been captured, (sectorname)
Boarding operation failed - hull not penetrated.
Boarding operation failed - boarding party eliminated.
Boarding operation failed - central core access denied.
Warning! The target's shields are still up - unable to launch boarding crew.
Warning! Your boarding crew has been eliminated - the target's shields were not down long enough.
Warning! Unable to board ship - you are too far from the target.
No marines are available to board the ship.
Warning! This ship cannot be boarded.
Warning! This station cannot be boarded.
Warning! This object cannot be boarded.
No docking space available for a new ship
Established by Kyle William Brennan and Elena Kho, Terracorp is an influential and diverse corporation that specialises in private security and consultancy.
OTAS(speak Oh-Tas, holds for all appearances of OTAS)
Optimised Technology, Armaments and Shielding Corporation
OTAS is a private defence contractor that excels in research, development and production of advanced defence technology. OTAS isn't afraid to use its own products and influence to further its aims.
Jonferson Space Dynamics Division, known popularly as Jonferco and founded by Ser Alman Jonferson, is an ambitious civilian outfit specialising in engineering and installation design.
Plutarch Mining Corporations is a rapidly-growing new mining conglomerate that doesn't shy away from any type of exploitation, not just asteroids.

Still known by many as PTNI, the Nividium Mining and Manufacturing Corporation changed its name to avoid a legal wrangle in the Teladi Chamber of Commerce. One thing that hasn't changed is the single-minded hunt for Nividium and the profit it brings.
Outwardly a non-governmental security organisation, the activities of this outfit suggest that they don't always subscribe to Paranid ideologies and ethics.
This up-and-coming Boron shipbuilding concern specialises in remote-operation space vehicles and has made great strides in automation and AI-controlled craft.
This Split corporation exists only to manufacture and sell weapons. Ethically bankrupt, the company isn't particular about who pays top credit for its armaments.

page.title: Boardcomp. objects
page.t: BoGas factories artificially manufacture BoGas, which is only found in its natural state on the Boron home planet. These factories are simple affairs containing chemical mixtures in huge vats where the gas is formed naturally.(||) Large piping systems then drain the gas into decanting areas where it is put into large sealed cylinders for ease of transport. Traditionally these factories were constructed from metal made from ore supplied by the Argon but throughout the last seventy years the Boron have been refurbishing and re-equipping their BoGas factories using Teladianium.

BoFu meals are known to be very nutritious and healthy. The Boron love them and it is said that their pilots can live on just a nugget of BoFu for almost a week.(||) BoFu is grown in special BoFu Chemical Labs from Plankton and other secret ingredients. Even though the Boron are famous among other races for their delicious Stott spices, the taste of BoFu is no joy to anybody but them.

Chelts are marine animals that once roamed the seas and oceans on the Split home planet that the Split killed for meat, oil and their skins, which they processed to create a tough leather-like material. However for many years Chelts were over-hunted and almost brought to extinction. Nowadays Chelts are grown in space Chelt Aquariums and are later sold to Split food factories.

(General description for all High Energy Plasma Throwers)The radiation is so dangerous that the weapon had to go through many years of research and development until it could be placed on the market. This was worked around by adding a radiation sink into the weapon's main design. Purging the weapon of all excess radiation between shots.
This laser is used in larger weapon systems and by many small to medium fighters.
A weapon found in some medium and large fighters.
A deadly weapon found on frigates, destroyers and carriers.
Shield Prod. Fac. 200 MJ (speak Shield Production Facility 200 Megajoules)
{17,2748} {17,2710} (General description for shields and BIG shields)
The 200 MJ(speak Megajoule) Shield is a medium protection shield. Typically used by corvettes and some large transport ships.

The Colossus is the main carrier of the Argon military. As new technologies have been developed in recent years, the design has undergone several major overhauls. With a large hangar capacity for fighters, strong shielding and numerous turret batteries, the Colossus is one of the most powerful vessels in the Argon fleet. Argon One, the flagship of the Argon fleet, maintains a dominant presence in Argon Prime.

Until the building of Argon One, the Titan-class destroyers were the biggest ships in the Argon fleet. Although heavy and difficult to manoeuvre, in the hands of a capable Argon captain, this ship is a powerful weapon with a noble heritage. Its predecessors fought and won many major battles in both the Xenon Conflict and the Boron Campaign. Since then the ship has been regularly updated and redesigned and it remains the heaviest-armed and shielded vessel in the Argon fleet.

The Argon Buster was once the pride of the Argon fleet and was instrumental in gaining the Argon victory in the Xenon Conflict. However, during the Boron campaign, it was superseded by the Argon Elite.(||) Over the intervening years the design of the Argon Buster has been modified and new, more powerful engines have been fitted. Now updated, the Buster is again a firm favourite of the Argon Fighter Command.

A typical Argon Space station used throughout entire Argon federation territory. Developed by Argon over many years, these space stations provide the highest standards of both comfort and technology.(||) Each station is fitted with bars, restaurants, casinos, holographic cinemas and accommodation. They are fine rest and recreation centres. Each space station is under the jurisdiction of the Argon Federation and is governed by an elected senator. He represents the station in the main Argon Senate. Pilots can expect friendly welcome.

The Raptor is the Split carrier ship. It first made an appearance in the war against the Boron when it proved to be effective but vulnerable to attack from beneath. It is believed that, over the intervening years, the Split have redesigned the ship to eliminate this problem.(||) Normally these ships are commanded by high-ranking Split officers related by kin to the ruling family clan. Generally they are even more abrasive and arrogant than the other members of their race.

A long-serving and deadly fighter developed by the Split Military. It has been only in recent years that this ship has been made available to the public.(||) The current Split Patriarch has a small fleet of these ships that act as escort ships that accompany the primary destroyer of the fleet. In the hands of an experienced pilot, this ship can survive the darkest of battles, due to the ship's high speed it can avoid most of laser beams and missiles.

A forerunner of this ship fought in the Boron Campaign and proved to be a pilot favourite. Like most other Split ships, this design focuses on high-speed engines and increased weapon power, at the cost of shield strength. Over the years this ship had been frequently updated and rearmed in order to remain as deadly as possible.

This huge Transporter is too large to dock in any space station and carries a number of smaller freighters to load and unload its trading goods.(||) It is believed that this Transporter is an evolutionary form of a much smaller Transporter called the Rhino, which seems to have been phased out over the last hundred years. It is believed that a different Split family clan controls each transporter.

This ship was designed to be the main scout craft of the Paranid Fleet; lightly armed, but fast. The Pegasus design is considered a success in its role, and has also been widely adopted for various civilian purposes. Constantly being updated, this ship dates back to the early period of the Paranid and Split war against the Boron.

The Xenon carrier is a slow, yet powerful beast. Armed with numerous turret batteries and with a large number of fighters stored in its large hangar bay, a Xenon J is considered a major threat to any civilized sector it happens to be near. Some ships are able to escape a direct attack from a J-class ship because of its slow speed but these carriers normally carry numerous faster craft to chase down any fleeing ships.

Until recently the L was the most powerful Xenon fighter developed; it is armed with multiple lasers, and powerful shields.(||) These ships are often seen attacking passing ships trying to take shortcuts through their sectors. Like the other Xenon ships, the L has been updated in the last few years.

The Centaur was developed by Argon Shipwrights in Omicron Lyrae. It is larger than a fighter or small transporter but is much smaller than a frigate.(||) A corvette-class craft, armed with turrets and strong frontal weapons, the Centaur fills the gap between fighters and capital ships.

When the long serving Argon Elite was originally retired, the Argon military was left without an M3 fighter, that was until a group of Shipwrights in Omicron Lyrae put forward plans for a new type of ship. The Nova was born shortly afterwards, and after two years of testing, virtually all of the older Elite class ship had been replaced by this new craft.(||) Capable of holding powerful weaponry and armed with an aft turret, the Nova is bound to serve the Argon military for many years to come.

The Boron Hydra is a corvette-class ship, developed originally to give extra protection to convoys of freighters. The Hydra now sees widespread service both as part of regular sector patrols and as escorts for capital ships. Although many consider the Boron to be pacifists, this ship has been increasingly upgraded to pose a greater offensive threat to the enemies of the Boron Kingdom.

The Dragon is the Split's main corvette, which despite early development problems, has matured into a deadly warship, becoming a firm favourite of Split pilots and many privateers. It is generally considered to be one of most potent craft in its class.

This fast transport ship has been in service for many years now. The ship was originally built for slave transport, to ferry slaves from their point of capture to the factories where they would spend the rest of their days.(||) Now the ship is used to transport personnel from sector to sector. It is armed with adequate weaponry, but its main defence is speed.

The Nemesis is a compact but deadly corvette; the ship packs firepower comparable with a carrier. It has powerful shields and can carry Hornet missiles. Its speed compares well with fighters', which makes it a very capable escort ship.

The Demeter has been used for some years now, replacing the old Paranid Ganymede model. It has improved on all of its predecessor's systems.(||) This ship was first brought into service to serve only the Paranid Fleet, but later slowly replaced the Ganymede because of its speed to bring the Paranid Economy back to levels of the Argon and Boron.

The Osprey has undergone a significant redesign in recent years in response to pilots' complaints about its speed. Originally developed as a heavy corvette with a large cargo capacity, recent updates have sought to redress the balance between size, speed and firepower.

Originally developed by the Teladi and Paranid, the PSG has since been improved by the Paranid to be a powerful capital ship weapon, extremely useful for defending against multiple fighter targets. It works by sending out a compressed package, which reacts and expands, creating shockwaves of phased energy.

In recent years the Argon Agriculture Council has decided that it is unsafe to use Natural Fertiliser from the Argnu Cattle. This artificial fertiliser created by the AAC contains all the essential elements that plants need for growth, but eliminates the ones that are harmful to other life-forms.
