I cannot break the missile's lock!
(prefix to 803 )We are pleased that you contacted us.
(generic job)I have a task that would suit you well.
(combat mission)I look for a pilot who is not afraid of combat.
(I need a ship)I need a ship, graced by Menelaus!
(I need some wares)I need someone to collect some cargo and bring it back to me.
I seek protection, my journey may be perilous.
I must have a freighter pilot.
I wish to have someone removed, permanently.
I have a passenger who wishes for transport to another location.
I must have transport to another location.
I must get out of here, fast!
I require the services of a station-builder!
There are some items I need you to deliver.
I wish to locate someone, details will be provided.
I do indeed have another job for you.
Would you be kind enough to help me?.
Is there something here of interest to you?
Do you wish to see the details?
Would you like to have this job?
I shall send the information to you now.
I am sending the data you require now.
This mission should offer you no great challenge.
This may prove to involve a little skill on your part.
This will be anything but easy. Do not underestimate the challenge.
There will be little time involved in this mission's completion.
This mission demands both time and skill. Ensure you have both.
You must expect enemy ships en-route.
Please give police ships a wide berth on this mission.
Please give enemies a wide berth on this mission.
You have my thanks, I would not have succeeded without you.
You have done a truly excellent job.
I thank you for your help in this matter.
As always, you have proven to be more than capable. Thank you.
Good enough, but far from perfect. In future, try a little harder.
I am sending your reward now.
Your performance disgusts me. Leave! Now!
Aborting! Your mission is over. You have failed.
Such cowardice. Where do you run to? It matters not, I will find you eventually.
You are running short on time.
There is no more time. That's it.
(offensive action against mission object or actor)I do not understand. Have you completely lost your mind?
I cannot accept you, you lack experience.
You must have access to a combat ship for this mission.
You must have access to a transport ship for this.
You must have a jumpdrive installed.
You will not succeed without a transporter device.
Do not waste my time, please obtain one!
I have placed myself securely onboard.
I am not in the mood for a pleasure cruise! Fly faster!
Let me off, I require a pilot who actually knows how to fly.
You have delivered me safely. I thank you for your care.
I have no space in your ship! I must have more!
I cannot go with you without a cargo life support system.
I am not cargo! Get a passenger transport!
Delivery not yet complete. Awaiting further shipments.
We will not go far unless you have equipment, pilot!
What happened here, pilot? Did you lose your mind?
Push to intercept and eliminate all hostile ships.
Our progress is slow! We must regroup at headquarters!
Reinforcements are here. Let's make them count.
By the Queen's grace, reinforcements arrive through the (gate)
Menelaus be praised! We are happy to see you!
You do well. Travel onwards to base for repairs.
All ships! (Followed by command or information)
Follow and do as I do.
Protect my ship. Our safety is paramount.
There is no space in your hold. Empty your bays!
You will not have your cargo until you are docked.
We offer you no data until you dock!
Praise the Queen! The ship is here. Please dock at this station.
Is there a reason for the delay? Please complete your task!
We ask that you dock your ship.
Too far away! You must be closer, move forwards!
Be careful! You must not get too close!
Our books show little that would be of interest to you.
Menelaus praise you. We offer a token of appreciation for your work.
An illegal life-form has been detected on your ship. Boron request immediate release.
If you reconsider, we'll be waiting.
There would be no shame in another attempt.
You have the knack, it seems!
We do not like to be followed.
We will display the prices for you.
Atreus has regular work for you.
Work for Atreus, pilot. You will be rewarded.
Atreus' appreciates your continued service. Accept this reward.
Accept this token of Atreus' gratitude for your loyal service.
I can't believe it's not BoFu!
In the name of the Queen.. (sings)Anybody...find me, somebody to love.

page.title: Boron Border Patrol
page.t: The Boron gracefully request you leave this sector immediately. You are prohibited from entering all primary Boron sectors due to your poor status. Failure to do so will result in force being directed against you. You have one minute to comply with our wishes.
You have failed to comply with our order for you to leave all Boron prime sectors. Intercept vector authorised. With regret we will now neutralise your ship.
Warning! You are entering restricted military space. You are to reverse course immediately.

page.title: Split Variation 1
page.t: Split not enemy, target elsewhere pilot!
Split weapons systems online. Do not test us, pilot!
Split not afraid to fight. Last chance to live!
We show you how Split fight! We show you death!
Split under fire! Not about to die! Make help now!
Split take everything! Take your life!
Feel our fear! We must not die!
Shields gone, you not take Split life!
It seems you wish to die by our hand.
We have orders to destroy your ship, your fate is fading.
We will show you no mercy.
What do you demand of the Split?
We have no time for you! You go!
We will say nothing to the likes of you!
The Split are not responsible for such matters.
I bring shame on my family! Take my ship!
We offer you freight in exchange for life.
The Split are listening. What do you want of us?
Our honour is sullied by your voice. Silence!
We have no time! Busy! Go away!
You will have nothing from me. (Screams)Nothing!
You mock the Split? (screams)We will crush you!
You have already reached your destination!
We have no route for you! Find your own way!
The Split are honoured by your presence. Continue on to the
You carry illegal goods. The Split demand you drop cargo!
You have but one chance to comply or you will die!
We have scanned your ship. You are clean! You may go!
You fly with too little speed or too much weed.
No more! (screams)I want to leave... at the next dock!
You will give me everything! And quickly!
You will give me more! If you do not give, I will take!
Help me! I come under attack!
My honour will not be broken by this one, you will fight alone.
For honour and victory I will fight by your side!
I have damage to my hull! Damage increasing!
I have a worthy opponent on my tail. Cannot evade!
The reactor, it will soon explode!
There are too many, enough for all of us!
You will not escape! I will have my honour!
I bring shame on my family in my escape!
My honour is worth more than your soul, I take my leave!
I have work of much honour for you.
I search for a pilot who fights with honour.
I am looking for a ship worthy of the Split!
I want someone to pick up a shipment, bring it back!
I seek protection, my journey must not end in shame!
I seek someone willing to undertake an execution.
I hold a passenger requiring transport.
I seek transport onboard your ship.
I must take my leave of this place, fast.
A station must be built for me!
I have items you must deliver!
I have need to locate someone, perhaps you can help?
I require a keen and able worker.
Yes, another job awaits for you!
Would you like to see more details?
Do you want profit from this job?
I will transmit the data to you now.
Details coming through to you now.
The mission will be easy for the likes of you.
You may find things tricky, maybe.
The mission could be hard for the likes of you.
You will spend little time completing this mission.
There will be no quick results in this mission.
Enemies will be present during your journey.
Stay away from police patrols during this mission.
Stay away from enemies during this mission.
You honour me, I could not have done it without you.
You have performed an excellent job.
(Mission Complete)I give thanks for your assistance
(Mission Complete, recurring)Strength and honour! Your work has been superb again.
Good enough, but more effort would be useful.
Your payment comes through to you now.
That was far from what I expected. Shameful! Leave me!
Aborting! This mission has been a waste! Consider it over!
You bring shame upon yourself! I will find you!
Check your guidance and navigation systems.
You have very little time left. Do not waste it.
There is no more time. That's it.
What do you think you are doing? Stop this! Now!
Your experience is far from what I require, get more!
Your must have a combat ship to continue.
You must have a ship with transport capability to continue.
You will not go very far without a jumpdrive.
You will find yourself unable to complete the mission without a transporter device.
You are not flying a funeral barge. I need speed!
My choice of pilot is shameful, I wish to get off this miserable ship.
We have docked. I will leave now!
I will be crushed to soja husk! I need more space onboard!
No cargo life support system? No journey! Get one!
I will not fly with you! Not in that! Get a passenger transport!
Cargo shipment incomplete. Awaiting further deliveries.
You will conquer nothing without equipment.
This does not bode well for you, pilot.
Intercept at full thrust, destroy all enemy ships!
We must withdraw! Regroup at base!
In the name of the Patriarch, combat support is here!
We will prevail! Reinforcements jumping in from the (gate)
Pilot! We have enemy ships coming in through the (gate)
Excellent! Proceed to base for repairs.
Do not stray from this position.
All ships! (Followed by command or information)
Move quickly! You will intercept now!
We see mines! You watch closely!
You will ensure our safety! Protect from enemies!
You must make space! No more cargo will fit!
You will dock to get wares. Cannot transfer until then!
It is not safe to send now! Dock and we will deliver the data!
You have ship! Dock here now!
Delays will not be tolerated. Get it done!
You should move back! Too close! Too close!
There is no work of honour at this time.
You honour Split once more. You deserve much. Take this!
Split scans show an illegal passenger. Release him immediately or be destroyed.
Return later if you have change of mind.
Strong Arms has regular work for you. You will be wise to accept.
Strong Arms needs pilots like you for regular tasks.
You continue to impress Strong Arms. Take this token of our thanks.
Your loyalty to Strong Arms is worthy of recognition. Accept this gift!
You talkin' to me!? You talking to me!? I don't see anyone else here, so you must be talking to me!
Split say, head not a raisin! You go away!
(Do not speak - Tutorial lines for Instructor pilot [COM])
Would you like to learn basic pilot skills?
Good. If you want to stop at any time then just tell me. You can contact me through the Comm Menu. Let's cover the basics first: Movement.
Accelerate to 10 metres per second by pressing the acceleration key.
If you hold the decelerate button you will reverse. Reverse to minus 5 metres per second.
I have ejected a crate, it's next to me.
Now target me and open the Communication Menu.
This is the main form of interaction with objects. You can command ships, request docking permission or ask for directions by opening up the Communication Menu.
At stations you will be able to trade goods, look for missions and upgrade ships. (Pause)Now undock from the station.
I have ejected another crate close by.
You can use missiles too. Target the crate, select a missile and launch.
Look at your shield indicator. If you are hit your shields will reduce. Once your shield energy is depleted your hull will start to take damage. Shields will regenerate automatically, hull will not.
Be careful as there are some weapons which are designed to bypass shields, lower shields or disrupt systems.
Not bad, I think you have the basics. You will pick up the rest as you go.

page.title: Split Variation 2
page.t: You hit Split! Split hope for mistake but ready for battle!
Split not about to run from likes of you! Weapons armed!
Battle now begin! Your life over!
Help Split! Ship under attack! Shields not last long!
Your life will end! Split show no mercy!
Split lose honour! Death must not follow!
Split not want end! Leave Split alone!
Do you know who you deal with? Watch your fire!
We do not tolerate such insolence. Cease fire!
Be proud that you die by our hand.
I will not talk to the likes of you, smooth-skin!
Do not bother us now! Much work!
Our information is ours! Not yours!
Nothing to do with the Split!
You will have nothing from me. *screeches* Nothing!
You go away! We have nothing for you!
You bring shame on our ship!
I have nothing! My honour, my ship, yours!
My cargo is yours. You go away!
For what reason do you contact this Split Commander?
You will die screaming for mercy! You shall have none! (screams)None!
Our time is not yours! We are busy! Leave us!
You dare ask question of the Split! We give you nothing!
What is this surrender of which you speak?
You will mark waypoint at the
You are no navigator! Already there, stupid!
We have no path! No knowledge!
We will readily assist you, please travel onwards to the
You have bad cargo! Drop cargo now! Now pilot!
We give you last warning before Split fire upon your ship!
Our scans show nothing! You are clean! You can go now!
No Family would ever take you as pilot. You are slower than Argnu.
I waste my time in travel with you. I will go when you dock!
You will honour us with your wares! Drop cargo! Now!
And now you will honour us with the rest! All of it! Now!
I come under weapons fire! This one tests us! Assist! Assist!
Your battle is your own, not mine!
Your battle is my battle, I will honour the code.
My shame is yours, forgive me!
My ship is under attack! Attempting to evade!
Damage to my hull, much damage!
The reactor has reached critical mass, imminent explosion!
There are too many, too many!
I smell your fear. How would you wish to die?
I must leave you! Until we meet again!
I am not bound by your rules of engagement. My battle ends here.
An enemy missile has acquired my ship!
(prefix to 803 )The hour is truly upon us!
(prefix to 803 )You honour us with your greeting.
There is work for you, perhaps of much interest.
I look for a pilot who is not afraid to die in combat.
I search for a ship, worthy of the Family!
I need a courier worthy of collecting and returning my goods.
I wish to employ a pilot to protect me for my journey.
I am looking for a pilot experienced in freight transport.
I require a pilot who deals in death as well as honour.
I have a passenger who requires relocation.
I must have transport, aboard your ship!
I need to disappear from here, quickly!
I need someone who understands station-building.
There is a shipment of items I need delivered!
I require the skills of a bounty hunter.
I need a worker able to follow orders, with pride.
Yes, there is further work for you!
Have I provided something of interest?
Would you like to see more details?
Do you wish to take this job?
Details are being sent through to you now.
The mission will not tax you.
You may find the mission tricky.
Perhaps you will face difficulty on this mission.
You will spend little time completing this mission.
There will be no quick conclusion to your work.
Enemies will be present during your journey.
Stay away from police patrols during this mission.
Stay away from enemies during this mission
I salute you! I could not have done it alone.
You have done well, an excellent job.
I offer my gratitude for your assistance.
As ever, you have worked with honour.
This will have to do, your lack of effort is clear. Try harder next time.
Your payment is being wired now.
That was far from what I expected. Shameful! Leave me!
Aborting! This mission has been wasted on you. Consider it over!
Where do you run to? No matter, you will not get far.
Check your guidance and navigation systems.
You have very little time left. Do not waste it.
There is no more time. That's it.
What do you think you are doing? Stop this! Now!
Your experience is greatly lacking. I need more.
Your must have a combat ship to continue.
You must have a ship with transport capability to continue.
You will not go very far without a jumpdrive.
You will find yourself unable to complete the mission without a transporter device.
Take me to my destination and be quick about it!
We must go faster! Increase your thrust!
I am finished here, let me off.
Our journey is over. Thank you.
I cannot fit onboard, you ask too much of me!
You must get a cargo life support system! Without it I cannot go with you!
You think I will fly in that? Think again! Get a passenger transport!
Is your ship usually so empty? You need equipment!
Split transfers wares to your ship.
You have angered Split with your stupidity!
Plot intercept course and destroy all hostile ships!
Victory must wait! Fall back and regroup at the command base!
Split offer support. All ships are combat-ready.
We will conquer all! Support ships moving in from the (gate)
Welcome! Your presence gives us much joy!
Look! Enemy ships jumping in through the (gate)
You honour us! Return to base for repairs.
All ships! (Followed by command or information)
Follow my lead, stay in range.
Keep this ship safe! Watch for enemies!
Clear some space, your bays are full!
No transfer of wares until you dock!
You will have nothing until you dock! Data will then be yours!
Dock ship at this station! Now!
I hope you are not delaying intentionally. Complete your mission!
Too far away! Move closer now!
No work here! You go away!
Your continued service honours the Split! Take our reward!
Split security scans show illegal life-form. Release it immediately or face consequences.
Bear us in mind, if you reconsider.
That would be a mistake, don't do it!
Strong Arms needs your service. You will be rewarded.
Strong Arms has regular work for you.
You impress Strong Arms again. Take this with thanks.
You are worthy of Strong Arms' recognition. Take this gift!
No, pilot... Family Whi is a sector, not an entertainment system!
All hail the mighty Egosoft..argh Rhonkar!

page.title: Split Border Patrol
page.t: Split to Pilot! You leave sector immediately! Not allowed to be here! You not have rank high enough to enter all primary Split sectors. Failure to leave means we use force against you! You have one minute to comply.
You do not comply with order to leave all Split Prime sectors. We set intercept vector for your ship! We attack now!
Warning! You are entering restricted military space. You will reverse course immediately.

page.title: Paranid Variation 1
page.t: You dare sully our shields with your fire?
We give you a chance to leave and save your wretched hide.
You show little regard for your pitiful life. A final warning we give you.
In holy light do we strike upon you!
Our vessel requires assistance! Under attack we are!
Your miserable soul shall soon know darkness!
Our future grows dark in your shadow.
This is not my time. Cease your attack unholy one.
Your weapons grace our shields. I trust, by mistake.
These are my final words, you will die soon should you persist.
You have little time to repent, death awaits.
Your voice is as bad as your stench. Foul indeed.
Your request for attention is denied.
We do not avail ourselves to one such as you!
I have no concern for such matters.
You dare defile our ship with your fire?
You leave me with nothing, unholy wretch.
I offer you my cargo in the hope you choke on it.
As Commander of this ship I will listen to you, briefly.
You will have no counsel from us unholy one!
This is not the time for questions. Leave us!
We have no wish to offer a response, unholy one.
Your pitiful games amuse me, for now...
The Paranid confirm the light shines from the
The unholy one is already where you wish to be.
The light does not shine for such a place.
We will help you Holy one, your journey lies beyond the
The unholy one taints us with illegal goods. Drop them! Now!
We offer you one final warning before you are cleansed.
The unholy one is curiously free of illegal cargo. You may leave.
You would be wise to make haste. Time is a luxury I do not have.
Your pitiful ship does not satisfy me. I shall leave you shortly.
Your cargo would be safer in my hold!
Ah, a blessing offered to us. We thank you!
Your pitiful life remains in peril. We will take more from your hold.
My ship comes under fire from this pitiful wretch. Assist me!
I shall do no such thing. The wretch is yours.
Together we will cleanse this one of cargo and life.
Pitiful wretch, I curse your miserable form.
You have all the intelligence of a Maja snail.
May light shine along your path.
I have been honoured by your help.
Engaging our enemy! Victory will be mine!
I fear I am under attack.
It seems my shields fail me. A pity.
My hull takes great damage as we speak.
This one shows much courage, I cannot shake his grasp.
There are too many, tonight we dine in hell!
I will burn the flesh from your bones!
I pray for your impending demise.
My time with you ends. I bid you farewell.
The light calls unto me. I escape!
A missile locks onto my ship!
(prefix to 803 )You show respect in contacting us.
(generic job)I have work for you, if you are capable.
I need a pilot who shows valour in combat.
I require a vessel worthy of the Paranid!
I require a courier able to collect and deliver my cargo.
The light alone will not protect me, I require a pilot of great combat skill.
I require a pilot able to handle freight.
I require a pilot willing to spill the blood of my adversary.
I have someone who seeks passage from here.
I seek passage from this place.
I must take my leave of this place, immediately.
I require a station to be built, would you be able to assist?
I have items for transportation; you may be suitable.
I seek to establish contact with someone long since lost to me.
I seek a worker who displays courage.
Yes, I have further work for one such as you.
Your help is in great need.
Do you hold interest in this matter?
Is this a job you wish to take?
I will send the information you require now.
The details are being sent to you now.
Here is what we need, unholy one.
You should have no problems with this mission.
You will need some intelligence for this mission.
Your pitiful mind may not be capable of dealing with the requirements of this mission.
There should be little delay in completing this mission.
This job will involve time, much of it. Show patience.
Enemies will trouble you along your path.
I thank you, completion would not have been possible without you.
You have proved yourself worthy of our respect.
I thank you for your assistance.
You have my gratitude. As usual, your work is outstanding.
That will do, but I am far from impressed with your efforts. Try harder next time.
Your money is being transferred now.
Pitiful wretch, my faith in you is misplaced. Leave me!
Aborting! Mission over! You are unworthy of my time!
You can run, but you cannot hide! I will find you, miserable wretch!
You would be wise to check your guidance.
Time is running low. Do not waste it.
You have run out of time. Cease operations.
What do you think you are doing? (outrage/anger)How dare you!
I asked for an experienced pilot. You are anything but!
You will need a combat ship, no less.
You will need a transport ship, no less.
You will require a jumpdrive, proceeding without one is futile.
You must have a transporter device.
Do not waste my time! Get one! Now!
You have no concept of speed or time. Make haste!
Your pitiful attempt at flying disgusts me. I wish to get off, now!
My time with you has come to an end. Good bye.
You dare expect me to squeeze myself into your ship? I need more room!
The light alone will not sustain me. I must have a cargo life support system.
I will require a passenger transport, nothing less.
We confirm your shipment as received.
You would be wise to equip your ship. It is pitiful.
The wares are now being transferred.
What happened pilot? Have you lost your mind?
Take an intercept course and deal with all hostile ships.
Luck is not with us. Fall back and regroup at base.
May we offer you salvation in this battle. Lead us to your targets!
The light shines brightly, reinforcements aid us from the (gate)
You honour us with your presence!
The battle comes to us. Enemy ships arrive through the (gate)
You do well, unholy one. Dock at the base for repairs.
Make no move, here we will hold our position.
All ships! (Followed by command or information)
Unholy one! (Followed by command or information)
Follow my lead, do not fear!
Our luck changes, I see incoming (933-936)
Lay your mark and intercept. Maximum speed!
You would be wise to avoid those mines.
The unholy one will hold guard against our ship.
It seems you require more space, your cargo hold is full.
Your wares will remain with us until you dock at this station.
Your data will remain ours until you dock.
You would be wise to dock the ship at this station.
Is there a reason for this delay? Hurry up, lowerlife!
You would be wise to dock your ship, pilot!
You would be wise to move closer, you are too far away.
You would be wise to keep your distance! You are too close!
There is no work for one such as you at this time.
Your service continues to shine brightly. We honour you with this gift.
Paranid scan detects illegal life-form. Lowerlife will release it or die.
The offer may be repeated, if you return.
I will allow you to view the prices.
Duke's has work for a wretch like you. You will be rewarded.
Duke's Buccaneers offers regular work to you.
Your service to Duke's cause is worthy of this gift. Take it with thanks.
Duke's Buccaneers recognise your continued service. Take this reward!
(Plot lines for Otmanckstras [COM] Hub strand, scene 3)
You require my services? State your business, unholy entity.
I do know this unholy creature, yes. My services do not come cheap. I require 15,000,000 Credits. I will gladly assist the Boron scientist if you provide the Credits.
(Do not speak - Tutorial lines for Instructor pilot [COM])
Greetings, lowerlife. Would you like to learn the basics of flying?
Good. If you want to stop at any time then just tell me. You can contact me through the Comm Menu. Let's cover the basics first: Movement.
Accelerate to 10 metres per second by pressing the acceleration key.
If you hold the decelerate button you will reverse. Reverse to minus 5 metres per second.
I have ejected a crate, it's next to me.
Now target me and open the Communication Menu.
This is the main form of interaction with objects. You can command ships, request docking permission or ask for directions by opening up the Communication Menu.
At stations you will be able to trade goods, look for missions and upgrade ships. (Pause)Now undock from the station.
I have ejected another crate close by.
You can use missiles too. Target the crate, select a missile and launch.
Look at your shield indicator. If you are hit your shields will reduce. Once your shield energy is depleted your hull will start to take damage. Shields will regenerate automatically, hull will not.
Be careful as there are some weapons which are designed to bypass shields, lower shields or disrupt systems.
This lowerlife appears to have the basics. You will pick up the rest as you go.

page.title: Paranid Variation 2
page.t: You would be wise to hold your fire, lowerlife.
Your charge upon us is pitiful. A final warning do we give.
What is ours is not yours. Think carefully lowerlife.
May our fire cleanse you in death!
Calling for righteous defence of our holy ship.
Surrounded by your stench do we beg for mercy.
Paranid ship fouled by unholy aggression. Shields failing!
You dare fire upon the Paranid? Pitiful wretch!
Our weapons have you marked. Choose your fate, pilot.
Reap the storm of our holy fire, pilot.
What do you wish to speak of?
You defile our peace, wretched one!
We have much to deal with, leave us!
(Laughs)The two-eyes are so full of humour.
Your pitiful life will soon come to an end.
Take my cargo! I curse your wretched ways!
Bridge Commander speaking. Our time is not yours to waste. Speak quickly!
Our words are of no use to your miserable soul.
There is no time for your foolish words. Be gone!
Your questions shall go unanswered, (mutters)pitiful wretch...
I will take your request under advisement and THEN kill you!
You would be wise to journey to the
You are one dimension short of a paradox. You are already where you wished to travel to.
The path is shrouded in darkness. We know not of it.
To bring light to your path, travel onwards to the
Pitiful wretch, did you think you could escape our scans? Drop your cargo. Now!
You would be wise to comply, our weapons are not so forgiving.
Let us not keep you. Your vessel is pure. Journey onwards.
Is there any hope for your kind? From this journey, I think not. Make haste!
Enough! Dock so I may find a pilot who holds skill greater than a drunken Argnu.
Allow me to lighten your load a little. You have much that I need.
There is hope for you yet. Your cargo is gratefully accepted.
You would surely offer us more if you knew of your impending death.
It seems I will not survive this battle alone, come to me!
Show honour not fear, the battle is yours alone. Prevail or die.
I will take your side. We will prevail.
I spit my every breath at you!
Your soul has neither hope, nor light.
You honour me with your help.
My ship suffers greatly under this mortal fire.
My shields hold little strength. Soon they will fall.
I am taking hull damage, soon too much to bear.
I fear this one is bound too close, I cannot evade.
The reactor will soon reach critical mass, and explode.
There are too many, we must not count, we must fight!
May it burn in the fires for eternity!
I cast unto you my wrath!
Walk into the light, fear not the fire, it burns but briefly.
My time here is over. Fare thee well!
I would be wise to reconsider such an untimely martyrdom.
Curses! A missile is locked onto my ship!
(prefix to 803 )I am honoured that you called.
I have something to which your skills could be applied.
I am in need of a combat pilot.
I need a ship untainted by one such as you!
I require the delivery of various items.
I have no wish to die in this wretched place, my journey requires protection.
I must have a freight pilot
I seek someone skilled in the art of assassination.
I have a passenger, one who requires transport.
I need transportation, the ship must be worthy of my status.
I must bring my time here to an end, quickly!
I shall have the services of a station-builder, perhaps you!
I seek a courier worthy of dealing with a shipment requiring collection and return.
I wish to trace the location of a certain individual.
I require someone of both courage and honour to work for me.
Yes, there is another job to which you would be suited.
Do you think the job worthy of seeing further details?
Do you think yourself capable of taking the job?
The information needed is being transmitted to you now.
I shall send the details to you now.
Given your skills, this mission will offer no great challenge to you.
You will find challenges during this mission, none insurmountable.
Given your skills, this mission may prove to hold great difficulty.
Given your skills, this mission should not take long.
This job is far from short in duration.
There will be hostile forces present during your journey.
Be wary of police on this mission.
Be aware of enemies on this mission.
This would not have been possible without you. I thank you.
You have done well, an excellent job if I may say so.
I thank you. Your work remains exemplary.
Acceptable, perhaps. I expected more from you; try harder next time.
Your reward will be with you shortly!
I have rarely seen such a display of ineptitude! Get out of my sight!
Miserable wretch, you have failed! Mission over!
Run, coward, run! No sector is safe, I will find you, I WILL find you!
You have very little time, make haste!
Your time has come to an end.
By the light, you test me! I curse your soul for this!
Experience in navigation is essential, you have no such experience.
A combat ship is essential for this.
You will require a ship capable of transport for this.
I am onboard. All is secure.
I have seen Maja snails move faster. Make haste.
You bring me closer to death than my destination. I wish to leave this wretched ship.
I must depart, our journey has come to an end.
Unholy one, you must provide me with more space.
You will require a life support system to take passengers onboard!
You dare offer me passage in that? I must have a passenger transport!
Deliveries are incomplete. We await completion.
No ship will last long without suitable equipment. Buy some.
There is no sense to this. What happened here pilot?
Engage intercept course at full thrust. Eliminate all hostile ships.
We would be wise to regroup and fall back to base for now.
Support is here! Let us burn these unholy wretches!
We have much to be thankful for, reinforcements join us from the (gate)
We are delighted that you join us.
We detect enemy ships incoming through the (gate)
You show promise. Move to base for repairs.
We will hold here, no more, no less.
All ships! (Followed by command or information)
Remain close to me. Follow my lead!
Set course to intercept. Thrusters at maximum!
Those mines will not take kindly to contact. Show caution.
There must be no attack against our ship!
You would be wise to empty your hold, your cargo needs more space.
Your cargo will not be transferred until you dock at our station.
The data you require will remain with us until you dock.
Please dock the ship at the station immediately.
What is keeping you? Get going!
Your ship would do well to dock.
Your distance concerns us. Move closer.
You are far too close! Move away!
You would be wise to seek work elsewhere. We have nothing of interest to you.
Our faith in the unholy one is restored. Your loyal service will not go unrewarded.
Paranid Security detect illegal passenger. Unholy one will release it or die.
Return later if you desire, the offer may still stand.
Good! You appear to have it!
That's the way it should be done!
Are you following us, unholy one?
I will display for you the prices.
Duke's offers regular tasks to challenge you.
Duke's has some work for you.
Your loyal service to Duke's deserves a token of our gratitude.
Duke's Buccaneers wish to reward your loyal service. Take this!
Unholy One, I need your clothes, your boots, and your motorcycle.

page.title: Paranid Border Patrol
page.t: Unholy one, you would be wise to leave this sector immediately. Your current status prohibits you from entering all primary Paranid sectors. Failure to do so will result in lethal force being directed against you. You have one minute to comply.
You have failed to comply with our order to leave all Paranid Prime sectors. Intercept vector authorised. Prepare to feel the wrath of the Priest Duke.
Warning! You are entering restricted military space. You must reverse course immediately.

page.title: Teladi Variation 1
page.t: Teladi choose profit over war, check your weapons.
You will lose much profit, our weapons are armed.
You will lose your life long before we lose profit!
You now lose profit, lose life!
Teladi vessel under attack, request assistance!
There will be no more profit for you! Only death!
You take our profits and soon our lives. Reconsider!
Defence systems failing. Teladi need help!
We have authority to terminate your vessel. Cease fire!
You lose everything, ship, profit, life!
We have no time for talk, only profit!
There is no profit in answering you.
We hold no profit in such matters.
Profit comes first. You deserve nothing!
You have no command over us!
We have authority to protect our vessel.
Take my ship. I will profit another time!
Our profit is yours. Take what we give.
Teladi Company vessel opens channel, you have our attention.
There will be no more discussion. Your profit ends here!
Return to me another time. I am busy.
There is no profit in response. You have no value.
You are indeed brave, and stupid, perhaps soon dead too!
We would ask you to look towards the
We confirm your coordinates, you have already arrived.
We have no knowledge of what you refer to.
The Teladi would be delighted to assist, please fly to the
You profit with illegal goods, drop them or suffer the consequences!
This warning is final. Drop your wares or you will profit no more!
We find your cargo to be of good standing. Carry on!
You must fly faster! I lose profit in your presence!
I have lost much in this venture onboard your ship. I will leave at your next port!
Your profit will be ours. Unload your freight now!
One is too little. Profit comes in volume!
I have plenty of space onboard. Unload your freight! Now!
Help! I come under attack from our target! Save profit!
I have too much to lose in such madness. Fight alone!
I will come to your aid, together we will profit in this one's death.
I have intense weapons fire in my area.
I am under attack, under attack!
Our shields are about to fail!
Soon all will be lost, my hull is taking damage.
I have no chance to shake them!
The reactor is close to critical mass, little time do we have!
There are too many, there will be much profit in their deaths.
This one I have dealt with.
I will enjoy watching your corpse burn upon the solar winds.
(fleeing)Marking exit vector. I save my final breath for another world.
(fleeing)No profit, no ship, no life, this is not for me.
(prefix to 803 )We thank you for your call.
I have work for you, perhaps of much profit.
I need a pilot with combat experience.
I need a ship, worthy of profit!
I need a pilot able to collect and deliver my cargo.
I require protection, profit must not be lost!
I require a freighter pilot, a good one!
I seek someone willing to dispatch an enemy.
I have someone in need of transport from this location.
I seek profit, and the services of a station-builder.
I have wares in need of delivery. Please assist.
I am in search of one that is lost to me.
I require new workers within my company.
Yes, there is another job for you.
Have I provided something of interest?
Would you like to see further details?
Do you wish to profit from this job?
I shall transmit the data to you now.
Details are being sent through to you now.
The mission will require no great effort on your part.
You may find things somewhat tricky.
Unless I have underestimated you, this may prove to be a difficult mission.
You will spend little time completing this mission.
There will be no quick conclusion to your work.
Enemies will be present during your journey.
Avoid police patrols during this mission.
Stay away from enemies on this mission.
You have my thanks, I could not have done it without you.
You have performed without fault, an excellent job.
I offer my thanks for your assistance.
As ever, your work has been superb.
This will have to do, your lack of effort troubles me. Try harder next time.
Your payment is being wired now.
That was far from what I expected. Shameful! Leave me!
Aborting! This mission has been wasted on you. Consider it over!
Where do you run to? No matter, you will not get far.
Check your guidance and navigation systems.
You have very little time left. Do not waste it.
There is no more time. That's it.
What do you think you are doing? Stop this! Now!
I apologise, your experience is far from what I require.
Your must have a combat ship to continue.
You must have a ship with transport capability to continue.
You will not go very far without a jumpdrive.
You will be unable to complete the mission without a transporter device.
Take me to my destination and to profitsss!
Profit waits for no one. Move faster!
Your navigation skills do not please me, I wish to depart.
You have served me well. I appreciate your transportation.
For our journey to proceed I must have more room.
Passengers will not survive without life support in the cargo hold.
There will be no journey unless you provide a passenger transport!
Awaiting further shipments to complete order.
This ship needs much in the way of equipment.
What do you call this? Sensible? I think not.
Take an intercept course. All hostile ships must be destroyed.
There is no profit in this attack, we must fall back and regroup at HQ.
Teladi Company Profit Protection force available for combat. Please mark your targets.
We will profit greatly, reinforcements join us from the (gate)
We thank you for joining with us!
Check your targets! Enemy ships inbound through the (gate)
Excellent work, pilot. Continue to base for repairs.
We must hold at this point.
All ships! (Followed by command or information)
Those mines will bring our journey to an end quickly. Avoid them.
There is no more space left, please clear some cargo.
There will be no cargo transfer until you are docked at this station.
There can be no exchange until you dock.
Engage docking protocols for this station.
Your delay wastes profit! Get moving!
There will be no progress until you dock.
The distance between you is too much, move inwards.
You are too close! You must move back now!
There is neither work nor profit here.
Your loyal service brings much profit to us! This reward is yours!
Teladi security scans show an illegal passenger. We demand release immediately.
You may profit from returning later, should you change your mind.
PTNI offers you regular work. Bring us all profit!
Work is available for PTNI, we advise you to consider.
Your loyal service to PTNI is worthy of a token of our gratitude.
PTNI rewards your loyal service in sure hope of more profit. Take it!
I thank you for your business. Show me the money!
(Plot lines for Hurilis Libaras Gantos IV [COM] kha'ak strand, scene 4)
Dispatching bomber squadron on intercept course with the Kha'ak base. You must protect these ships, prevent loss of profitss.
(Do not speak - Tutorial lines for Instructor pilot [COM])
Good profitss, pilot. Would you like to learn the basics of flying?
Good. If you want to stop at any time then just tell me. You can contact me through the Comm Menu. Let's cover the basics first: Movement.
Accelerate to 10 metres per second by pressing the acceleration key.
If you hold the decelerate button you will reverse. Reverse to minus 5 metres per second.
I have ejected a crate, it's next to me.
Now target me and open the Communication Menu.
This is the main form of interaction with objects. You can command ships, request docking permission or ask for directions by opening up the Communication Menu.
At stations you will be able to trade goods, look for missions and upgrade ships. (Pause)Now undock from the station.
I have ejected another crate close by.
You can use missiles too. Target the crate, select a missile and launch.
Look at your shield indicator. If you are hit your shields will reduce. Once your shield energy is depleted your hull will start to take damage. Shields will regenerate automatically, hull will not.
Be careful as there are some weapons which are designed to bypass shields, lower shields or disrupt systems.
Gooood, you appear to have the basics. There is more to learn as you go.

page.title: Teladi Variation 2
page.t: Your ship fires upon us for no reason.
Teladi seek one last chance for profit before war.
We give you our final warning. Profit from this you will not.
Teladi will not allow this. We will fight for profits!
Vessel of profit is under fire. Please save Teladi!
Ours is not yours! Your death will be our profit!
Thief, in our death you take everything, and nothing!
Shields no more! Somebody help Teladi!
Are you so poor as to not be able to afford decent weaponry?
You have this final message to consider before death.
Your death will be our profit.
The Teladi cannot assist at this time.
This does not concern the Teladi.
There will be no negotiation with you!
Nothing will come to you, pilot!
No profit will come of your venture!
There is no honour in your profit. Take my ship.
We wish for life, profit is yours... for now.
Teladi Company commander confirms your communication. How may we profit?
No communications pilot! You will pay dearly now!
Now is the time to profit. Not talk! Leave me!
You will receive no knowledge from us pilot!
Your stupidity is indeed legendary. We congratulate you.
You have already completed your journey. Your destination is here, pilot.
We have no entries for your request.
I would be honoured to assist you, please continue through the
Teladi Sector Patrol confirms your cargo to be illegal. Unload your wares, pilot!
Your compliance is essential to your survival! Eject your cargo, or die!
We have no reason to keep you, your cargo is clean. Journey on!
Do you have any concept of time? Of profit? I think not! Hurry!
I have had enough of your miserable ship. Let me off at your next port!
You will share your profits with me. Your cargo will be mine!
Is this but a sample? Surely you have more. Much more!
I said I wanted more. Do not test me!
Our target chooses to stand strong. We must fight harder!
We will lose much from this. I must save what I have.
There is much to gain from this battle. I will assist!
May your cargo bays always be full.
Our shields will not protect us for much longer!
My ship sustains hull damage as we speak.
They are locked to my six, unable to evade!
The reactor is about to explode!
There are too many, let us profit from their demise.
Remember me, I will be the last thing you see before your world ends.
I leave you now. This moment is not worthy of my death.
With such ease does a good fight turn bad. I take my leave.
(prefix to 803 )It pleases us that you called.
I have a profit opportunity for you.
I search for a pilot willing to fight for profit!
I seek a courier able to handle a shipment of cargo, collect and return.
I need a pilot capable of protecting my assets.
I need a pilot willing to handle freight.
I have a passenger in need of relocation.
I require transport from this area.
I need to escape from here, immediately!
The services of a station-builder are required, I will pay you well.
I have goods in need of transport, will you help?
I am trying to locate someone, will you be able to help?
I search for pilots willing to work on my behalf.
Yes, I have further work to which you may profit from.
Do you see profit in this?
Are further details of use to you?
Would you choose to take further profit from this job?
The information you require is being transmitted now.
Further details are being patched into your systems now.
The mission is anything but difficult.
You might encounter some tricky moments.
This mission may prove to be quite hard.
Little time will be wasted in completing this mission.
The work involved will not be completed quickly.
Your path will attract the attention of enemies.
Remain clear of police patrols on this mission.
Steer clear of enemies during this mission.
My gratitude is yours. It would not have been possible without you.
Your performance has been excellent. I congratulate you.
Your assistance has my heartfelt thanks.
I thank you, superb effort once again.
Acceptable, perhaps. Your efforts could have been much better however.
The transfer of payment has been initiated.
Pathetic being! I should have known better than to employ you. Get out of my sight!
You had better run, much profit have you lost me.
Timer has marked down to zero. You're out.
Your actions make no sense! You lose profit!
I am sorry, experience is essential, yours is lacking.
A ship capable of combat is essential.
A ship with transport options is essential.
Without a jumpdrive this mission will not continue.
Without a transporter device this mission will fail.
(Passenger on board)Do not waste time! Take me from here now!
You have more than one thruster setting, use it.
I have no time for this, let me off your ship.
Profit be with you. I am grateful for the journey taken.
I cannot continue with you unless you make room onboard.
You passengers will soon die without cargo life support.
I cannot travel unless you provide a passenger transport.
Shipment not yet complete. Awaiting further deliveries.
Your ship lies empty. You must install equipment!
This is far from what we had hoped for.
Engage an intercept vector, full speed. Eliminate all hostiles.
There is no profit in this. Regroup and fall back to HQ.
Reinforcements are here. Our forces are ready to assist you.
We have support coming in from the (gate)
The Teladi Company salutes you! It is good that you join us!
Shields at maximum! Enemy ships incoming through the (gate)
Good work, pilot. Dock at the base for any repairs that you need.
All ships! (Followed by command or information)
Remain in range, follow my lead.
Pilot, be aware that we have incoming (933-936)
Full thrust, mark vector and intercept, now!
We have mines within range, navigate with care.
We must remain intact. Guard our ship.
The cargo will not fit. Please unload some wares.
Please dock in order that we may transfer the wares.
The data will not be delivered until your ship is docked securely.
Time is money and you waste both! Complete your mission!
Your ship will need to be docked.
You are too far, you must get closer!
Stop! You must not get any closer to that!
You will receive nothing from us, work remains quiet.
We thank you for your continued support of the Teladi Company, accept our reward with pride.
Teladi scans reveal you have an unregistered life-form onboard. Release this person immediately or face peril.
If you change your mind, profit still awaits you here.
Another attempt may bring you profit.
There is no profit in following usss!
These are the best prices available.
PTNI offers you regular profit opportunities!
There is much you can do to help PTNI. Think of the profits.
You serve PTNI well. This token of our gratitude cannot be declined.
PTNI acknowledges your service and offers you this reward.
Docking granted. Come on down! The price is right!

page.title: Teladi Border Patrol
page.t: This is Teladi Company vessel to Pilot. Leave this sector immediately. Your current standing prohibits you from entering all primary Teladi sectors. Should you choose not to do so, you will lose more than profit! Lethal force will be used against you. You have one minute to comply.
You have failed to adhere to our order to leave all Teladi Prime sectors. Authorisation to neutralise your ship has been given. Your time has come to an end here.
Warning! You are entering restricted military space. You will reverse course immediately.

page.title: Boardingcrew Variation 1
page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
(cutting noise)We're struggling here, this hull is really tough.
Team, check your weapons. Prepare for assault.
We can't penetrate the hull - aborting mission. Suit up, men, time for a swim.(FAILURE CONDITION)
OK, team... Keep your eyes open.
Argh... (lots of fighting noise over dying marine)
(lots of fighting noise)We're running low on ammo!
(lots of fighting noise)We're taking heavy casualties!
Stand clear! I'm going to blow the hatch!(pause followed by bang/explosion)
(lots of fighting noise)Cover me! I'm reloading!
(sound of laser fire)We've come up against laser sentries!
We've come up against a forcefield!
They're using a new encryption protocol!
(shooting noise)The safety's been re-engaged, we've failed!(FAILURE CONDITION)
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Hull's going critical! Get back to the pods!
Move it, men! Those pods are your ticket home!
The route back to the pods is blocked. Find an airlock!

page.title: Boardingcrew Variation 2
page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
Make sure you keep those shields down!
(cutting noise)Almost through, just a couple more metres.
(cutting noise)This hull is pretty thick... We're having a tough time here.
Marines, ready your weapons and standby.
Commencing equalisation... It should only take a few seconds.
We can't get through the hull plating. We're going to have to abort. Suit up, ladies! Get swimming!(FAILURE CONDITION)
(Sound of combat/laser fire)Man down! Man down!
(lots of fighting noise)Watch your angles, Marines!
Noooo! (lots of fighting noise over dying marine)
(lots of fighting noise)Charge packs are almost depleted!
(lots of fighting noise)This is not good... Not good!
(lots of fighting noise)Give me some covering fire!
Fire in the hole! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
Get a charge on that hatch! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
(sound of laser fire)We have laser sentries here!
We have a forcefield, find a way round it!
We're at the core... Locating control panel.
Taking down the safeties....OK, got it!
We have a problem! This is a new encryption algorithm.
Argh, we're locked out! The safety is re-enabled!(FAILURE CONDITION)
That's it! We've done it! (aside)Team, go check for other tangos.
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Get back to the pods! She's gonna blow!
Let's get moving, ladies! No time for gossip!
We can't get back to the pods! Suit up and find an airlock, men!
We're clear! I hope everyone made it.

page.title: Boardingcrew Variation 3
page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
Keep the shields down or this will be for nothing.
(cutting noise)Sheesh, this hull's tougher than Argnu hide!
Control, this is team leader. Weapons ready and standing by.
Standby, marines!...We're through! Move it! Move it!
We'll have to abort - zero hull-penetration. No fuel left in the pod, so we're taking a swim.(FAILURE CONDITION)
(Sound of combat/laser fire)We have a 'man down' here!
(lots of fighting noise)Careful, marines! Check your fire!
(lots of fighting noise)Someone toss me a clip!
(lots of fighting noise)Pulling back, we're being overrun!
(lots of fighting noise)Stay where you are, men!
Need some cover... Throwing smoke! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
Take out that hatch! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
(lots of fighting noise)Hand me that clip... Reloading!
We made it to deck 1, confirmed clear.
We made it to deck 2, confirmed clear.
We made it to deck 3, confirmed clear.
We made it to deck 4, confirmed clear.
We made it to deck 5, confirmed clear.
(sound of laser fire)Argh! Internal security lasers!
We've hit a forcefield! Finding another route.
We're at the computer core, locating interface.
There's a new encryption algorithm here, we might have a problem.
There's an extra layer of protection here... Can't crack it.(FAILURE CONDITION)
That's it! The ship is ours. (Cheering and hoorays)
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Team, fall back to the extraction point! Hull is going critical!
Let's hussle, men! The ship's breaking up!
We've lost the route back to the pods! Find an airlock and start swimming!
Clear! Phew, that was a close one!

page.title: Boardingcrew Variation 4
page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
Keep working on those shields, we don't want to get fried.
Beginning cutting... Will update nearer to penetration.
(cutting noise)Nearly through. Looks like just one more bulkhead.
(cutting noise)This may take longer than we thought... It's too thick!
Marines, check weapons and ammo. Standby for punch-through!
Penetration in 3...2...1. (bang of hull plate)We're through. Go! Go! Go!
Control, we're aborting. We can't get through the hull. Men, check suit seals, pressure up and get swimming!(FAILURE CONDITION)
Stay alert and watch for tangos!
(Sound of combat/laser fire)Medic! We have a 'man down' here!
(lots of fighting noise)Check your angles, marines!
Arrrgh! I'm hit but I'll be ok. (lots of fighting noise over injured marine)
(lots of fighting noise)Argh! I'm out!... Requesting ammunition!
(lots of fighting noise)Pull back to that last intersection!
(lots of fighting noise)Get down! Hold position!
(lots of fighting noise)Move it! Move it!
(lots of fighting noise)Throw down some covering fire, men!
Standby. Throwing stun! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
Stand clear! Throwing smoke! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
The hatch is locked. Placing charge... (pause followed by bang/explosion)
(lots of fighting noise)I'm reloading! Give me some covering fire!
(sound of laser fire)Hell! There are laser sentries!
Oh no! A forcefield! Finding another route.
Safety is offline... We've got it!
Interlink is up... We're starting the hack!
They've installed an extra layer of encryption... This might take a while longer.
Blast it! The encryption is nothing we've seen before! We're locked out.(FAILURE CONDITION)
Last firewall is cleared and system access is... Enabled!
Ship control coming online... Now! That's it!
Control, this is the Chief. The ship is ours. (Cheering and hoorays)
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Return to the pods, team! The hull is going to breach.
Get swimming, ladies! The pods are gone!
We're clear! Marines, prepare for pickup.

page.title: Boardingcrew Variation 5 - Boron 1
page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
We can't penetrate the hull - aborting mission. Everyone, retreat!(FAILURE CONDITION)
(Sound of combat/laser fire)We require medical assistance!
Argh... (lots of fighting noise over dying marine)
(lots of fighting noise)We're running low on ammo!
(lots of fighting noise)I need supporting fire!
Blowing the hatch! Stand clear!(pause followed by bang/explosion)
(sound of laser fire)They have laser sentries! Stay down!
We've come up against a forcefield!
They're using a new encryption protocol!
(shooting noise)The safety's been re-engaged! This is terrible!(FAILURE CONDITION)
(shooting noise)The computer system has been disabled.
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Hull's going critical! Get back to the pods!
We must reach the pods. Move!
The route back to the pods is blocked. Find an airlock!
We are clear of the hull!

page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
Make sure you keep those shields down!
(cutting noise)This hull is thick... We're having a tough time getting through.
We can't get through the hull plating. We have to abort! Flee!(FAILURE CONDITION)
(lots of fighting noise)Fire on the primary targets!
Noooo!(lots of fighting noise over dying marine)
(lots of fighting noise)We're running out of charges!
(lots of fighting noise)Give me some covering fire!
Fire in the hole!(pause followed by bang/explosion)
Blow the hatch!(pause followed by bang/explosion)
(sound of laser fire)Laser sentries encountered here!
We have come up against a forcefield! Rerouting.
We have found the core, locating interface.
They have a new encryption algorithm. Most unfortunate!
We are locked from the system! Safety re-enabled!(FAILURE CONDITION)
We have full ship access! (aside)Bringing up internal sensors.
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Move to the pods! The ship shall go critical!
Faster! We have little time to spare!
Oh my! The route to the pods is blocked! Attempting to find an airlock!
We are clear of the ship!

page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
Make sure you keep those shields down!
(cutting noise)This hull is thick... We're having a tough time getting through.
We can't get through the hull plating. Split must abort!(FAILURE CONDITION)
(Sound of combat/laser fire)This one needs medical attention!
(lots of fighting noise)Marines! Fire at the enemy!
(lots of fighting noise)Tactical retreat. Hold back.
(lots of fighting noise)Do not move backwards!
(lots of fighting noise)I need covering fire!
Destroy this hatch! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
(lots of fighting noise)I need a new clip... Reloading!
(sound of laser fire)Internal security lasers! A cowardly tactic!
A forcefield has been activated in our path. Bypass it!
We're at the computer core. Interface located.
A new encryption algorithm has been established.
Unable to override the system protection!(FAILURE CONDITION)
The ship is ours! Victory!(Cheering and hoorays)
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Hull is critical! Must leave! Return to the extraction point!
We are unable to return to the pods! Locate an airlock!
We return safe but without victory. Much shame.

Keep lowering the shields! We do not wish to be cooked.
We have established stable hull contact!
Cutting has started... An update will be issued shortly.
(cutting noise)I am almost through. Just one more bulkhead.
(cutting noise)This hull is thick! Standby for update.
Marines, check weapons and ammo. Prepare for battle!
Zero hull-penetration. Retreating with spacesuits.(FAILURE CONDITION)
(Sound of combat/laser fire)Medical attention is needed!
(lots of fighting noise)Pull back to that last intersection!
(lots of fighting noise)Get down! Hold position!

We have full access. The ship is ours!(Cheering and hoorays)

The hull is going critical! Get back to the pods!
We must reach the pods. Move!

page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
The shield integrity must be low!
I have contact with the hull.
I will breach the hull with ease.
(cutting noise)Watch as the hull bends to my will!
(cutting noise)This cursed hull is impressive in strength!
We are prepared for assault. Standing by.
We must abort - zero hull-penetration. No fuel remains in the pod. Retreating with spacesuits.(FAILURE CONDITION)
(Sound of combat/laser fire)This one needs medical attention!
(lots of fighting noise)Marines! Check your fire!
(lots of fighting noise)Tactical retreat. We are being flanked!
(lots of fighting noise)Hold your ground, marines!
(lots of fighting noise)Give me covering fire!
Stun grenade away!(pause followed by bang/explosion)
Throwing a smoke! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
Take out that hatch! (pause followed by bang/explosion)
(lots of fighting noise)Give me that clip... Reloading!
(sound of laser fire)Argh! Internal security lasers!
A forcefield has been activated. Finding another route.
We're at the computer core, locating interface.
A new encryption algorithm has been established. This could pose a problem.
There is a subsystem protection program... I am unable to override.(FAILURE CONDITION)
The ship is ours! Thank the Light! (Cheering and hoorays)
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Hull is going critical! We must leave. Return to the extraction point!
The ship integrity is failing! Move with haste!
We are unable to return to the pods! Locate an airlock!
We return safe but without victory. Much shame.

(lots of fighting noise)Check your angles, marines!

(lots of fighting noise)Argh! I'm out!... Requesting ammunition!

We have reached the central computer.
Interlink is online. Starting the hack!

We have bypassed all protection programs!
Control. We are victorious. (Cheering and hoorays)
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
Return to the pods! The hull will breach.
Increase your pace or be lost in fire!
We must float back! The pods are gone!
We are clear. Prepare for pickup.

page.title: Boardingcrew Variation 11 - Teladi 1
page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
(cutting noise)We have almost breached the hull
(cutting noise)The hull must be a Teladianium alloy! It is tough.
The hull cannot be penetrated. Aborting mission.(FAILURE CONDITION)
Argh... (lots of fighting noise over dying marine)
(lots of fighting noise)I need supporting Fire!
Blowing hatch! Stand clear!(pause followed by bang/explosion)
(sound of laser fire)Laser sentries encountered! Stay down!
We have a forcefield obstacle! Find another way
They have initiated a new encryption protocol!

The hull is failing! Get back to the pods!
We must move faster! Get to the pods!

page.t: (not voiced)Phase 1 - Approach to Target and Hull Penetration
(cutting noise)This hull is very thick... We are having trouble.
The hull cannot be penetrated - aborting mission.(FAILURE CONDITION)
(Sound of combat/laser fire)We require a medic!
Argh... (lots of fighting noise over dying marine)
(lots of fighting noise)We are running low on ammo!
(lots of fighting noise)I need supporting Fire!
Blowing the hatch! Get back!(pause followed by bang/explosion)
(sound of laser fire)They have laser sentries! Take cover
Our advance is hindered by a forcefield!
They are using a new encryption!
(shooting noise)The safety has been re-engaged! We have failed our mission(FAILURE CONDITION)
(shooting noise)The computer system has been disabled.
We have full access. The ship is ours!(Cheering and hoorays)
(not voiced)Phase 4 - Extraction (if capture fails and hull is critical)
The hull is going critical! Get back to the pods!
We must reach the pods. Move!
The route to the pods is blocked. We must find an airlock!
We are clear. Prepare for pickup.

page.title: Darel Ohneaim [COM]
page.t: How can I be of assistance?
Sorry, I don't have that information.

Pilot, we have some Terran diplomats in need of escorting back to the sector Heretic's End. We'd like to show them how we handle things around here. This will look good on your record. I'm loading the briefing into your mission menu now. If you are interested, follow the instructions.
Hello, pilot. The Terran diplomats have left with their escort group. We hope you reconsider next time.
Glad to hear it. I've added you to the flight group and updated your mission briefing. Have a safe journey, pilot.

page.title: Raoul Berghman [COM]
page.descr: To be spoken by same actor as page 350111
page.t: Keep your weapons under control, pilot!
Sir, I'm tracking an unusual echo here on the grav. A faint line moving through the sector, coming in from the outer Solar System apparently.
Good to see you again, pilot. We'll be your wingmen for this op.
You don't have to but adding the ships to a wing will give you better control over them.
Look at all of that traffic.
I can't imagine how many different people and things are out there. I hear the commonwealth is huge.
Utashi, really! Stop nature-watching and stay on the lookout for bogeys.
I've got grav contacts. They're attacking a small convoy of Boron. They... they look like Terraformers, not Xenon. Utashi?
AGI, great. Ok, there are only a few of them. We should be able to take them out. Local forces are also moving in. Let's show them how it's done!
Let's report this to Jackson. I don't like this. I can deal with the concept of the Xenon, but Terraformers! There should be none left of that design. Let's go.
Red 2. Got micro fractures on the hull.
The craft has stopped. Incoming communication on a wide frequency.

page.title: Samuel Plinter [COM]
page.t: Keep your weapons under control, pilot!

Ah, our new recruit. Good to meet you. My name is Lieutenant Plinter, I'm your flight leader. The USC is very interested in you and what you are capable of. Most of our boys have never fought against anything before but from what I hear, skirmishes are commonplace in the Commonwealth. Well, let's get this little tour on the way.
Hello, pilot. This is Lt. Plinter, USC. You drew patrol assignment today. Come join us when you are ready.

Nothing on my screen, pilot. It's probably a micro-meteorite. Sometimes one will enter the transit accelerator and shoot across the populated area. They do register on the grav sometimes if they're heavy enough.
Huh. I see them now. Five of them. They must have disintegrated during transit. Perhaps (interrupted)
What? Terraformer? It's been over 20 years since... (interrupting himself)You heard the Captain, people. Break orbit and set course for Neptune. Follow my lead. Execute!
Copy that. (towards his group)People, look out for that beacon.
Drones? So the tracks on the grav were no micro-meteorites after all! All right, pilot, you're up! Blow those damn things out of the sky. Good luck. Execute.
The drones are heading for the Oort Cloud. Pilot, get in there and follow the next one.
Another Drone is heading into Oort Cloud. Intercept it.
Local forces in Oort Cloud are ready to intercept the Drone but you should get close and gather intel and attempt to destroy that drone.
Pilot, this is Lt. Plinter. I've got message from command that all drones are either destroyed or intercepted. Command is mighty impressed with your achievements today - and I am too.

Alright, debrief at the Saturn Research Station; they want to get as much sensor data as possible. I hear the scientists already have their hands full ripping open half the fleet's black boxes so there is no rush.
Pilot, you've been ordered to meet with Major General Ishiyama at the ATF Outpost in the Asteroid Belt. Seems you're getting yourself noticed, pilot!

Hello, pilot. This mission is a simple escort run through to Venus. We've got USC and ATF ships all over the place so we won't run into any trouble. The top brass will be watching, so keep in formation and try not to run into anything. Let's move.

page.title: Raja Utashi [COM]
page.descr: To be spoken by same actor as 350114
page.t: Keep your weapons under control, pilot!
'Oh, look! Spaceflies!' Did I really say that out loud? Jeez, shoot me now!
Now it's on my grav as well, sir. Two of 'em.
This is our first patrol in the Commonwealth. We hear you've been having a good time. Well, let's get going. Add those three scouts to a wing, it will allow you to control them more easily.
Yeah, and all those different alien races - a dangerous melting pot, don't you think?
That design is not recognised as Xenon. They are definitely unmanned, though. I think we're looking at another form of AGI, possibly another evolutionary path of Earth's old Terraformers.
I have a visual on a possible space station. It's just out of sensor range. No AGI contacts.
Uh...I'm picking up a ship. A small craft undocking from one of the stations. It's heading straight for us.
AGI entering sensor range. Locking on missiles. We need to take them out before they report our position.

page.title: Najia Benthami [COM]
page.t: How can I be of assistance?
Sorry, I don't have that information.
Attention, all pilots. Terraformer Attack reported in Neptune orbit. No AGI ship must be allowed to survive this incursion. Proceed to Neptune immediately!
Lt. Plinter, do you read? The AGI seem to be using some sort of Jump Beacon to anchor their jump drives in our sector. Scan and destroy it if you can.

We've got new intel suggesting that this is just a decoy attack! A handful of AI drones have sneaked past our guard and stolen information from a research facility in Mars orbit. They're already heading back into the outer system, possibly to rendezvous with a ship.

Lt. Plinter, you'll be sending one of your pilots to the Oort Cloud to patrol the gate just in case one of the drones gets there. It must then be followed to its destination and, if possible, destroyed.
Control to all ships, a single Terraformer ship has broken past our lines in the Asteroid belt. It is heading towards Mars. It has suffered heavy damage.
The Terraformer ship has entered Mars orbit. USC and AGI forces, intercept.
We have a Terraformer fleet in Mars orbit! All ships, engage. Destroy that jump beacon!

Konichiwa, pilot. Your handling of the situation was impressive. We are going to get to the source of these Terraformers and when that time comes we will count on people like you to eliminate it. The source may well be in the Commonwealth so remain vigilant. We have something which may interest you. An Argon Discoverer which we have been studying. We have upgraded it somewhat. Hopefully, you can put it to good use. We will contact you with your next assignment.

page.title: Rai Ishiyama [COM]
page.t: Hello, pilot. Do you need some help?
(laugh)You're developing a good sense of humour, I see!
It may be worth looking near the
Pilot, brush up your Nav skills, you're there!
Sorry, I don't have that information.
The Carbo Cake is a lie!
Pilot. Report to me for your next assignment.

Good day, pilot. I'm Major General Rai Ishiyama of the AGI Task Force, or ATF. As you probably know, the ATF is charged with defending the Sol system from illegal Artificial General Intelligences, for short, AGI. These things are pretty nasty - one example of them is the ancient Terraformers, and you know what they did! Well, lately it seems they're returning. This attack on the Sol system was the first of its kind in centuries; more might follow. What worries us most, however, is that apparently some unknown group from outside the Sol system is collaborating with the AGI. We must find out who, where, why and how this is at all possible.
The information you intercepted today gives us valuable clues, but we're still working on it. The ship you saw was apparently Argon.
We have reports of an Argon ship picking up the drones before it jumped out of the Solar System.

You've done exceptionally well, pilot. You have been given access to Mars orbit. As you know, Mars has a wide variety of ship upgrades available, take a look. As you will be taking on more challenging duties, we have seen fit to give you a M5 scout ship to aid you. It is located at the Mars Shipyard. Dock there and control will be turned over to you. Once your business in Mars in complete and you are ready for your next assignment, please contact me.

Good day, pilot. As you might be aware, the governments of the Commonwealth are less than welcoming of our presence in their territories. This, however, will not prevent us from leading a thorough investigation, with or without their consent. This is a joint ATF and USC operation and from now on, you're part of it. You are to enter the Commonwealth of Planets in a sector called Heretic's End. There, you'll meet up with ATF Commander Mark Jackson who'll let you in on the details of your next mission. Good luck!

Hello again, pilot. I believe congratulations are in order. You and Heywood did a very commendable job in rescuing Captain Pearle. You may already know that we have received a response from the Argon Government but we are denying the charges. Patrols near Heretic's End are being stepped up by both sides. It was inevitable but at least we have Pearle back and a chance of better understanding what is going on.

As you know, a previously unknown group of AGI ships have entered the Commonwealth and started attacking some races and factions. Their design is based on the Terraformers, constructed by Earth several centuries ago. At the end of the Terraformer war, we trapped them in the gate network. They further evolved into the Xenon. It now looks like a group of Terraformers did not take that same evolutionary path.

Pilot, you and Pearle will investigate two Split factions, the Ryk and Zyarth. They are allies but we do not believe they will share this technology with each other. Track down the source. We still do not have a lead on the Argon who infiltrated the Solar System but I am positive that you will uncover the answers.

Pilot, we're getting a solid signal from that tracking device. It won't take them long to realise that we're onto them so we need to act quickly. They entered an unknown sector East of Zyarth's Dominion. We're going to hit them hard and hopefully corner them before they can jump again.
Head to that sector. The rest of the fleet will meet you there. I'm adding it to your map now. Good luck, pilot.

Hello, pilot. This is a delicate situation. Taking this Split is probably the only way we can get to the bottom of this but we have enough people against us at the moment. This could take a while, pilot. In the meantime, enjoy the view. Not many people from outside the inner planets gain access to the Moon. We will contact you with your next assignment.

Pilot, we have information on the Terraformers. The Split acquired the technology to build them from a person named Marteen Winters, a Terran. Winters was presumed dead centuries ago even before the initial Terraformer War. We now assume that he fled and had cryogenically frozen himself. Winters was a scientist who worked on the Terraformers and was against the shutdown of the project. This explains how the Xenon seem to be manipulated. He is without a doubt, the foremost expert of Terraformer and Xenon technology. His motives are obviously against our interests and he must be tracked down and stopped.

Aldrin was a colony of Earth. It was set up centuries ago but was lost during the Terraformer war. The Terraformers destroyed every colony we had; at least that is what we thought. The co-ordinates for Aldrin were stolen during the Terraformer attack in the Solar System. Winters may be using Aldrin as a base of operations. Why he chose that system is still unknown. We have reverse-engineered a Jump Beacon and have attempted to send it to the co-ordinates. If it ends up in the correct system the fleet will get the 'green light'.
A warm welcome to Earth, pilot. Please dock at the Torus. I will debrief you.

page.title: Mark Jackson [COM]
page.t: How can I be of assistance?
Sorry, I don't have that information.

Welcome Down South, pilot. That's what we call this rotten place beyond the gate. They call it Commonwealth... How was your journey? In this part of space, you'll get your orders from me - even with the ATF emblem on my sleeve. You'll meet one of your own USC guys, Capt. Pearle, in a few days, if all goes well.

Okay. The Terraformers, also known as the Xenon over here in the commonwealth, are acting up a lot these days. They're raiding convoys and facilities for processed materials, we don't know why. Not to mention stealing information from our fair Solar System.

It does sound a little far-fetched, but we believe they're being incited, coerced, sweet-talked or otherwise manipulated by our squeaky-clean so-called Argon 'friends'. Anyway, the current wave of Xenon attacks is often accompanied by non-Xenon vessels. We want you to seek out such an attack, and instead of getting into the battle, covertly follow the non-Xenon ship to its base of operations. This is a crucial piece of intel we absolutely need to have. All clear? Okay. You're good to go effective immediately. Carry on, pilot.
Pilot, we've confirmed a Xenon attack in Nyana's Hideout.
Pilot, we've confirmed a Xenon attack in Scale Plate Green.
Pilot, we've confirmed a Xenon attack in PTNI Headquarters (P.T.N.I.)
Proceed to this sector A.S.A.P. but do not engage the enemy. Just follow the non-Xenon attacker to its base and if possible, scan it. Jackson out.
Welcome back, pilot. You've done an exceptionally good job today. The data you brought in is already being scrutinised by our scientists. We may be able to pinpoint where that ship jumped to.

The scan of the base revealed a large area for the stolen material and some kind of signal which is aimed at the Xenon. It may be the way the Argon and Xenon communicate. I doubt the Xenon are under their control but they do seem to share information on raids: co-ordinates, lists of materials and so on.

So, right now we're investigating this Argon-Pirate-Xenon connection and what these resources are probably used for. The Xenon fabricate their own material and technology so it probably isn't for them and as far as we know they have never worked with other races before.

How do you feel about leading your first patrol, pilot? Berghman and Utashi will be joining you. You will be assigned three unmanned light scouts for you to command by remote. Manpower is a little short on this side of the gate. The scouts are on their way to you now.

Ok, pilots. You will be heading to the Argon sectors. Black Hole Sun is your final destination. Take a look around, gauge the Xenon activity and report back. This time, if you see anything, feel free to take it out. Good luck.
