Anyway, while I continue to avoid the Argon dogs and drones, I gift you my last remaining station. Hopefully they will spend enough time investigating you so I can get out of range of them. I can already feel them probing my mind through my Nividium-foil hat.

Good luck, my decoy.

page.title: Player Lines [TEXT]
page.t: I don't understand. Aren't you at war with the Terrans?
You wanted to offer me a job?
I received a message that needs to be decoded. A Teladi named {actor.name@CSV_toplevel.csvBelisarius} said that you're studying the Xenon. So, could you please help me to understand this message?
Perfect, I am transferring the data. When can I expect first results?
A distress call? Why would a Xenon send me a distress call?
But why does my ship computer identify it as a Xenon, if it's a Terraformer?
Well, so far I understand it. But why on Earth would a Xenon send an emergency call to me? I'm the last one who could help this Xen... Terraformer.
I assume that you don't know how to stop this process. This means that we have to stop this ship at all costs, so that an incident like that in Black Hole Sun can't be repeated.
It is generally known how it came to be destroyed.
You're talking about machines. How could they achieve sentience?
Machines can achieve sentience? How is this possible?
I'm searching for {3895,60}; it's a creature called a Boron.
I'm searching for a Boron, called {3895,60}.
So what did you make of the message?
I want to register this sector.
I'm here for the promised sector coordinates. I want to buy them now.
Hi there, I'm here. You wanted to speak to me?
Sounds like it could be fun! Sure, I'll give it a whirl.
Hello there! I've been sent to see you by {actor.name@L2M13.Shipyard Owner}. He said you have some information regarding a target for 'acquisition'.
Here's the ship, as promised. That's my side of the deal...
Greetings. {actor.name@L2M13.Shipyard Owner} has sent me along to have my reputation enhanced. He says you can work your magic on GalNet.
I'm reporting in for patrol duty.
What can I do for you, Commander?
I found the pirate base and scanned it.
We ran into ships which looked like Terraformers!
We need to inform the USC!
I would like to take part in the escort.
I am very interested in working for your people.
Hey, what are all these ships doing?
You mean there's a campaign underway to wipe out the Kha'ak?
Okay, so there's a campaign underway to wipe out the Kha'ak?
Pilot reporting in! What are your orders?
So, why did they enter the Xenon sectors in the first place?
Why isn't your Government sending troops to the rescue?
Boron and women, two of the great mysteries of the universe. Okay, I'll see what I can do.
I managed to put names on your friends: Bala Gi and Julian Brennan. And no, I didn't find them. But they seem to have found something pretty big.
But you can fix the generator eventually, can't you?
Forgive me, Lord Chaplain. My Boron friend, Mahi Ma, sent me. He needs assistance repairing an installation.
Alright, greedy one. I'll get back to you.
Lord chaplain. I shall provide you with your credits.
I've heard you're looking for transport pilots?
No, thank you, I'm not interested right now.
Okay, I'll see what I can find!
I trust the teladianium was of use?
Great, so I get to blow something up and get away with it? Count me in! How do I do it?
Aren't you Goners supposed to be pacifists?
I have valuable cargo to deliver, requesting docking permission.
Hello. You contacted me regarding a matter of 'great importance'.

page.title: X3.5 L2 Mission
page.t:
The Argon Federal Authority in Omicron Lyrae calls upon pilots of all races to do their Commonwealth duty in aiding the transition and integration of Terrans into our great Commonwealth community. A number of important tasks can therefore be found at docks in Omicron Lyrae that will assist our Terran friends in this noble venture.

With tensions high, the Terran government has entered into diplomatic dialogue with each of the major races of the Commonwealth. Since the Sol system was reconnected by a jumpgate, the Terrans have gradually ventured further into Commonwealth space ostensibly to trade and explore. The Split and the Paranid governments, however, have expressed anger at what they see as 'Terran spying'. The Argon, who are hosting the diplomatic talks, remain the closest to the Terrans both genetically and territorially.
The Terrans are currently fiercely protective of their advanced technology and do not tolerate unregistered ships in their space, including fellow Terrans with insufficient system clearance.

Head to Omicron Lyrae now to join the multitude of other civilians helping the Terrans to integrate into our community.

Had enough of Kha'ak raids? It's time to take the initiative! Experienced fighter pilots can sign up for Operation Final Fury; a multi-cultural military offensive to remove the Kha'ak from our sectors and restore peace.\n\nInterested pilots should sign up in Omicron Lyrae as soon as possible.

The Goner are seeking assistance in the construction of a new Goner Temple.

After losing their ancient spiritual home during an Argon-Paranid skirmish, the Goner have been steadily relocating to their new home sector, Elysium of Light. The community of scholars and scientists were once seen to be nothing more than a sect who believed in far-fetched stories of the planet Earth and past conflicts with Terraformers. Now, after the rediscovery of Earth, they have attracted members from all races, seeking a greater understanding of the universe and how we are all connected. Their studies have rewritten history archives and paved the way for future advancements into scientific areas such as jumpdrives, transporter devices and deep-space exploration.
While the initial damage to the original temple was superficial, an internal blast rocked the station while the battle between Argon and Paranid ships raged outside. After life-support began to fail, all nearby ships, including several Paranid freighters, docked at the Temple and attempted to evacuate the inhabitants. Twenty minutes after the initial blast, main reactor containment failed, causing a cataclysmic explosion, destroying the revered installation. 76 Goner were lost and hundreds were displaced. Pilots wishing to help the Goner in their efforts to build their new temple should report as soon as possible to Elysium of Light.
The Argon Federation has warned against travel to the sector {7,1023005}. The whispers that it is an untouched paradise - full of resources is too much to resist. Investigate the sector.

page.title: L2 Terran Plot Scene 1
page.t: Join Lt. Plinter's patrol group in Neptune.
Follow Plinter in the sector patrol of Uranus.
Neptune is under attack by AGI, known to the Terrans as Terraformers. Defend Neptune.
The Xenon used some kind of a Jump Beacon to gain access to the Solar System. Scan and destroy the Jump Beacon.
Xenon Message Drones have stolen information from several Terran Stations. They must not get to their destination. Intercept the Message Drones.
Rejoin Plinter for a patrol run through to Saturn. Destroy any remaining AGI forces.
Head to the Saturn Research Station to dump your flight data.
Meet Major General Rai Ishiyama at the ATF Outpost in the Asteroid Belt.
You have been given access to Mars. Fly to Mars to collect a ship which has been assigned to you. Prepare for the mission into the Commonwealth.
Fly to the sector Heretic's End and meet with AGI Commander, Mark Jackson. He will instruct you on the upcoming mission.
Wait for Commander Jackson to inform you of a Xenon attack on a convoy. Fly to the convoy and investigate the Xenon activity.
Fly to the convoy under attack by Xenon in {sector.name@L2M002.Convoy Sector}. Investigate the Xenon activity but do not engage them in battle.
The Xenon are being aided by several ships, apparently Pirates. Follow one of the Pirates.
The Xenon and Pirates are co-ordinating their attacks from a base west of {sector.name@L2M002.PTNI}. Scan the base for information.
A freighter undocked from its base and jumped away. Inform Mark Jackson in Heretic's End about the base used by the Xenon and Pirates.
Meet up with Berghman, Utashi and your new ships. Then lead them in a patrol.
Lead the patrol through the Argon sectors to Black Hole Sun.
A group of unknown ships, possibly of Terraformer design, have attacked a small convoy. Destroy the Terraformers.
Return to Jackson and report the Terraformer encounter.
Plinter will be leading you in an escort back to Venus.
Escort the freighter containing collected Terraformer Technology back to Venus.
Xenon have deployed a Jump Beacon in Mars. Protect the freighter from the enemy ships.
You have been given a {object.class.name@L2M002.MarsShip} class {object.type.name@L2M002.MarsShip}. It is docked at the {object.name@L2M002.MarsShipyard}.
To add a ship to a wing, open up its command console and access 'Wing Control'.
To get to the bottom of the emerging AGI force, you must meet up with a contact who is investigating the Argon.
Heywood has informed you that Pearle has been captured by Argon forces and is being held in a secure station. To infiltrate the station and rescue Pearle, you need help from someone with connections.
To gain access to the Argon military sector, you must perform some tasks for the Teladi, Haleos.
Pose as a delivery freighter to gain access to the Argon Military Sector.
Meet with Ishiyama to receive your next mission.

The Argon do not appear to be the ones responsible for the Terraformers or the attack on Sol. The Split are now the prime suspects. Plant satellites in several Split sectors and watch for possible Terraformer activity.
Family Zyarth appear to be behind some of the attacks against Boron, using Terraformers. The facility to create the Terraformers may be located in one of their sectors.
The facility has been tracked to an unknown sector. Join the Terran fleet and attempt to gain control of the facility.
The facility is now under the control of the ATF but it is obviously not the source of the technology. Take the Split scientist to Earth's Moon for interrogation.
Meet with Ishiyama to receive your next mission.

A lead, provided by the captured Split scientist, points to a long lost Terran system being the source of the Terraformers. The Terran fleet is preparing to launch. Command sees fit to train you in the skill of ship boarding.

A Terran by the name of Winters has acquired the Terraformer technology from a long lost Terran colony. A USC and ATF fleet is preparing to launch an exploratory mission in an attempt to find him and, if possible, stop him.
Scout the Aldrin sector for signs of habitation and Terraformer activity.
While the possible location of Winters is being ascertained, defend the Aldrin stations from AGI attack.
Winters is aboard a Terraformer CPU ship and has gained control of Aldrin's Terraformers. He must be captured.
Winters escaped capture by jumping out of the Aldrin sector but the Terraformers of Aldrin are again under their control. Aldrin dignitaries are to be transported to Earth to initiate talks of unity.
You need a Cargo Lifesupport System and at least {value@L2M005.NeededSpace} units of cargo space.
If this briefing has been added to your ship computer then you match the criteria for a high profile escort mission. Please apply at {object.name@L2M006.Omicron Station} for further details.
Escort the Terran diplomats aboard {object.name@L2M006.IovisShip} to {object.name@L2M006.HE Station}, {object.sector.name@L2M006.HE Station}
Contact Erin Iovis if you would like an opportunity to work for the Terran military.

page.title: L2 Khaak Plot
page.t: Follow me back to base and we'll get you signed up with the boss.
Knowledge is power! We must know everything that goes on inside our enemy's territory. Go there and assess the scale of their activities; log everything that you see.
Our hidden forward outpost is under heavy attack. Engage the Kha'ak and prevent the outpost from being destroyed! Reinforcements are on the way. Deploy immediately!

Hello, pilot.

Our Argon allies have notified us of a newly-developed ship, named the Griffon. It was slated to be the drone-carrier prototype for use in Operation Final Fury. Our victory has killed the project and they have decided that the campaign's Ace Pilot should receive the unfinished prototype. That pilot is you, {player.name}. Unfortunately the 'unfinished' part was the drone-carrying system, around which the ship was designed, but I'm sure it will still turn out to be quite a valuable asset to you. We hope you find it a fitting reward for the successful role you played in Operational Final Fury.
You will find the ship in Argon Sector M148.
In the Galaxy Map, type the first letter of the name of the sector you are looking for to help you find it more quickly.

page.title: L2 Goner Plot
page.t: To get back on schedule, we urgently need large amounts of raw resources delivered here to the construction site.
We have decided that it will be much safer to produce our own teladianium panelling here in Elysium of Light. We'll need a Teladianium Foundry. Please can you set one up here?
The pirates seem to be stepping up their attacks against us. We are peaceful people; you must protect our ships and stations before lives are lost!
Although we are committed to peace, these pirates stand against everything we believe. We need the pirate threat to be ended before they cause further loss of life to our faithful believers.

Many thanks for saving us. It would appear that even for us it is not safe to travel unprotected in this dangerous new climate. In return please accept the {object.name@L2M03.TLS} as a token of our appreciation.

page.title: L2 HUB Plot
page.t: A Boron by the name of Mahi Ma has requested your assistance. Some of his friends have been missing for several days after taking exploratory tours of nearby Xenon sectors. Attempt to find some trace of them.
The friends of Mahi Ma were Bala Gi and Julian Brennan. After searching the Xenon sectors, they came across some sort of gate hub. Their current whereabouts are unknown. Mahi Ma must see the Hub.
Mahi Ma is a scientist working with Bala Gi. He can gain access to the Hub systems if he is provided with the right materials.
The Hub is slightly damaged and needs to be repaired before the gates can be re-established. Repair a group of capacitor nodes around the Hub.

The Hub can now use one set of gates to reconnect to the Commonwealth. It can connect to any two jumpgates but only once. The sector must be chosen wisely. Mahi Ma will need Teladianium and Ore to continue repairs.
Mahi Ma needs Teladianium and Ore to continue repairs to the power generator. After this repair, the first set of gates should be fully operational.
The power conduits leading to the second set of gates on the HUB are damaged and a stable connection is not possible. Mahi Ma needs a number of mineral resources to fashion a solution.

The second set of gates are now active. Mahi Ma needs help to repair the final set. Lord Chaplain Otmanckstras, an expert on multi-dimensional topology and Xenon technology, will be of great help to Mahi Ma.

The final set of gates has been activated. As no evidence of Bala Bi or Julian Brennan has been found on the Hub, Mahi Ma has decided to return to the Boron and deliver the tragic news. The Hub is now fully under your control.

page.title: L2 HQ Plot
page.t: The Boron Humi Wi wishes to meet to discuss a matter of great importance. He is stationed in Ocean of Fantasy.
The Yaki have acted following the disappearance of Bala Gi to raid several of his research facilities. They must be stopped where possible.
The Argon and Boron have started a campaign to destroy any of Bala Gi's technology which is currently in the hands of the Yaki. Meet with the Argon contact in Cloudbase Southwest to contribute.
Before an effective strike can be mounted, the Yaki sectors need to be scouted for targets of interest. Scout Ocracoke's Storm for Bala Gi's technology and suspicious installations.

The base in Ocracoke's Storm will be the focus of the Argon and Boron forces. For the capital ships to move in safely, the station's defences must be hit. When the capital ships move in, focus on the station itself.

The Yaki suffered great losses as a result of the Argon and Boron strike but their resolve has not been dampened. They have taken several of Bala Gi's employees in an attempt to gain more of Bala Gi's technology. Meet up with a Boron contact to aid in the rescue attempt.

The Boron scientists are being held in Olmancketslat's Treaty by a group of Pirates and Yaki. Mahi Ma has established contact with them and has formulated a plan to rescue them. Fly to Olmancketslat's Treaty and prepare to protect the Boron as they escape.

Several of the Boron scientists managed to escape without injury. Those lost shall be mourned. The Yaki are looking for Bala Gi's hidden mobile base. The Boron only have rough idea of its location. It must be found before the Yaki find it or they will gain access to the vast repository of Bala Gi's research.

page.title: L2 Gamestart Mission Texts
page.t: As you have not transferred the required funds to pay your fines your ship has now been scrapped.
Oops, I thought I had enough credits to pay!
As you should be aware, you now have only {value@L3M05 110.Hours} hours to raise the required {value.formatted@L3M05 110.Credits}Cr to pay the fines that you have been issued.
Computer control of {object.name@this.reward} received. Docked at {object.dockobject.name@this.reward} in sector {object.dockobject.sector.name@this.reward}

Contact me at {object.name@L3M05 110.TradeStation} in {object.sector.name@L3M05 110.TradeStation} when you have acquired the necessary funds and the rather impressive ship we confiscated will be released back to you. Failure to do so will result in your ship being scrapped immediately. Good profit Joranas; you will need it.
The Priest Emperor hereby claims ownership of the property you tried to hide, unholy one. You should remain outside our borders until the contagious disease you carry is cured!
I have the {param@Cost} Credits for the cure!
Finally I am cured. Thank you!
Greetings my friend. I have heard all about your situation and the virus you contracted. My name is {3210,11120} and I work for the {3210,11100}.
Computer control of {object.name@this.reward} received. Docked at {object.dockobject.name@this.reward} in sector {object.dockobject.sector.name@this.reward}

Holy one! I have the Hyperion and your other assets hidden away. However, I believe that within {value@L3M05 111.Hours} hours the Priest Emperor will seize them for his own. You must find a way to cure your disease and return home or you will lose them all!

I believe that advances in Boron medical research can cure you and enable you to return to your people. However, I will need {value.formatted@L3M05 111.Credits}Cr to perform the procedure. Contact me at {object.name@L3M05 111.TradeStation} in {object.sector.name@L3M05 111.TradeStation} when you have raised the necessary amount of cash.

page.title: L2 Aldrin Expansion Mission
page.descr: Mission text for the Aldrin Expansion
page.t: Perform some tasks for the Terran Resource Evaluation Commission.
The Terran Resource Evaluation Commission requests that you use the Unfocussed Jumpdrive to scout for valuable or abundant minerals.
Return a sample of the Nividium found in the Unfocussed Jumpdrive Sector to the Terran Resource Evaluation Commission.
You have been requested to dock at the Torus and speak to {actor.name@L2M011.Torus Agent}. It is suggested to take a jumpdrive.
You have been given a Miner ship.
Scan Results: High traces of Nividium detected in planetoid.

The Solara system, the location of Aldrin and home to millions of human settlers, was cut off from Earth by the colonists hundreds of years ago. Their long-dead Jumpgate is to be reactivated once again to allow access to Terran space that has not been visited in centuries. Many Terran ships are standing by to take part in the initial recon into the unknown.

The Xenon have already established themselves in the newly-discovered sector. These AGI seem to be on the same evolutionary level as the Xenon of the Commonwealth. Their presence in these sectors cannot be tolerated.
The Kha'ak have invaded {sector.name@L2M011.New Terran 2}, probably for its Nividium content. Report your findings to {actor.name@L2M011.Aldrin Agent}.

The Kha'ak have invaded {sector.name@L2M011.New Terran 2}, probably for its Nividium content. The Paranid are rumoured to have a strategy for removing Kha'ak from a sector of interest and this is information the Terrans must have.

Information is needed on the blast in sector {sector.name@L2M011.P Sin}. Hacking into Paranid systems is nigh-on impossible and would only result in an escalation of conflict. A Paranid contact may be able to deliver the information for a price but without undesired repercussions.

The Paranid have detained several Terrans in response to Terran activities in their space. The Paranid consider this a proportional response and are not open to negotiations for their release. A Terran task force will attempt to bring them home.
A new gate has been discovered in the Terran frontier sectors. This is the third sector to have been found and appears to be one of the sectors lost during the Terraformer war.
In the third Terran frontier sector the Argon, Julian Brennan and Boron, Bala Gi have been found after being lost for several months. They need to be escorted back to a safe location.

The push to colonise the newly-discovered sectors continues and new stations are to be built. While on an exploratory mission, a mining ship was engaged by a group of Xenon. Their last known position was in {sector.name@L2M011.New Terran 3}. Go there and attempt to aid them.
While on an exploratory mission, a mining ship was engaged by a group of Xenon and the crew abandoned ship. Guard the ship against further attack and tow it back to {sector.name@L2M011.Aldrin 2}.
Fly to {object.name@L2M011.Belt Station} in {object.sector.name@L2M011.Belt Station} to receive further information about an important delivery mission.
Transport the {lookup.type.name@SS_WARE_GLOWINGCRYSTAL} to a facility in {sector.name@L2M011.Neptune}. The crystal has been added to your inventory.
Bala Gi has requested your presence in {sector.name@L2M011.KE}. He may have a solution to the Kha'ak problem.
Bala Gi has come up with a solution to the Kha'ak problem. Using the Hub, he shall attempt to permanently cut off the Kha'ak sector and replace it with a different sector.

The plan to disconnect the Kha'ak sector appears to have been successful. A different sector is now in its place, one which was once a Terran colony. Search the sector for the rumoured gate in the north of the sector.
Make sure your ship can use {lookup.type.name@SS_LASER_TUG}. Get next to the target object, fire the laser and move slowly away. Going too fast will break the beam's lock.

page.title: L2 New Home Mission
page.descr: Mission text for A New Home mission
page.t: TM Class Ship with a Fighter docked
The adjustment of jumpdrives and calibration of connection between both ships will take some minutes. Meanwhile you should prepare for the jump.

Hello, %s. You don't know me, but I know you. I want to play a game. Here's what happens if you lose. You will be vaporised by this ship; not a nice end for your quest, is it? There's only one way to avoid this, so come on and crack my firewall if you can. Better hurry up. Live or die: make your choice.
You'll have to crack this cipher code to get access to the mainframe.
Enter your new guess: (4 numbers, everything else will be cut off)
Hacking successful. Establishing connection to mainframe...
Invalid password. Access denied, please reenter password.
Connection reset from #cafe, firewall appears to be online again.
Wait a few seconds for reconnection to the firewall.
To crack this second barrier you'll have to fill in the ciphers 1-9 into
every block, but make sure that every cipher appears only once in a
Your hacking software will provide you with information about each
guess how many numbers were correct \(green\), at the false place
\(yellow\) or totally wrong \(red\). If you need too many guesses, the CPU
will probably recognise your hacking attempt and reset the code.
Do you really want to restart the hacking?
You have moved to far away from original hacking position, return to #efaa
A CPU ship just appeared in Danna's Chance and threatens the whole area. Try to stop the ship before it can destroy whole sectors.
The CPU ship escaped to Freedom's Reach and threatens civilians there. These have to be evacuated and brought to Elena's Fortune immediately.
Since #cafe has a weird defence mechanism, which takes over every ship close to it, you can't destroy it. Another way to get the ship out of the sector has to be found.
Bola Hi was not in Queen's Retribution. I was told that he is in Aldrin. I'll look for him there so he can decode the message from #cafe and we can help with the results.
Bola Hi was able to decode the message from #cafe. I have to find a long-forgotten ancient CPU ship and get its help.
#cafe is developing sentience and at the same time evolving into a Xenon. Only #efaa is able to stop it becoming Xenon and help it resume the development of sentience.
#cafe's development of sentience has been interrupted. #efaa looks after #cafe and both will return to the refuge to save mankind. Now the Teladi, Belisarius, needs assistance.

page.title: L2 Yaki Boarding Mission
page.descr: Yaki Boarding Mission Text. Inc character lines.
page.t: Hello, my name is {actor.name@L2M13.Shipyard Owner}. The word round these parts is that you're quite a pirate. I'd like to meet you. How about you stop by my shipyard in Senator's Badlands and we can talk piracy.
Thanks for coming. Look, I have a job for you. I want you to 'acquire' a ship for me. This will be a pretty tough job, so I need someone with a proven ability and reputation.

You'll need to speak to my friend, {actor.name@L2M13.Info Contact}. He has more information about the ship and will be able to give your more details regarding the target's whereabouts. You can find him in {actor.sector.name@L2M13.Info Contact}.

Ah, you must be {player.name}! I've been expecting you. The ship that {actor.name@L2M13.Shipyard Owner} has targeted for acquisition is a prototype M1 that sails under the name of {353213,10}. The last known position of the ship was in the vicinity of {sector.name@L2M13.Target Sector}
Don't take your eyes off that ship! I'll send you my flagship with my best pirates to assist!
We are here. Where is the ship?

Great! You delivered the ship, just like you said you would. I'm very grateful. We have developed a new ship and I think you deserve to be the first to get one! You should also go and speak to our chief hacker, {actor.name@L2M13.Hacker}. He'll be able to increase your reputation with a race of your choice! Now don't say I'm not a generous guy! Get out of here before I start getting emotional.
(Hacker)Right you are, pilot! {actor.name@L2M13.Shipyard Owner} told me that I'm to help you out. So, who do you want to be loved by?
There! All done. Good luck out there!
You have aborted the mission. I hope you don't expect me to go nicely on you.
Control of {object.name@L2M13.pirate ship} transferred to you.
You are sitting in the ship. You'd better get out before we finish our deal.
Talk to {actor.name@L2M13.Shipyard Owner} to get your reward.
Talk to {actor.name@L2M13.Hacker} to get your reputation increased with a race of your choice.
I've received word that the target ship has been destroyed. If I find that you were responsible, you will pay dearly.
(Briefing Text)Talk to {actor.name@L2M13.Shipyard Owner}. He has a job for you.
The ship should be within a few jumps of sector {sector.name@L2M13.Target Sector}. Look around and find it. When you do, Yaki will back you up with a ship full of marines.
Take control of {object.name@L2M13.target ship} by boarding it.

page.title: L2 Treasure Hunt
page.descr: Text used in Ketraar's Treasure Hunt MD Mission
page.t: Would you like a well-paid trip into Yaki space? Profitable information shall be shared with those who undertake this quest. Due to the importance of the information being shared, you are required to pay 50,000 Credits before accepting.
Pay 50,000 Cr for location of Yaki with puzzle piece
Find the Yaki who has the first hint and "persuade" him to hand it over.

There is a device from one of the convoy ships that shows the location of the lost ship. This device was broken into 8 pieces and each one was hidden by a different person. Everyone of them then made some sort of riddle or puzzle which indicates the position of their piece. The puzzles were distributed among them, so that one puzzle will lead to one piece of the device and also to the next puzzle; these must all be solved in order to get to the lost ship. The problem is that the first hint was stolen from the Goner Temple ages ago by some Yaki. Find the Yaki and you find the first hint. Good luck.

What do you want from me?


[center][select value='yes']Give me the puzzle piece or else![/select][/center]

I gave it to some black-market guy as collateral, since I owed him some cash. It's a Teladi that runs the Bar in the Teladi Trading Station in {sector.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHceosbackzoid}, you just need to go there, talk to the guy and pay my debt which is 20,000Cr. He'll give you the piece.
Talk to {actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHteladiceobuckz} at the Teladi Trading Station in {sector.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHceosbackzoid} and pay off the Yaki's debt to gain the lost first hint.
I'll pay off that Yaki's debt.

Great. Okay, here is the information I have. A ship did pass through this sector and was under Yaki control. Its valuable cargo was on board and undamaged. The former crew was removed from the ship to be processed. The ship was then abandoned in a sector, powered down and left alone to avoid detection. The Yaki boss created several clues to lead a potential future buyer of the ship to it without them needing to reveal themselves.\nWhoever holds the first clue could potentially find the ship. Luckily for you, I have it. As I said, I don't want anything to do with this. Take it and go; just don't give it to {actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHofferactor}.
{3214,14}\nFrom the end of the kingdom move one and five. There is a rock among many, that holds a surprise.\n{actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHfirsthintactor}, 10/5/44
Sorry, pilot; no Credits, no Profits!\nCome back when you have the money.

{3214,15}
x = minimum jumps needed from the Foundation Guild HQ to the space of the Queen.
y = x minus 1
{actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHsecondhintactor}, 25-1-50
{3214,16}\nVisit the home of the Xenon that is surrounded by profit. Make your way east, but beware the keepers - their numbers give them strength.\n{actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHthirdhintactor}

{3214,18}\nThree rocks, far away from the vast stony cloud, are your destination. Find them, and the crate will be easy to spot. The Anagram is the key to gaining knowledge of the of the whereabouts of the next piece.\n\033RArv Pegasus\033X
{3214,19}\nOnce you have a firm grasp on where it all began a very, very long time ago, travel until you come to an End: \033RS-S-S-S-E-S-W-W-N-W-N-W\033X\n{random.pilot.boron}, 26-11-49

{3214,20}\nThe journey leads you to a sector in the West. There are not two of them. It can be reached from the South or from the North or with a few jumps, either way you should get home. Once you find it, you will see the light. \033R7 7 18 -5 -12 23 -23 32\033X\nThe numbers are the path, {random.pilot.goner} 0-50-0
{3214,21}\nThe last piece is buried in a rock. The rock is to be found in the clouds of the mighty Split patriarch. Make sure you have a Mineral scanner.\n{random.pilot.split}

Now that you have all pieces of the puzzle you should know where to find the treasure. You will need to look for it in the far southern part of the sector, almost the size of the sector away from the centre.\n{random.pilot.goner}

Now that you have found the lost ship, bring it to the {object.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyard} in {object.sector.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyard} and talk to the Goner that is in charge there, he will know what to do.
I have retrieved the wreck, I'm hoping you can help me out.
Okay. I'll pay that sum after the ship is ready.
We will take the ship and repair it for you. This will take some time - we will contact you once it's ready. Make sure you have money ready by then.\n{actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyardactor}
You will have to hand over the ship otherwise we wont be able to repair it. Please change to another ship and contact me again when you're done.
Your ship is ready for pick-up. Please contact {actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyardactor} at the {object.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyard} in {object.sector.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyard}.
I'm here to pick up my repaired ship.

We have received the money, thank you. Your ship is being transferred to the hangar as we speak. Hope you enjoy the modifications. It was nice doing business with you. Have a safe journey. {actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyardactor} out!
We agreed that you pay on delivery. Sorry - no money, no ship. Come back when you have enough money on you.

Flight time 12:17 Enemy ships detected
Flight time 12:22 Incoming missiles. Impact is imminent. Logged enemy ships' IDs. Tracking IDs
Flight time 12:36
Flight time 12:37 Set emergency protocol alpha. Priority high.
Flight time 12:38 Shields critical.
Flight time 12:41 Hull breach. Internal defence systems failure.
Flight time 12:44 Unauthorised core system access. Ships systems overridden.
Flight time 12:45 Ships ID tracking complete. Ships are registered to {actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHofferactor}
Flight time 12:46 Set emergency protocol epsilon. Self-destruct sequence initiated. Self-destruct in 10 Minutes
Flight time 12:51 Self-destruct in 5 Minutes.
Flight time 12:54 Self-destruct in 2 Minutes. Point of no return reached.
Flight time 12:55 Self-destruct in 1 Minute. Scanning for life forms on board.
Flight time 12:55 Self-destruct in 30 Seconds. Scan for biological life forms complete. Results: 0 biological life forms on board.
Flight time 12:56 Self-destruct activated.
End log

Hello, {player.name}.
We are glad to hear that you have successfully captured the suspect. Please deliver him to us at the {object.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyard} in {sector.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyardsector}, I'll be expecting you.

Don't worry about the ship - we are sending one of our transports to retrieve it.

{actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHMilitary} out!

Welcome, pilot. We're glad you made it. We were starting to worry.\nWe will now transfer the prisoner from your ship and put him in custody for interrogation. Hopefully we will find out the whereabouts of the missing crew.\nOnce we do, we will need your services again to go and rescue them. We don't want to send an official military force for diplomatic reasons. In return for your efforts, we will fix the captured ship for you once it gets here and hand it to you when you return with the crew. We should have it fixed by then. We will contact you as soon as we know more. Time is of the essence if the crew is to survive.

Hello, pilot.
The interrogation was a success. We now know the location where the pirates are waiting for their leader. Since he is in custody, I don't think they'll get far as they are waiting for him. Now go and rescue the 7 crew members that are being held hostage on their transport ship.
Be aware though that we also know that there are several escorts protecting the TL, so make sure you have some support. You also will need to have a ship that has enough cargo space for the 7 crew members, including a cargobay life support system.

A hint: shoot the shields of the TL down, so that the crew can be beamed over to your ship. Report back to Argon Prime when you have the crew. Good luck, pilot.

Approach the ship and shoot its shields down. Keep your distance under 2km and its shields under 10% until all 7 crew members are beamed aboard. Make sure you have enough cargo space. Once you have been spotted there is no turning back. If you leave, the crew is dead.

Pilot, you have disappointed us. You have failed to rescue the whole crew. The crew members you left behind are probably dead by now.

We are sending a transport to your location to retrieve any crew members you may have rescued. Don't count on a reward.

{actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHMilitary} out!
You need a ship which has at least cargo class M or larger.
Safely deliver all crew members to the {object.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyard} in {sector.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHshipyardsector}.

Pilot, you have disappointed us. You have failed to rescue the whole crew. The crew members you left behind are probably dead by now.

We are transferring any crew members you may have rescued. Don't count on a reward.

{actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHMilitary} out!

Excellent job, pilot! I knew you would make it, we are transferring the crew to the sickbay as we speak. We are in great debt to you and as promised, you will get the Xperimental as reward; we have it docked at this station and transferred control to you. Be mindful though that this is a unique ship, so take good care of it.

{actor.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHMilitary} out!

Important Note: The Xperimental Shuttle is a prototype with high historical value, therefore the Argon Federation and the Terran Council have declared that any unauthorised reproduction of the ship is illegal.

To all allies of the Argon Military: five hours ago an Argon convoy was attacked by Yaki. The lead ship, an Argon Colossus, was boarded by Yaki mercenaries and the jumpdrive was activated. We are no longer aware of the ship's location or the status of its crew. If you have any information about the Colossus, AM1TH-01 or its crew, please contact an Argon Military official.
Okay, okay! I'll help you. But first at least replace the Advanced Satellite, those are neither cheap nor do they grow on trees. Once you replace it I shall give you the information you need.

The location of the lost crew of the Colossus has been determined. You must fly to {object.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHCrewship} in {object.sector.name@KTH_toplevel.KTHCrewship}, lower its shields and beam the Argon crew aboard your ship.

page.title: version 3.0 Plot Texts
page.t: (Obtain: A ship)with ten Marines and bring it here (objective texts from here on)
(Buy:)A bottle of Jon Kayean's (Jon Kayean's is a whisky brand)
Spies Like You (briefing titles from here on)
15th BRIEFING TITLE - unused, library doesn't allow it
Bloodhounds (a group of mercenaries) Pack Leader
Captain Matt Roberts, Argon Secret Service (persons from here on)
Agent Alexander Evans, Argon Secret Service
Nils Ryan, Dark Space Covert Operative
Kokalios Rurandis Yooses VI, Sales Clerk
Admiral Jarren Hayla, Argon Naval Forces

Greetings, pilot. I'm Captain Matt Roberts of the Argon Secret Service. We've been told of your capabilities, so we'd like you to report to Argon Sector M148, away from prying eyes, to discuss an employment opportunity. (messages to the player from here on)
Greetings, pilot. We have another task for you. Please return as soon as you can to the Dark Space Installation.
Please report back to me at the Dark Space Installation for a further mission briefing.
Reporting in. (conversation texts from here on)
Okay, so tell me about this employment opportunity of yours.

Well then, here's the situation: despite being the race with the smallest territory, the Terrans are the strongest military power we know of. This is due, to a large extent, to their doubtlessly superior technology; be it offensive, defensive or even medical technology. Until we catch up with them, the Argon Federation is at a severe disadvantage and the fragile peace in the Commonwealth is threatened. That is why we need access to Terran technology - no matter the cost. As the Terrans won't give anyone access to their technology, they leave us no choice but to take it by force.\nYou will be part of an infiltration team of the Argon Secret Service and your first mission will be to help set up a base of operations, then to steal terran technology and ultimately to supply us with this technology so that we can attempt to research and reproduce it. I don't think that I have to tell you that this is a top secret mission and that you must not be caught by the Terrans.
And what would be my first objective?
Do you want to take the job?
I'm here. What is this all about?

Stephen Torres works for a shady organisation called Dark Space. We need him on our side and to use his base for our own operations in the area. Our ultimate aim is to get our hands on some Terran, specifically ATF, tech. This guy is our way in as Dark Space also don't like the ATF much. He's been off the grid for a while, but his name suddenly popped up in some local pirate comms traffic that we intercepted. Since there aren't that many pirate bases in these parts, we expect he's likely to be lurking somewhere in the unknown sectors, south of Oort Cloud. We need you to get over there and locate him. Play it cagey at first, but remember that we want to be his friend.
Roger that. I'll try my best.
Greetings. I'm a bit lost, I was wondering if you could help. I'm looking for some well-paid work and I heard there's a pirate base around here somewhere with job opportunities.

Well, if you're looking for work at a pirate base, you're obviously not worried about getting your hands dirty. I've got a job for you if you're interested. It's a pretty straight forward task, just bring me some much-needed wares and you'll be adequately compensated. I'm transmitting the details to you now.
Sounds straight-forward enough. Count me in!
Okay, that's all the wares delivered as agreed.
Great job! You can take your money and run, but if you're still hungry for more Credits, there's something else you can do for me.
What's the job this time then?

You should know that a few of our men were captured by the Terran authorities a few weeks ago. We look out for our members but there is very little even we can do, if they are held captive on a USC capital ship. But now we've heard that they are going to be transferred to a high-security prison in the outer solar system. This is our chance to free them! They are in Oort Cloud as we speak, being moved aboard the Prison Ship, Tarsus. Shadow the convoy but don't attack it just yet! At some point you'll get word that our prisoners will attempt to take over the ship. Once that happens, we're counting on you to protect the transport from the escorts.
That's it, mission accomplished. I hope your men are all safe and well.
Yes, thanks to you, they're eating good food and enjoying their freedom. You are welcome here any time.

I'll be honest with you. My employers wanted me to show you how valuable an ally they... we can be. I believe that we both have similar aims and if you're willing, we can work together more closely towards achieving them.
I'm not going to overlook what you just did for us, but I need to know who your employers are before I jump into bed with them!
The Argon Secret Service. One of their agents would like to use your installation to coordinate operations in this area and to provide you with intel as appropriate.

Well, well, well. I was wondering how long it would take. I'd be very pleased to receive your colleague and any support we can get. We've lost too many good men to the ATF and USC recently, it's getting damned hard to make a dishonest living nowadays. Good, well I have men who need my attention. Farewell for now.
Thanks for being so understanding. Goodbye.
Right, I'm here. What do you have for me?

This is where it starts to get interesting. We'll fit a special sensor to your ship, which will enable you to scan a ship and download its blueprint data. The scanner is configured to work only on designated ships and can't be transferred. You need not worry about any bad reputation you might have with our Terran friends, constant transponder changes from our side will ensure that your signal is kept 'friendly' throughout all missions.
Unfortunately, we've not been able to get the scanner to this station, so we're going to have to build one here. We'll need you to go and get some parts for it first.
So show me what I need to do.
So would you like to take this mission on?

Very well. Our technicians will fit the scanner to your ship's avionics bay and then you should proceed to Oort Cloud. There you'll find an ATF Valkyrie, which is patrolling the outer sectors. You'll need to get close to it and thus initiate the scan. Simple enough. Are you in?
Certainly. It sounds like a cakewalk.

Excellent news. Well that's the first item on our list. I fear the next item on our list, an ATF Mjollnir, won't be as easy. Our intel suggests that the Terrans are testing some new tech on one of those in Kuiper Belt and although security shouldn't be too tight, we don't want to draw attention to ourselves in trying to eliminate the escorts to get close enough. We need you to speak to our friend, Torres to see if he knows any local muscle that can run interference while you capture the Mjollnir. Are you happy with that?
Hello again. My superior wishes to hire some local mercenaries to run interference on one of our operations. Do you know of any groups we can contact?

There are a few groups, but the ATF and USC keep them pretty well nailed down. Your best bet would be the Bloodhounds. Their leader is called Sheela and she can usually be found propping up the bar at the Orbital Patrol Base. Don't expect to get any cheap deals from her though.

Sheela, I was given your name by a friend who says you'd be able to provide some manpower for a little flying display in Kuiper Belt. I just need some pilots to provide a distraction while I get up close and personal with a ship there. What will that cost me?
You're looking at about one and half mill(ion). You'll get me and a couple of my best pilots. Sound good?
Sure, as long as you get the job done.
I'm going to have another go at capturing a Mjollnir in Kuiper Belt. Can you provide support again?
You're joking, right? You're not... Well the fee will be the same. Just don't screw it up this time!

Next you need to buy a Scabbard and put 10 marines on it. You'll be directing the marines in the Scabbard to dock at an ATF Research Base to steal the tech data they have there. Bold move, but that's not all. The marines will plant demolition charges as they exfiltrate. Boom! It's important that it's a Scabbard to maintain Terran cover. You must not pilot it yourself, as you will be needed to provide overwatch. How does that sound?
Sounds good. I'll get right to it.
That's done. Do you have anything else for me?

Since you're on a roll, yes! We know that there's an ATF Fenrir assigned to defence duties at the Orbital Defence Station in the Terran Unknown Sector. You can't just go and take it though, we need to be more clever than that. I'd suggest we try and gain remote access to the ship and fly it out of there. That, of course, is a pro-hacker job. There's a guy called Claussen who is holed up in Neptune; he's a sucker for the liquor but knows his way around a secure network. Go and see him and arrange the remote hack.
Roger that. I'm on my way.
Hello, I hear that you specialise in remote station hacking. I have a job that you're ideally qualified for.

Sounds like fun. It'll cost you though. Not cash - I need something special. There's a brand of spacefuel you can only buy at a distillery in Herron's Nebula, it's called Jon Kayean's but it's known to its friends as JK and it's of the highest quality. It's not cheap though. You'll need to deal with the distillery's Teladi sales clerk, Yooses.
Very well. I'll go and get that.
Hello there. I've come to purchase a flask of JK for a friend of mine. How much will that cost?
This special blend will cost you 25,000 Creditsss.
I've got your JK here. I hope you enjoy it.
Fantastic. You need to go and dock at the Orbital Defence Station in the Terran Unknown Sector, meanwhile I'll start doing my stuff. Goodbye.
Hello again. We had a few problems liberating that ship you hacked for us. I was just wondering if you could do it again.

What!? Do you realise how dangerous a second pass at that station would be? They will have analysed the attack vectors by now and put new controls in place. It's going to take some serious skills, which I have of course, to get through again. This time it's going to cost big money. 5 million Credits and you have a deal.

Greetings, pilot. You've done a great job there! It seems that our Headquarters has noticed our work, but we're going to need some more support from them if we're to continue acquiring all this Terran tech. We're going to take some time to look at what we have so far and that will give HQ time to gather the necessary resources to further support this mission. We'll contact you when you're needed again.
That's fine. I'll speak to you soon.
So what have you got for me?
Our next operation is to 'liberate' a Vali Corvette. Ambitious, I know, but I think it can be done.
Very well. Show me what I need to do first.
Do you want to take on this mission?
Evans told me to get back to you. I'm sorry. He didn't make it.

Yes, I just got word myself. All is not lost though. We have a lead on the Dark Space guys and we're tracking them down. I need you to make contact with a black market dealer, called Darren We, who can provide us with some much-needed Terran high-tech goods for our experiments.
Hi! Are you We? I need to pick up some goods.
The equipment has been transferred to your inventory. Go carefully, as it is highly illegal in Terran space.
Right, I've done that. I hope you have what you need.
Right, what do I need to do now?

It looks like the Dark Space agents have fled to a sector called Maelstrom and have established a pirate base somewhere in the sector. I need you to get over there and rendezvous with Admiral Jarren Hayla, who is leading a Navy task force in that sector. I imagine they could use your help.
Admiral Hayla, I've been tasked with providing you with some support.

We're having real problems locating the pirate base they have set up here. This nebula is seriously messing up our regular scanners and we can't locate the base using them. We'd like to transfer a prototype scanner upgrade to your ship to see if you get any luck locating the base. Basically, it shows you the distance to your target by beeping more or less. More beeps mean nearer, less beeps further away. As soon as you get near enough you'll also see a visual indication of where the pirate base might be located.
Report to Captain Matt Roberts of the Argon Secret Service at the {object.name@L2M015.M148Base} in {sector.name@L2M015.M148}. (briefing texts and messages to player from here on)
Rendezvous with Lt. Alexander Evans in {sector.name@L2M015.Pluto} to receive mission briefing.
Find and meet Stephen Torres of Dark Space in {sector.name@L2M015.US1}. We need to gain his trust in order for them to grant us access to their base.
Find out what Torres wants next.
Follow the USC Prison Transport into the outlying sectors. At some point the prisoners will attempt to take over the ship.
Keep us covered from those escorts. We're taking over the ship now.
Okay, that's it! We've got control of the ship, now make sure those escorts don't take us down.

Well done! We now have Dark Space on side and Agent Evans is already enroute to the Dark Space installation to set up our operation there. You're free to go about your business once more, but we may call on you again when there are further tasks.
Report to Agent Evans regarding your next mission for the Argon Secret Service.
Gather the necessary parts for the building of a blueprint scanner.
I'm afraid you're going to have to wait a short time while I put this scanner together.
Report to Agent Evans to have the scanner fitted to your ship's avionics bay.
It's time to get back to {object.name@L2M016.DarkSpaceStation} to have the scanner fitted.
You'll have to dock your ship at this station in order for us to fit the scanner onto your ship!
Proceed to {sector.name@L2M016.OortCloud} and scan the ATF Valkyrie fighter that is patrolling there.
Locate some mercenary manpower to assist in the mission.
Find and contact the Bloodhounds' leader and hire her mercenaries.
You do not have enough funds for the transaction.
Proceed to {sector.name@L2M016.KuiperBelt} to capture the ATF Mjollnir being tested there. Once captured the ship must be returned to {object.name@L2M016.DarkSpaceStation}.
We're beginning our attack now. Hurry up and do what you need to do.
That was a complete mess! You're lucky that another test is scheduled, so you get a chance to make up for your shortcomings. You will need to re-hire the mercenaries though... good luck with that.
Provide overwatch for your marines as they board the ATF Research Base, steal Terran tech data and then blow the station up.
The ship is ready. Get moving!
Don't remove the marines from the ship! They're crucial to the mission's success. Please put them back.
Don't try to pilot the TP yourself. If this goes wrong you'll get killed or even worse, you'll compromise the mission.
The marines are commencing boarding operations now.
The facility is now under our control. The data has been secured and the charges are being set.
Great, the research facility has been destroyed. We just need that data now.
Oh no! The TP has been destroyed! Luckily the Marines were able to transfer the data in time!
Good job! The TP has just docked and the data is now securely in our hands. It looks like there's a Thor blueprint amongst that data.

Buy a flask of Jon Kayean's finest spacefuel from {object.name@L2M016.HNBrewery} for {actor.name@L2M016.Claussen} as payment for his work. He will perform a remote hack of a station to gain access to a ship.
You don't have enough money to complete the transaction.
I'm starting the remote hack now. Standby for some Claussen magic!
That's it, I'm in. Ship hacked and is now under your control!
You foolishly allowed the ship to be destroyed! You're going to have to hire Claussen again for another hack.
You don't have enough funds to pay for that!
You will need to dock your ship at this station in order for your order to be processed!
Are you kidding? I'm certainly not coming over to your ship in order to get the bottle! Dock your ship at this station!
Report to Agent Evans for a mission briefing.
Terran forces are attacking us! Please help!
Defend the Dark Space station from enemy attack!
The pirates are stealing the ATF tech and are trying to make a run for it!
They're charging their jumpdrives to escape. Who knows where they could be going.
Oh, no! They have set charges in the station! I don't think we can clear them in time!
The charges are about to blow, I'm just about out of time. Get back to Roberts - you will find him in Nathan's Voyage. Here are his coordinates!
Report back to Roberts in Nathan's Voyage.
You are required to collect some High Tech goods
In order for me to have the goods transferred to your ship, you'll have to dock at this station.
You don't have enough money for that!
First you'll need to dock and relinquish that equipment.
The Argon Secret Service has narrowed down where the pirates have taken the stolen ATF ships to. You are to go and support their task force in retrieving those ships.
Good work, pilot. You've found the base. Don't do anything rash and attack the base until we've arrived to provide back-up.

They're attempting to make off with our ATF booty! Don't let those ATF ships get away - either grab them or toast them. Looks like they're trying to get away with the blueprints for the other ships too. Each has one aboard.
That's really good work, but it's not over. Get your bastu back to the Research Station, Terran forces are attacking it!
Task completed here. We're heading back to base.
It's too late! The reactor's going critical, it's gonna blow!
We found the base ourselves. We'll send you the location, but don't start an attack against the base until reinforcements have arrived.
Get out of here and make sure they never get their hands on those fighters!

Hello, {player.name}.

Don't be alarmed - you don't know me. I know you and what you've done. That's what is important.
Please consider these facts: all of the people you knew connected with this mission are now dead. As far as their bosses are concerned, the mission never happened, you never stole those ships, you don't posess them and you were never in the employ of the ASS.
Of course there's still the matter of that technology, those ships, which you had access to - maybe you still have. No one knows and you should make very sure that it stays that way. I don't think you'll ever want to be greeted by an ATF battlegroup first thing in the morning.

That's it. You have been warned.

page.title: L2 Generic Patrol
page.t: Patrol the sectors up to {sector.name@{param@DestSector}}. Take out any enemies you come across.
Patrol the sectors up to {sector.name@{param@DestSector}}. Take out any enemies you come across.

page.title: L2 TerraCorp Missions
page.t: Please return to {object.name@L2M41.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M41.HQ} for mission details.
We have a job requiring your attention. Please meet me at {object.name@L2M41.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M41.HQ}.
Return now to {object.name@L2M41.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M41.HQ} for details.
Terracorp requires outside assistance on several confidential jobs.
{3241,1000} A high-security convoy is currently en route to {object.name@L2M41.HQ} and extra escorts are required. Should you exceed performance criteria, further assignments may be available.
You have excelled in your task, pilot. There could well be a position here for you at Terracorp. We will contact you when a new assignment becomes available.
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is a pirate who's been spotted attacking several of our traders recently. We really need him stopped, if you are up to the task.

After losing several freighters this week, we've traced the cause to be a pirate faction, intent on stealing our cargo. We think that if you can remove {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} then they might stop attacking without any further loss of life.

There have been reports of a lot of civilian traffic round here coming under attack and we believe {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} to be the cause of these attacks. To make these sectors safer for all, we want you to eliminate him.
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is known to have committed several crimes against Terracorp. Elena Kho has now approved the order for his termination. Proceed immediately.
Excellent! Well done, pilot. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} had cost us too many lives already. We will contact you when we have any more jobs available.

Thank you, pilot. With {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} out of the picture, hopefully these pirates will become less aggressive towards us. We'll let you know when we've got another job lined up for you.

With {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} dead, hopefully the civilian traffic in the sector can rest more easily. Thanks for your help, and we'll let you know when we've got another job lined up for you.
Well done, pilot! You have performed admirably during this mission. We will contact you as soon as a new task is available.

We are running low on supplies and require a shipment of missiles delivered here to TerraCorp HQ to re-arm our ships. {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}} and {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}} are vital to help protect our ships and reduce loss of life.
These should help our escorts defend our ships from pirates. Thank you for your help. We will let you know when we have another job for you.

I need to meet with a station owner aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} to discuss trade rights. I need you to fly me over as fast as you can.

I need transporting to a meeting with a government official aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}. This trading contract is very important and I need to make a good impression by arriving aboard luxury transportation, so a passenger transport ship is required.
We've got an immediate threat against {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} from a pirate faction. Extra pilots are required to help protect it in case the pirates make good on their threat.

We think that {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} is about to suffer a pirate attack! There are many innocent lives aboard, so we can't risk the pirates causing any damage to it. Get over there and help out in case the pirates do show up!
It seems that {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} is now safe. Thank you, pilot. We will contact you when more work is available.
Thank you. With the pirate threat eliminated the residents of {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} can sleep easy once more. We will have to find you harder jobs in future!

We think that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} might be selling top secret military technology to the pirates that have been causing us trouble during these past few weeks. We simply can't let them become any more of a danger to shipping than they already are, so your next task is to follow {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} and find out what he is up to.
Thanks for your time and patience, pilot. We've already got a squad on the way to arrest {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} for his crimes. We'll contact you as soon as another job comes up.

We can't afford to let any more technology fall into pirate hands. I'm afraid both {actor.name@{param@Cue}.2 L0Mark} and {actor.name@{param@Cue}.3 L0Mark} need eliminating before the pirates can become a bigger threat to civilian traffic.
{{actor.voice@L2M41.Guide},841} Hopefully this will help minimise the pirate threat to these parts. We will contact you again soon.
We have a valuable convoy that requires protection. Please rendezvous with the convoy in {sector.name@L2M41.MissionSector} and protect them on the way to their destination.
Looks like your help was invaluable once again. We'll have to see what harder jobs we have available for you.

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} needs transporting here from {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} to discuss a business contract with us. Can you pick him up pronto?

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} needs transporting here from {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} to discuss a business contract with us. We need to make a good impression so you're going to need a passenger transport ship to pick him up in.

We've got a group of business contacts taking a break from negotiations who want to see the local sights. Can you take them out in a passenger transport and show them the local sectors? Try to show them something interesting!
OK, they seem to have come back relatively happy. Looks like it's back to trade negotiations for me. I'll contact you if anything comes up requiring your attention.

We've just received word that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is en route to a meeting with prominent pirate leaders to discuss further attacks against TerraCorp installations. We need him eliminated before he reaches his destination.

We've found out that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is on his way to hand over classified TerraCorp technology to a pirate faction. He needs to be stopped before he can make these pirates any more dangerous to shipping than they already are.
Hopefully that should reduce any further attacks against us. Another job well done, it would seem!
That's a major security issue averted. Well done! We'll contact you with another job shortly.

page.title: L2 OTAS Missions
page.t: I have a job offer from OTAS Corporation.
Please return to {object.name@L2M42.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M42.HQ} for mission details.
It would be worth your while to return to {object.name@L2M42.HQ}.
We have a job requiring your attention, please meet me at {object.name@L2M42.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M42.HQ}.
A new ship has been authorised for your purchase. The {lookup.type.name@L2M42.NewShipType} is now on sale at {object.name@L2M42.OtasSY}. {lookup.type.description@L2M42.NewShipType}
OTAS requires skilled pilots for general combat and security duties.
{3242,1000} Currently a very valuable convoy is inbound and we require additional escort fighters to protect it. If all goes well you may be considered for further work.
You have excelled in your task, pilot. There could well be a position here for you at OTAS. We will contact you when a new assignment becomes available.

After losing several freighters this week, we've traced the cause to be a pirate faction intent on stealing our cargo. We think that if you can remove {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} then they might stop attacking without any further loss of life.

There's been reports of much of the civilian traffic round here coming under attack, we believe {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} to be the cause of these attacks, so to make these sectors safer for all we want you to eliminate him.
Excellent! Well done, pilot. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} had cost us too many lives already. We will contact you when we have any more jobs available.

With {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} dead, hopefully the civilian traffic in the sector can rest easily. Thanks for your help, we'll let you know when we've got another job lined up for you.
Looks like your help was invaluable once again. We'll have to see what harder jobs we have available for you.

We've found out that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is on his way to seal a major business contract between two of our competitors. This will strengthen both of them against us, which we cannot allow to happen. Find and stop {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} before the deal can be finalised.
Well done! This should keep our competitors firmly behind us.

page.title: L2 Jonferco Missions
page.t: Jonferson Space Dynamics Division have another job offer for your attention.
I have a job from Jonferco.
Please return to {object.name@L2M43.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M43.HQ} for mission details.
Please return here and meet me at {object.name@L2M43.HQ}.
We have a job requiring your attention. Please meet me at {object.name@L2M43.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M43.HQ}
Jonferson Space Dynamics Division requires skilled pilots.
{3243,1000} One of our main clients requires transportation to {object.name@L2M43.HQ}. Further jobs will be available to pilots who can smoothly transport him here in a Passenger Transport.
Thank you, pilot. {actor.name@L2M43 Initial Offer.1 L0Passenger} is a very important visitor here at JSDD. We will contact you when further opportunities arise.

We have a client aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} who needs transporting here. We need you to get over there, pick up {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} and bring him back here.

We have a very important client aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} who needs transporting here. We need you to get over there as soon as possible in a TP class ship, pick up {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} and bring him back here. This contract could be worth a lot, so don't mess it up!

We have a very important client aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} who needs transporting here. We need you to get over there as soon as possible in a TP class ship, pick up {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} and bring him back here as soon as possible!

page.title: L2 Plutarch Missions
page.t: Plutarch Mining Corporation has a job which requires completing.
I represent Plutarch Mining Corporation. We have work for you.
Plutarch Mining has a job which may interest you.
Please return to {object.name@L2M44.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M44.HQ} for mission details.
Return to {object.name@L2M44.HQ}, I need to speak to you.
We have a job requiring your attention. Please meet me at {object.name@L2M44.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M44.HQ}.
Plutarch Mining Corporation requires transporter captains to move freight and passengers.

{3244,1000} We currently have a massive energy shortage here at {object.name@L2M44.HQ}. Should this opportunity interest you, your first requirement will be to deliver a shipment of {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} so that production may continue.

{{actor.voice@L2M44.Guide},2001} This should allow us to fully power up our systems again. A pilot of your calibre could do well here at Plutarch Mining Corporation; you will be contacted when further opportunities become available.

page.title: L2 NMMC Missions
page.t: NMMC has a job which may interest you.
I represent Nividium Mining and Manufacturing Corporation.
{3245,101} Please return to {object.sector.name@L2M45.HQ} for mission details.
Please meet me in {object.sector.name@L2M45.HQ}. {3245,103} Together we can make great profits!
We have a job requiring your attention. Please meet me in {object.sector.name@L2M45.HQ}.
Meet me here at {object.name@L2M45.HQ} and we will make profit together.
Return to {object.name@L2M45.HQ} and you will make profit!
NMMC requires skilled freighter captains to help transport cargo.

{3245,1000} At the moment we require high-tech goods to aid in the creation of more manufacturing components. If you can deliver these in an acceptable time-frame we may be able to offer further jobs.
Thank you, pilot. This cargo is just what we required. A pilot of your ability could do well here at NMMC; you will be contacted when further trading opportunities become available.

NMMC has a client aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} who must be transported here. We need you to get over there, pick up {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} and bring him here so that we may make profits trading with his company.

NMMC has a very important client aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} who must be transported here. We need you to get over there in a passenger transport, pick up {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} and bring him back here. This contract may be worth much profit to us!
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} plans to sell information that will cost us much profit. You must stop {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} before he can reach his destination!

page.title: L2 Duke's Bucaneers Missions
page.t: Duke's Buccaneers have something which may interest you.
I come with a job offer from Duke's Buccaneers.
Duke's Buccaneers have something requiring your attention.
You must return to {object.name@L2M46.HQ}! The Pirate Duke demands your attention!
The Pirate Duke demands your presence at {object.name@L2M46.HQ}!
We have a job requiring your attention, please meet me at {object.name@L2M46.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M46.HQ}.
Return now to {object.name@L2M46.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M46.HQ} for details.
Duke's Buccaneers require outside assistance on several confidential jobs.

Excellent, {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} had been irritating us for too long already. You may be well suited to working for us here at Duke's Buccaneers. We will alert you when we have other tasks which you are fit to complete.

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is a known insurgent within the Paranid Empire, confirmed to be working against Duke's Buccaneers. By order of the Pirate Duke your task is to eliminate him at all costs.

Your next task will be the removal of a spy within our midst. The unholy traitor, {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}, must be destroyed before he can further damage our organisation. This comes directly from the Pirate Duke.
Excellent! Well done, pilot. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} had been irritating us for too long already. We will alert you when we have other tasks which you are fit to complete.
Well done, pilot. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has paid for his crimes. We will contact you when we have other tasks requiring your attention.
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}'s influence over the Priest Emperor has been limiting our capabilities in recent weeks. We need him removed from his position as soon as possible.

Well done, pilot. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} will trouble us no longer. You have proven yourself worthy once more. We will contact you when we have other tasks requiring your attention.

Although this is not your usual line of work, we are running low on supplies and require a shipment of missiles delivered here to Duke's Haven to re-arm our ships. {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}} and {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}} are required to bring us up to full strength.
Very well done, pilot. This should reduce losses suffered by our glorious fleet. We will alert you when we have other tasks for which you are fit to complete.

I require immediate transportation to meet a contact aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}. Our superiority must be demonstrated by arriving in luxury transportation so a passenger transport ship is required.

I need transportation to a meeting with the Priest Duke of {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}'s representative aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}. I will not dishonour him by arriving in anything other than luxury transportation. A passenger transport, TP class ship, is required.
We've got an immediate threat against {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} from a pirate faction. Extra pilots are required to help protect it in case the pirates make good on their threat.

We think that {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} is about to suffer a pirate attack! There are many innocent lives aboard, so we can't risk the pirates causing any damage to it. Get over there and help out in case the pirates do show up!
It seems that {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} is now safe. Thank you pilot. We will contact you when more work is available.
Thank you. With the pirate threat eliminated the residents of {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} can sleep easy once more. We will have to find you harder jobs in future!

We think that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} might be selling top secret military technology to the pirates that have been causing us trouble during these past few weeks. We simply can't let them become any more of a danger to shipping than they already are, so your next task is to follow {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} and find out what he is up to.
Thanks for your time and patience, pilot. We've already got a squad on the way to arrest {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} for his crimes. We'll contact you as soon as another job comes up.

We can't afford to let any more technology fall into pirate hands. I'm afraid both {actor.name@{param@Cue}.2 L0Mark} and {actor.name@{param@Cue}.3 L0Mark} need eliminating before the pirates can become a bigger threat to civilian traffic.
{{actor.voice@L2M41.Guide},841} Hopefully this will help minimise the pirate threat to these parts. We will contact you again soon.
We have a valuable convoy that requires protection. Please rendezvous with the convoy in {sector.name@L2M46.MissionSector} and protect them on the way to their destination.
Looks like your help was invaluable once again. We'll have to see what harder jobs we have available for you.

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} needs transporting here from {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} to discuss a business contract with us. Can you pick him up pronto?

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} needs transporting here from {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} to discuss a business contract with us. We need to make a good impression so you're going to need a passenger transport ship to pick him up in.

We've got a group of business contacts taking a break from negotiations who want to see the local sights. Can you take them out in a passenger transport and show them the local sectors? Try to show them something interesting!
OK, they seem to have come back relatively happy. Looks like its back to trade negotiations for me. I'll contact you if anything comes up requiring your attention.

The Pirate Duke has discovered that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has turned against us and will tell the Priest Emperor our most holy secrets. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} must not be allowed to reach his destination.
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has been sent to eliminate one of our agents. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} must be stopped before he can reach him.
Well done again. Our secrets are safe for now.
You have done well in ending his pathetic life. May your assistance to Duke's Buccaneers continue.
The Priest Emperor now knows that which we did not desire him to. You disappoint us lowerlife.
The life of one of our most honourable associates now hangs in the balance. With your pathetic attempts at this mission you have disgraced yourself pilot.

page.title: L2 Atreus Missions
page.t: Atreus Shipbuilding Currents requires your assistance.
Atreus Shipbuilding Currents needs your help.
Please return to {object.name@L2M47.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M47.HQ} for mission details.
Atreus Currents graciously request your presence at {object.name@L2M47.HQ}.
We have a job requiring your attention. Please meet me at {object.name@L2M47.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M47.HQ}.
Atreus Shipbuilding Currents requires transport pilots. We have several lucrative contracts worth many Credits!

{3247,1000} Initially we ask that a shipment of our newest {lookup.type.name@SS_WARE_WICHIPS} must be safely transported to one of our clients. Pilots who can supply a suitable ship will be most welcome to complete further tasks for us.
Many thanks, pilot. We have received word that the delivery has been completed. We will contact you soon when Atreus Currents requires your help.
