{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has been seen attacking several of our defenceless freighters in recent weeks. Many Boron lives have been lost. We ask that you end this threat to our lives.
You have saved many lives. Thank you. We will contact you with further jobs.

page.title: L2 Strong Arms Missions
page.t: Split Strong Arms has work for you.
This is your job offer from Split Strong Arms.
The Split Strong Arms Corporation ask you to return to {object.name@L2M48.HQ}.
Return now to {object.name@L2M48.HQ} in {object.sector.name@L2M48.HQ} for details.
Split Strong Arms has much work for a combat pilot who can prove his worth in battle.

{3248,1000} {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has been trying to ally the Rhonkar and the Zyarth against our organisation. We give you chance for glory! If you can destroy {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} then we may have further work for you.
Excellent! {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is now no more! Split Strong Arms has need of further warriors like you. We will contact you when we have more work for you.
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has been seen attacking several of our suppliers in recent weeks. You have been allowed the honour of destroying him in battle!
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has insulted Split Strong Arms. Destroy him and make an example to others that those who break their contracts will be punished!
I have found out that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is trying to take my job. Their family has ordered attacks against my own. I ask that you destroy them on my behalf.
Split Strong Arms needs {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} to be destroyed. Do this and you will earn much honour within our family.
Well done. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} had cost us too many supplies already. We will contact you when we have more jobs available.
Excellent! {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has now paid the ultimate price. We will contact you later.
Thank you, warrior. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} will trouble us no more!

We are running low on supplies and require a shipment of missiles delivered here to {object.name@{param@HQ}} to re-arm our warriors! {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}} and {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}} are vital to our warriors' combat effectiveness!

Split Strong Arms need more weapons to equip our ships! Deliver the following shipment: {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}} and {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}} are vital to our warriors' combat effectiveness!
Split impressed by fast delivery. Transporting wares to storage. Return later to work for Strong Arms.
These should help our warriors defend our assets from attack. We will let you know when we have another job for you.

I need transportation to a meeting with the Patriach's representative aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}. This meeting is very important and I must not dishonour them by arriving aboard anything other than luxury transportation such as a passenger transport, TP class, ship.

page.title: L2 Sector Battles
page.t: The evil {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} must be stopped. We will take {sector.name@{param@Attacksector}} in the name of the Argon Federation!

The Senate has decided that {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} rule of {sector.name@{param@Attacksector}} is an injustice to the people who live there. We will liberate {sector.name@{param@Attacksector}} in the name of freedom!
The {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} show us no mercy or respite. We must take their sector in the name of self defence!
We will take {sector.name@{param@Attacksector}} from the cowardly {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} for the glory of the Split Dynasty!

The might of the Paranid Empire must be displayed to those who would doubt us. The unholy {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} were not meant to rule {sector.name@{param@Attacksector}}. It is the Emperor's will that we 'liberate' this sector.

The unholy {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} are not fit to govern {sector.name@{param@Attacksector}}. It is the Emperor's will that we take this sector from the lowerlifes and install true three-dimensional government!
Owning {sector.name@{param@Attacksector}} will make the Teladi Company much profit. We will take it now, before the {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} can reinforce their defences.

Recent reports have indicated an unusual build up of {param@EnemyRace} ships in {sector.name@L2M50.EnemySector}. The {param@OfferRace} Military require additional pilots to help defend {sector.name@L2M50.Sector} from this {param@EnemyRace} threat.

The {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} must be stopped! Recent intelligence indicates that the {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} are planning a massive strike against this sector. Reinforcements are required!
We have heard that the {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} are planning a massive attack against us. We are peaceful people; please help us!

The {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} are planning a massive attack against us here in {sector.name@{param@Sector}}. Please help us defend {sector.name@{param@Sector}}; we are a peaceful people. Queen Atreus will richly reward those who help.

The cowardly {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} are planning to attack us here, in our sector, {sector.name@{param@Sector}}. The {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} must never be allowed to rule this sector!
The cowardly {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} are going to attack us here in {sector.name@{param@Sector}}. Your chance for honour in battle awaits you, defending {sector.name@{param@Sector}}!

The unholy {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} are planning to attack us here, in our sector, {sector.name@{param@Sector}}. The {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} must never be allowed to rule this sector!

We offer you great profit opportunity! {sector.name@{param@Sector}} is vital to the Teladi Company. We cannot lose it for loss of profits. Help us defend {sector.name@{param@Sector}} and we will compensate you well!

We require an urgent shipment of missiles; specifically {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, to deal with the {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} threat coming from {sector.name@{param@Attacksector}}.
The {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}} Military urgently need your help. {3250,2011}
{3250,2011} Allies of the {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}} Military are needed to deliver this critical equipment.
{3250,2011} Allies of the {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}} Military are needed to deliver this critical equipment.

page.title: L2 Transport Passengers
page.t: You must be travelling slower than {value@this.MaxSpeedReal}m/s to scan this object.

page.title: L2 Generic Assassination
page.t: The traitorous scum {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has stolen a large sum of money from our headquarters in {player.sector.name}. For his crimes and treachery he must die!
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has escaped from a maximum security prison. He is a dangerous criminal and must be stopped.

The notorious criminal {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has cunningly escaped the custody of the {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}} authorities. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is thought to be well armed, and skilled pilots are needed to bring him to justice.

I come to you with all the Credits I have saved since the death of my firstborn. Many years ago, a {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} pirate landed on this station and under our very noses, stole her away from us. We know we will never see her again, but I will happily pay you all the credits I have if you show him that we have never forgotten, nor forgiven.

My business partner {random.pilot.{param@EnemyRace}} recently disappeared along with the contents of our bank account. It seems that this is not the first time as he now goes by the name of {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} must be brought to justice for his crimes before anyone else can be conned out of their money!

My partner, {random.pilot.{param@OfferRace}}, was recently taken hostage and killed by a {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} cartel when we could not pay. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is dangerous and well armed but must be stopped!
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is a known insurgent, thought to be experimenting with illegal AI technology. His immediate termination has now been authorised.

We recently tracked down the whereabouts of {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}, a known deserter who abandoned his post during the Kha'ak battles. His immediate termination has been authorised by the United Space Command.

We have indisputable evidence that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} passed classified Terran technology to other races in exchange for various services. He is a traitor to all of humanity and must pay for his crimes.

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has been confirmed to have passed military access codes to an outside contact. We cannot allow these aliens to access our defence network. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} must be eliminated immediately.

Well, there's no way he could have lived through that! At last, {actor.name@L2M101 Create St Offer.1 L0Mark} has been brought to justice. As promised, we are delivering your reward of [b]{value@L2M101 Create St Offer.RewardCr}Cr[/b] immediately.

The {lookup.race.name@{value@L2M101 Create St Offer.1 L0OfferRace}} government wishes to thank you for your outstanding efforts against crime. For your services, we present you with the promised reward of {value@L2M101 Create St Offer.RewardCr} Credits.
Well done! {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has now paid for his crimes\n\nHere's your {value@L2M101 Create St Offer.RewardCr} Credits.
Are you even looking for {actor.name@L2M101 Create St Offer.1 L0Mark}? {{actor.voice@L2M101 Create St Offer.Guide},851}
That's it! I'm getting someone else. {3301,1201}
Looks like {actor.name@L2M101 Create St Offer.1 L0Mark}'s dead, but don't think I'm going to pay you for letting someone else do the job!
You let them escape! What use are you?

page.title: L2 Generic Transport Passenger
page.t: I desperately need to get to a meeting aboard {object.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} but my ship's in for repairs.

I need a pilot with a fast ship who can transport passengers to help me deliver some important documents. My usual pilot has fallen ill and I need to get these documents distributed as soon as possible.

I'm late for an important meeting aboard {object.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} and need a pilot with a fast ship to get me there as soon as possible.
I want to pay a visit to {random.pilot.{value@L2M103.OfferRace}} aboard {object.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest}.

I require luxury transportation to a meeting aboard {object.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest}. A pilot with a passenger transport ship is required.
I need a pilot with a Passenger Transport to help me deliver some important documents. My usual pilot has fallen ill and I need to get these documents distributed as soon as possible.

I'm late for a very important meeting aboard {object.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} and need a pilot with a passenger transport to get me there as soon as possible.

I want to pay a visit to {random.pilot.{value@L2M103.OfferRace}} aboard {object.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest}. I need a pilot with a passenger transport to take me there.

I need to get to {object.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@L2M103 Offer.{param@ID} L0Dest} and require a ship for hire. I will not tolerate sub-standard transportation, so only pilots of a passenger transport ship need apply.

page.title: L2 Deliver Wares
page.t: Our usual supplier has gone out of business. Without an urgent delivery of {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} production here will grind to a halt.
Recent pirate attacks have left us unable to acquire enough {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}. An urgent delivery is required to keep productivity high.

Recent good sales here at {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Station} have been far more than we expected. Unfortunately, this has thrown our production cycle out of schedule and we have run low on resources. We desperately need {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}

One of our main rival's workers have walked out on strike. Low on resources, they will be unable to supply all their customers who will be forced to come to us. We need to build up additional stocks of {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} to meet the demand.

We are expecting a big order from one of our customers and need to step up our production but we are running low on {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}. Pilots with a ship that can carry {lookup.type.cargoclass.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} freight size or bigger are needed for an urgent delivery.

Our last shipment of {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} was destroyed in an engine plasma-venting incident in the docking area. An urgent delivery is required as soon as possible.
We are running low of {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} and require an immediate shipment.
Excellent! Transferring your {value@L2M104 Offer A.RewardCr} Credits now.
Excellent! Transferring your {value@L2M104 Offer B.RewardCr} Credits now.
Excellent! Transferring your {value@L2M104 Offer C.RewardCr} Credits now.
My usual supplier has gone out of business. I need an urgent delivery of {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}.
Recent pirate attacks have left us unable to acquire enough {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}.
I've got people waiting for this stuff so I need an urgent delivery of {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}.

I'm planning a party tonight but unfortunately I've run out of {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}. I need {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} units as soon as possible.

page.title: L2M105 Return Ship
page.t: Thank you. Ship control has been set to us. You have earned {value@L2M105 Return Ship.RewardCr} Credits.
Your time is up and you failed to return the ship. It has been listed as stolen and the police have been informed.
I have received word that the ship has been destroyed! Very unfortunate. I can only pay you {value@L2M105 Return Ship.RewardCr} for the attempt.
You have destroyed the ship. The authorities have been informed.
The destination station has been destroyed and the client was killed. The mission has ended.
Thank you. Ship control has been set to us. You have earned {value@L2M105 Return Ship.RewardCr} Credits.
Your time is up and you failed to return the ship. It has been listed as stolen and the police have been informed.
I have received word that the ship has been destroyed! Very unfortunate. I can only pay you {value@L2M105 Return Ship.RewardCr} for the attempt.
You have destroyed the ship. The authorities have been informed.
The destination station has been destroyed and the client was killed. The mission has ended.
Thank you so very much. I didn't really expect to see this ship again. Please accept payment of {value@L2M105 Return Ship.RewardCr} Credits. Farewell.
Your time is up and you failed to return my ship. I trusted you with this task but you give me grief!
I have received word that my ship has been destroyed! Very unfortunate. I can only pay you {value@L2M105 Return Ship.RewardCr} for the attempt.
You have destroyed my ship. The authorities have been informed.
The destination station has been destroyed and the client was killed. The mission has ended.
One of our pilots has abandoned a ship in a nearby sector. We need someone to bring it back.

A pilot abandoned a ship. Return {object.name@{param@ShipName}}, {object.code@{param@ShipName}} in {object.sector.name@{param@ShipName}} to {object.name@{param@DestName}}, {object.sector.name@{param@DestName}}.
My ship has been stolen. It is getting further away as time goes by. I am willing to pay good money for its return! Please help.
The ship is currently in {object.sector.name@{param@ShipName}}, apparently heading {param@Direction}(gate direction). Capture it before it gets to its destination, then return it to me.

page.title: L2 Battle Ships
page.t: Recent reports have indicated an unusual build-up of {lookup.race.name@{value@L2M108 XI.EnemyRace}} ships in {sector.name@L2M108 XI.EnemySector}. The {lookup.race.name@{value@L2M108 XI.OfferRace}} Military require additional pilots to help defend {sector.name@L2M108 XI.Sector} from this {lookup.race.name@{value@L2M108 XI.EnemyRace}} threat.
Many thanks. In recognition of your services we are transferring your {value@L2M108 XI Offer.RewardCr} Credits.

page.title: L2 Follow Ship
page.t: One of my employees is passing confidential data to my rivals. I need someone to follow him to find out where, when and how.

I've been working undercover for the {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}} authorities for 3 years now. I've almost cracked a dangerous smuggling ring, but need someone to follow {actor.name@L2M113 Offer.1 L0Mark} back to his base of operations and relay me the information.
One of my associates is working against me, of that I'm sure. I need someone to follow him and find who he's been talking to.
{object.name@L2M113 Offer.1 L0Dest} is known to be in use by my rivals, this all but proves it. {{actor.voice@L2M113 Offer.1 Guide},841}
Receiving data, looks like they are operating from {object.name@L2M113 Offer.1 L0Dest}. {{actor.voice@L2M113 Offer.1 Guide},842}
{object.name@L2M113 Offer.1 L0Dest} is known to be in use by my rivals, this all but proves it. {{actor.voice@L2M113 Offer.1 Guide},841}
You were meant to follow him, not destroy him! {{actor.voice@L2M113 Offer.1 Guide},846}
You were supposed to follow him to his destination. {{actor.voice@L2M113 Offer.1 Guide},846}
You were meant to follow him, not destroy him! {{actor.voice@L2M113 Offer.1 Guide},846}
You've lost them? How are you going to follow them now?
You've lost them? I wanted to find out what he was up to!
I told you not to get too close! {{actor.voice@L2M113 Offer.1 Guide},847}
I told you not to get too close! {{actor.voice@L2M113 Offer.1 Guide},847}

page.title: L2 Transport Cargo
page.t: Recently a large group of {object.race.name@L2M116.Station} refugees arrived here at this station. We are becoming increasingly short of medical supplies and have found a supplier at {object.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} but urgently need the supplies transported here.

We just ordered a batch of the newest entertainment chips off {actor.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0M16Holder} at {object.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start}. Unfortunately {object.sector.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} Transport Union members are on strike, so we require a transporter to retrieve the chips.

The legendary Triskele champion Imanckulot is holding a party to celebrate his 12th championship win. We have been asked to supply Luxury Foodstuffs in addition to entertainment for the event and require a courier to transport the food over from {object.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start}.

A recent ion storm caused damage to our navigational systems here which has led to several malfunctions. We need a replacement set of cartography chips transferred over from {object.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} to ensure that our docking facilities can continue to correctly track incoming ships.

A containment failure in the secondary reactor aboard {object.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} has produced a large excess of radioactive waste that we have agreed to process. Pilots with a ship capable of carrying {lookup.type.cargoclass.name@SS_WARE_RWASTE} cargo are required to transport the radioactive material.

Only an hour ago I obtained a shipment of {value@L2M116 Offer.Amount} unknown artefacts. The artefacts are located aboard {object.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@L2M116 Offer.{param@ID} L0Start} and are very important to my archaeological research. I need them transported immediately so that they can be placed in a secure environment before they can be contaminated.

My name is {actor.name@L2M116 Offer.1 Guide}. My ship's engine overloaded upon undocking from this station and I am now late for an important meeting. I require a shipment of Engine Components transported immediately to fix my ship.

page.title: L2 Trade Convoy
page.t: That was great work! All of our ships have reached their destination. You will receive {value@L2M119 Convoy Offers.RewardCr} Credits for your efforts.
The destination has been destroyed. We have been forced to end the mission. Thank you for your support.
Unacceptable! You have neutralised a ship. We will inform the police of this act. This mission is over.
A ship has been destroyed! You have not performed well here and I am forced to end this mission.
We have been forced to change the destination. We are now heading for {object.name@{param@DestName}} in {object.sector.name@{param@DestName}}.
We will not work with the likes of you any longer. This mission is over.

There are no longer any ships on the way. {value@L0M19.Finished Ship Count} out of {value@L0M19.Initial Number Of Ships} made it. You will receive {value@L2M119 Convoy Offers.RewardCr} Credits for your efforts.
There are no longer any ships on the way. All the ships have been lost and none of them made it. This is unacceptable.
We've missed our deadline! Forget it.
A fighter pilot is needed to escort this trade convoy to {sector.name@{param@DestSector}}.
A fighter pilot is needed to escort this trade ship to {sector.name@{param@DestSector}}.
Escort {group.object.count@{param@GroupName}} trade ships until they reach their destination in {sector.name@{param@DestSector}}.
Escort the {group.object.1.name@{param@GroupName}} until it reaches its destination in {sector.name@{param@DestSector}}.

page.title: L2 Build Stations
page.t: Times are good and my company is currently looking to invest in a new station in {sector.name@L2M122.Sector}. Experienced sub-contractors are required. The station must be built next to the beacon we have placed.

We recently lost a station in a Xenon attack and are looking for someone to build us a new station in the sector {sector.name@L2M122.Sector}. The station must be built next to the beacon we have placed.

Station construction in {sector.name@L2M122.Sector} required. Pilots must arrange their own transportation and construct the station themselves. The station must be built next to the beacon we have placed.

page.title: L2M27 Destroy Convoy
page.t: Great work! I see none of the ships reached their destination. As promised, you will receive {value@L2M127 Convoy Offers.RewardCr} Credits.
You killed {value@L2M127.Kill Count} out of {value@L2M127.Convoy Count}. Thankfully none of them made it to their destination. You will receive {value@L2M127 Convoy Offers.RewardCr} Credits.
You killed {value@L2M127.Kill Count} out of {value@L2M127.Convoy Count} but {value@L2M127.Finished Count} got to the station. You will receive {value@L2M127 Convoy Offers.RewardCr} Credits.
You didn't manage to kill anyone. You were not what I expected.
Not only did you not kill anyone but {value@L2M127.Finished Count} ships got to the station.
All of the ships got to the station! Pray we never meet again.
A fighter pilot is needed to destroy this trade convoy in {group.object.random.sector.name@{param@GroupName}}.
A fighter pilot is needed to destroy this trade ship in {group.object.random.sector.name@{param@GroupName}}.
Destroy {group.object.count@{param@GroupName}} trade ships before they reach their destination in {sector.name@{param@DestSector}}.
Destroy the {group.object.1.name@{param@GroupName}} before it reaches its destination in {sector.name@{param@DestSector}}.

page.title: L2M134 Generic Capture Passengers
page.t: You have captured all of the people. Very good work.
You're out of time and you didn't capture anyone!
You're out of time and only captured a few of the people.
You have harmed someone! This is unacceptable.
Someone has been harmed. I needed them all alive!
My intel says that all of the people have been lost. This is a disaster.
You have captured all of the people. Very good work.
You're out of time and you didn't capture any criminals!
You're out of time and only captured a few of the criminals.
You have harmed someone! This is unacceptable.
Someone has been harmed. I needed them all alive!
My intel says that all of the criminals have been lost. This is a disaster.
{group.object.count@{param@Actors}} criminals need to be caught before they offend again.
{group.object.1.name@{param@Actors}}, a dangerous criminal, must be caught.
You need to catch {group.object.count@{param@Actors}} criminals before they escape.
{group.object.count@{param@Actors}} criminals must be transported as soon as possible.
{group.object.1.name@{param@Actors}}, a criminal, must be transported as soon as possible.

page.title: L2 Deliver Matching Ship
page.t: You have selected {object.name@L2M129.Ship}. Ship control has been set to us. You have been paid {value@L2M129.Reward} Cr.
Your time is up and you failed to deliver the ship.
You have selected {object.name@L2M129.Ship}. Ship control has been set to us. You have been paid {value@L2M129.Reward} Cr.
Your time is up and you failed to deliver the ship.
You have selected {object.name@L2M129.Ship}. Ship control has been set to us. You have been paid {value@L2M129.Reward} Cr.
Your time is up and you failed to deliver the ship.

page.title: L2 Transport Passengers
page.descr: The mission variations for Transport Passengers
page.t: You have successfully transported all the passengers. You have been rewarded {value@L2M130 Transport Passengers.RewardCr} Credits.

It looks like you were only able to transport {value@L2M130.End Passengers} out of {value@L2M130.Passenger Count} passengers. I'm sure some of my clients will not be happy.\n{value@L2M130 Transport Passengers.RewardCr} Credits have been transferred to your account.
Your time is up and you failed to transport the passengers. This mission is over for you.
We have received word that you have harmed a passenger! The authorities have been notified and your contract terminated.
A passenger has been harmed! This is unacceptable! Your contract has been terminated.
You could not even transport one passenger safely! This is a tragedy.
Unfortunately we have lost contact with the destination station. Next time you dock somewhere the passengers will disembark.
You need a cargobay life-support system and at least {value@L2M130.NeededSpace} units of cargo space.
You need a passenger transport ship for this job.
Good work, pilot. You have successfully transported all of the military personnel. You have been paid {value@L2M130 Transport Passengers.RewardCr} Credits.

It looks like you were only able to transport {value@L2M130.End Passengers} out of {value@L2M130.Passenger Count} military personnel. Did you leave the others swimming out there? You have been paid {value@L2M130 Transport Passengers.RewardCr} Credits.
Your time is up and you failed to transport the passengers. Your attempt at hindering the war effort has not gone unnoticed.
We have received word that you have harmed one of the personnel! I consider this an act of war. You had better watch your back.
I hear a passenger has been harmed! This is unacceptable! Your contract has been terminated.
The loss of my men at your hands has forced me to take action. I hope you are ready to die!
Unfortunately we have lost contact with the destination station. We will end the mission.
You need a cargobay life-support system and at least {value@L2M130.NeededSpace} units of cargo space.
You need a passenger transport ship for this job.
{group.object.count@{param@PassengersName}} personnel are in need of a ride to get to work as soon as possible.
{group.object.1.name@{param@PassengersName}} is in need of a ride to get to work as soon as possible.
{group.object.count@{param@PassengersName}} personnel need to get to work as soon as possible.
{group.object.1.name@{param@PassengersName}} needs to get to work as soon as possible.
to a {lookup.race.name@{param@StationRace}} Station in {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(race station in sector)
to a Station in {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(station in sector)
{group.object.count@{param@PassengersName}} military personnel need to get to the front line as soon as possible.
{group.object.1.name@{param@PassengersName}} needs to get to the front line as soon as possible.
{group.object.count@{param@PassengersName}} military personnel need to get to the front line as soon as possible.
{group.object.1.name@{param@PassengersName}} needs to get to the front line as soon as possible.
to a {lookup.race.name@{param@StationRace}} Station in {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(race station in sector)
to a Station in {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(station in sector)

A military contingent, consisting of {group.object.count@{param@PassengersName}}, is in need of a transport to a station. The ship must have a cargo life-support system. Minor enemy contact is expected. Only battle-hardened pilots need apply.
{group.object.1.name@{param@PassengersName}} needs to get to a station as soon as possible.
Transport {group.object.count@{param@PassengersName}} military personnel. Watch out for opposing forces. Try and give the troops a nice smooth ride.
{group.object.1.name@{param@PassengersName}} needs to get to a station as soon as possible. Watch out for opposing forces.
to a {lookup.race.name@{param@StationRace}} Station in {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(race station in sector)
to a Station in {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(station in sector)
The sector ownership is in contention and battles are expected. {group.object.count@{param@PassengersName}} civilians need transportation out of the sector.
The sector ownership is in contention and battles are expected. {group.object.1.name@{param@PassengersName}} needs to get out of here as soon as possible.
Transport {group.object.count@{param@PassengersName}} civilians out of the sector, {sector.name@L2M130.StartSector}, to escape the imminent battles.
{group.object.1.name@{param@PassengersName}} needs to get out of the sector, {sector.name@L2M130.StartSector}.
to a {lookup.race.name@{param@StationRace}} Station in {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(race station in sector)
to a Station in {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(station in sector)

page.title: L2M133 Generic Anti Smuggler Police
page.t: You didn't scan any ships in the sector!

Here is your report, pilot.\nYou managed to scan {value@L2M133.TotalShipsScanned} ships, {value@L2M133.IllegalShipCount} of which contained illegal goods. It all added up to {value@L2M133.Catch} Credits' worth of illegal goods.
I see you managed to stop some people-smugglers! Impressive.
That was a hell of a bust! The police of {sector.name@L2M133.Sector} thank you.
Well, that wasn't very good, was it pilot? Several smugglers probably slipped through the net!
You've earned {value@L2M133.Reward} Credits for this job.
You will not be paid for this job!
You didn't scan any ships, pilot. What were you doing?
We've been monitoring your sensor data.\nYou managed to scan {value@L2M133.TotalShipsScanned} ships with a total cargo worth of {value@L2M133.Catch} Credits'.
I see you also spotted some potential slaves.
I think the plundering will keep us busy for some time! Thank you.
On behalf of the {lookup.race.name@{value@L2M133.OfferRace}}, I thank you for wasting our time. You better watch your back.
You've earned {value@L2M133.Reward} Credits for this job.
You will not be getting any credits from us!
You didn't scan any ships at all. So many ships have probably escaped us, fully laden with Spacefuel no doubt! We will not tolerate lazy people like you, so you will not be getting paid for this job.
You didn't catch anyone with illegal goods. At least you tried. Seeing as you scanned {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} ships, you will receive {value@L2M133.Reward} Credits.
Not a bad job there. You scanned {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} ships and found {value@L2M133.Catch} credits worth of illegal goods. We see fit to pay you {value@L2M133.Reward} credits.
That was one hell of a catch there! You scanned {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} ships and found {value@L2M133.Catch} credits worth of illegal goods. We see fit to pay you {value@L2M133.Reward} credits.
You didn't scan any ships at all. So much freight passed you by while you were off sightseeing. If you ask for a job in the future, I'll gladly appoint you my airlock safety inspector.
You didn't find anything of worth at all! Bah, seeing as you scanned {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} ships, I suppose you can have {value@L2M133.Reward} credits.

Quite a respectable catch. Our boys will start tracking the cargo and take out the ships in due time. You scanned {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} ships and found {value@L2M133.Catch} Credits worth of goods. Here is your share: {value@L2M133.Reward} Credits.

My friend, that was a great catch! You scanned {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} ships and found {value@L2M133.Catch} Credits worth of goods! We'll catch up with them and ask them politely to share the wealth. Here is your share: {value@L2M133.Reward} Credits.
Anti-Smuggling police are needed to crack down on illegal goods being trafficked through all sectors.
Anti-Smuggling police are needed to crack down on illegal goods being trafficked through {sector.name@{param@Sector}}.
Anti-Smuggling police are needed to crack down on illegal goods being trafficked through {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors.
Anti-Smuggling police are needed to crack down on illegal goods being trafficked through core {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors.
Anti-Smuggling police are needed to crack down on illegal goods being trafficked through border {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors.
Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} for illegal wares. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay.
Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in {sector.name@{param@Sector}} for illegal wares. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay.
Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors for illegal wares. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay.
Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in core {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors for illegal wares. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay.
Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in border {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors for illegal wares. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay.

An increase in military forces across the Commonwealth has reduced the income for many freelance pilots. We need a skilled pilot to scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in any sector. If good, fruitful scans are returned, we will share a cut of the spoils.

Police intervention across the area has reduced income for many of us freelance pilots. We need a skilled pilot to scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in {sector.name@{param@Sector}} for valuable goods which they may wish to part with.

Police activity across the area has reduced the income for many of us freelance pilots. We are in need of a skilled pilot to scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors.

Police activity in {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors has been relaxed lately. We wish to use this opportunity for a nice little earner. We need a skilled pilot to scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in core {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors and report back any good finds.

{lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} police have been pulled back to core sectors to deal with rising people-trafficking. We wish to use this opportunity for a nice little earner on the outskirts. We are in need of a skilled pilot to scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in border {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors.
Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} for cargo worthy of being stolen. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay. The more cargo you find, the more you will be paid.

Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in {sector.name@{param@Sector}} for cargo which is good enough to steal. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay. The more cargo you find, the more you will be paid.

Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors for valuable wares. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay. The more cargo you find, the more you will be paid.

Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in core {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors for cargo worthy of being stolen. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay. The more cargo you find, the more you will be paid.

Scan any {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} in border {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} sectors for cargo worthy of being stolen. Use the freight scanner to scan their cargo bay. The more cargo you find, the more you will be paid.

page.title: L2M134 Generic Patrol
page.t: Patrol complete, pilot. No enemy ships were eliminated. Still, we will pay you {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits for your time.
Only one enemy contact was eliminated. It is adequate. Thank you for your time. {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits have been transferred to you.
Well done on the patrol.\nYou eliminated {value@L2M134.TotalShips} ships and have earned {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits for your efforts.
You do not have the notoriety to complete this mission. Your contract has been terminated.

Patrol complete, pilot. Either it was really quiet along the way or you're not what we expected. You didn't manage to eliminate any enemy ships. Still, we will pay you {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits for your time.
You only eliminated a single enemy contact. No matter; every little helps. Thank you for your time. {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits have been transferred to you.
Nice job on the patrol.\nYou eliminated {value@L2M134.TotalShips} ships and have earned {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits for your efforts.
If I had known that you would be a problem, I would not have given you the job. Mission terminated.

Patrol complete, pilot. Either it was really quiet out there or you're not what we expected. You didn't manage to eliminate any enemy contacts. Still, we will pay you {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits for your time.
You eliminated a single enemy contact. Better luck next time. For your efforts {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits have been transferred to you.
Nice job on the patrol.\nYou eliminated {value@L2M134.TotalShips} ships. You've earned {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits for your efforts.
We don't need aid from the likes of you. Mission terminated.
Xenon activity is reducing, not that you noticed. You didn't manage to eliminate any Xenon contacts. Still, we will pay you {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits for your time.
You eliminated a single Xenon contact. I am quite sure the Xenon will not be swayed from attacking again. For your efforts {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits have been transferred to you.
Good job, pilot.\nYou eliminated {value@L2M134.TotalShips} Xenon ships. Perhaps the Xenon will think again next time. You've earned {value@L2M134.Reward} Credits for your efforts.
I think we can hold off the Xenon without your troublesome presence. Get out of here!
A slot in a local patrol force has opened up for any pilots with fight experience. The patrol will be to the sector {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}.
Patrol the sector {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}. Take out any enemies of the {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}} government.
A slot in a local patrol force has opened up for any pilots with fight experience. The patrol will take place in {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}.
Patrol the sector {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}. Take out any enemies of the {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}} government.

We have reason to believe that Xenon activity is going to increase some time soon. We need defence ships to step up patrols in {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}. Be aware that Xenon activity may peak at some time during this patrol.
Patrol the sector {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}} and defend against Xenon ships. Be wary of a possible full-scale Xenon invasion.

page.title: L2 Defend Object
page.t: Pirates are going to attack my station! They told me that if I didn't pay up, they would come back and destroy {object.name@L2M135.Station}. I couldn't afford to pay them and now desperately need someone to help me.
Hey, some shady characters told me that bad things could happen to my station if I didn't pay them for 'security'. I've decided that I should indeed have some security before they come back!
They won't be coming back round here in a hurry. {{actor.voice@L2M135 Offer.Guide},2005}
{{actor.voice@L2M135 Offer.Guide},841} Transferring your {value@L2M135 Offer.RewardCr} Cr now!

page.title: Search For Object
page.descr: Text for search for object mission
page.t: I believe that a very high-yield asteroid is located far outside the centre of this sector.

I believe that a very high-yield asteroid is located far outside the centre of this sector. Search around the following location: X = {object.position.x.m@L2M137.Object}m, Y = {object.position.y.m@L2M137.Object}m, Z = {object.position.z.m@L2M137.Object}m.
I believe that there is a group of very high-yield asteroids located far outside the centre of this sector.

I believe that there is a group of very high-yield asteroids located far outside the centre of this sector. Search around the following location: X = {object.position.x.m@L2M137.Object}m, Y = {object.position.y.m@L2M137.Object}m, Z = {object.position.z.m@L2M137.Object}m.
Payment will be received when the asteroid is found.
When it is found, scan it.
When you find it, destroy it.
When you find it, you will be paid the reward.
When you find it, scan it.
When you find it, destroy it.
Payment will be received when the asteroids are found.
When they are found, scan them.
When they are found, destroy them.
When you find them, you will be paid the reward.
When you find them, scan them.
When you find them, destroy them.
I believe that a special ship is located far outside the centre of this sector.

I believe that a special ship is located far outside the centre of this sector. Search around the following location: X = {object.position.x.m@L2M137.Object}m, Y = {object.position.y.m@L2M137.Object}m, Z = {object.position.z.m@L2M137.Object}m.
I believe that there is a group of ships located far outside the centre of this sector.

I believe that there is a group of ships located far outside the centre of this sector. Search around the following location: X = {object.position.x.m@L2M137.Object}m, Y = {object.position.y.m@L2M137.Object}m, Z = {object.position.z.m@L2M137.Object}m.
Payment will be received when the ship is found.
When it is found, scan it.
When you find it, destroy it.
When you find it, you will be paid the reward.
When you find it, scan it.
When you find it, destroy it.
Payment will be received when the ships are found.
When they are found, scan them.
When they are found, destroy them.
When you find them, you will be paid the reward.
When you find them, scan them.
When you find them, destroy them.

page.title: L2M145 Scan Asteroids
page.descr: Text for the scan asteroids mission
page.t: Asteroid data received. I see you scanned all of the listed asteroids; my employer will be pleased. As agreed, you will be paid {value.formatted@L2M145.RewardCr} Credits. Thank you and travel safe.

The asteroid data was received and verified. I see that you scanned a high yield asteroid. This is a very interesting find. You have earned {value.formatted@L2M145.RewardCr} Credits. I will pass this information to my superiors.

Asteroid data received. Incredible! A Nividium asteroid. This is most unexpected! My employer will be pleased. As agreed, you will be paid {value.formatted@L2M145.RewardCr} Credits. Thank you and travel safe.

Asteroid data stream received. You have returned data on only {value@L2M145.ScannedCount} asteroids. Was there a problem? Perhaps our initial information was outdated. I see no reason to reduce your payment. You will be paid {value.formatted@L2M145.RewardCr} Credits.
The deadline has passed and you still have not delivered the information. I hope you did not keep the information for yourself. My employer is not going to be happy about this.
What is this? There is no asteroid information here! My future in this organisation is in jeopardy, all because of your failure! Leave me.

My employer is interested in the asteroid composition in this area. Unfortunately, my schedule is too full to allow me to perform the job myself. Scans are needed for {group.object.count@{param@GroupName}} asteroids across {value@this.DiffCount} sectors.\n{35,2167}{17,2753}

My employer is interested in the asteroid composition in this area. Unfortunately, my schedule is too full to allow me to perform the job myself. Scans are needed on {group.object.count@{param@GroupName}} asteroids in the sector {object.sector.name@this.Nearest}.\n{35,2167}{17,2753}

My employer is interested in the asteroid composition in this area. Unfortunately, my schedule is too full to allow me to perform the job myself. Scans are needed on an asteroid in the sector {object.sector.name@this.Nearest}.\n{35,2167}{17,2753}
Return the asteroid data to {actor.name@L2M145.Offerguy} within the time limit.

page.title: L2 Buy Used Ship
page.t: I have a used ship for sale. It's in good condition. It's priced at {value.formatted@L2M150a.iShipPrice} Credits.
I no longer need my {object.type.name@L2M150a.UsedShip} as I have purchased a newer model. I am willing to sell it for {value.formatted@L2M150a.iShipPrice} Credits.
I would like to upgrade to a new ship, but I need more Credits. I am willing to part with my reliable {object.type.name@L2M150a.UsedShip} for {value.formatted@L2M150a.iShipPrice} Credits.

page.title: L1 Corporation Missions
page.t: {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} has been seen attacking several of our ships in recent weeks. We need him dealt with.
Well done. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} had cost us too much already. We will contact you when we have more jobs available.

We are running low on supplies and require a shipment delivered to {object.name@{param@HQ}} containing {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}} and {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}}.

We are running low on supplies and require a shipment delivered to {object.name@{param@HQ}} containing {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} and {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}}.

We are running low on supplies and require a shipment delivered to {object.name@{param@HQ}} of {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}.

The following shipment is required: {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}} and {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}}.

The following shipment is required: {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} and {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}}.
The following shipment is required: {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}.
Thank you. These supplies may prove crucial. We will let you know when we have another job available.

Something's come up aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} that I need to take care of. Can you get me over there as soon as possible?

I need to meet with a station owner aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} to discuss trade rights. I need you to fly me over there as fast as you can.

I need to get to a meeting aboard {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}. It is very important that I make a good impression, so a TP class passenger transport is required.
We've got an immediate threat against {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object}. Extra pilots are required to help protect it!
We've got an immediate threat against {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} from a pirate faction. Extra pilots are required to help protect it in case the pirates make good on their threat.

We think that {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} is about to suffer a pirate attack! We can not risk the pirates causing any damage to it. Get over there and help out in case the pirates do show up!
It seems that {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} is now safe. Thank you. We will contact you when more work is available.
Thank you. With the pirate threat eliminated the residents of {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} can sleep easy once more. We will have to find you harder jobs in future!
Pirates have threatened our very existence. We need pilots to help defend {object.name@{param@HQ}}!
It seems that {object.name@{param@HQ}} is now safe. Thank you. We will contact you when more work is available.

We think that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is secretly working against us. Your next task is to follow {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} and find out who they are meeting with and what their destination is.

Well done, pilot. We already have someone hacking in to retrieve the passenger manifest. This should help us to uncover {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}'s activities. We'll contact you as soon as another job comes up.

Looks like {actor.name@{param@Cue}.2 L0Mark} is definitely working against our corporation. Both {actor.name@{param@Cue}.2 L0Mark} and {actor.name@{param@Cue}.3 L0Mark} need to be eliminated for their crimes.
{{actor.voice@L2M41.Guide},841} We will contact you again soon.
We have a valuable convoy that requires protection. Please rendezvous with the convoy in {sector.name@L2M41.MissionSector} and protect them on the way to their destination.
Looks like your help was invaluable once again. We'll have to see what harder jobs we have available for you.

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} needs transporting here from {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} to discuss a business contract with us. Can you pick him up pronto?

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} needs transporting here from {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} in {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} to discuss a business contract with us. We need to make a good impression so you're going to need a passenger transport ship to pick him up in.

We've got a group of business contacts taking a break from negotiations who want to see the local sights. Can you take them out in a passenger transport and show them the local sectors? Try to show them something interesting!
OK, you have done well, and they seem pleased. I must attend further negotiations. I'll contact you if anything else comes up requiring your attention.
We have discovered that {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is on his way to hand over classified data to an outside contact. He must be prevented from reaching his destination.
You have helped prevent a major security issue. Well done! We'll contact you with another job shortly.

page.title: L0 Assassination
page.t: Rendezvous with {actor.name@OBJ01.Guide} at {object.name@OBJ01.dest}, {object.sector.name@OBJ01.dest}. They will provide you with the necessary information about {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}.

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is in sector {object.sector.name@{actor.ship@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}} flying {actor.ship.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} - {actor.ship.code@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}
I've got a contact who has determined the location of {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}. They'll let you know where he is.
You'll need to rendezvous with my contact nearby. They will provide you with the necessary information about {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}.
Lucky for you I already hired someone to find him, so if you meet with them first they'll transmit his location to you.
What have you been doing? I gave you plenty of time to get rid of {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} and you haven't done it yet? Forget it!
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} Must Not Be Allowed to Live!
I'm here to get the coordinates.

page.title: L0 Steal Ship
page.t: {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} is in sector {object.sector.name@{actor.ship@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}} flying {actor.ship.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} - {actor.ship.code@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}. We need you to bring back {actor.ship.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} - {actor.ship.code@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} intact.\n\nMake him eject!
Ok, now deliver the {lookup.type.name@{param@Ware}} back to me here at {object.name@L0M02 Drop.Dest}.
Ok, now deliver the {object.type.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target} and {lookup.type.name@{param@Ware}} to {object.name@L0M02 Drop.Dest}.
Ok, bring us the {object.type.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target} back to us at {object.name@L0M02 Drop.Dest}.
Ok, bring us the {object.type.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target} back to us at {object.name@L0M02 Drop.Dest} for analysis.
Remember, you must fly {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target} to make him think that you are his contact.
Excellent, we now just need to dispose of the evidence.\n\nQuickly destroy {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target} before anyone can trace it back to us.
Well done, you need to go to {object.name@this.Dest} to meet {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0EnemyAgent} and obtain the information.
Well done, you need to go to {object.name@this.Dest} to meet {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0EnemyAgent} and obtain the {lookup.type.name@{param@Ware}}

Pick me up, here at {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}. I need to get to {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.
Ok, get me to {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.

Clear me some room then.\nAbout {lookup.type.cargospace@SS_WARE_PASSENGER} cargo units should do.
Time for me to get off.
You were supposed to have picked me up by now! Mission cancelled.

page.title: Generic player replies
page.t: I'm looking for a job.(Player asking for a job)
I've heard you're looking for help.
You got a job for me?
Are you looking to hire a combat pilot?
What's the job?(Player asking to see the briefing)
OK, I'll do it. (Player accepting the job)
Fine by me, I'll take it!
OK, I'll do your dirty work.
OK, I'll do whatever you want.
I don't have time for that. (Declining job)
Nice talking to you but no thanks.

Can I see that briefing again?
I'm here to pick up the cargo.
How's it going? Where are you off to?
Do you have something to offer?
I'm looking for a particular service.
I'm here to donate some money!
I need someone to hack a station!
Can you hack into a station's computer?

I need an enemy station made neutral!

I'd like to buy some asteroid data.
You got any asteroid data for sale?

Do you have any new asteroid data for sale?
I will buy 5 high yield asteroids

Have you got any sector maps for sale?

Sell me some local star charts!
You got any sector maps to sell?
I need some local sector maps!

What blueprints you got for sale?

Got any ship schematics for sale?

I like the look of those wares!

Have you got any marines I can hire?
