Are you now? I'm not in a desperate need for money right now, but I'll make a deal with you.

I've run into a spot of trouble, now I've swapped my old ship for a second hand fighter which will help me with my problem. Thing is it needs some equipment before it will be of any use, if I leave the station in it as it is I'll be a sitting duck.\nYou bring me the equipment, and the shares are yours, I'll even pay for the equipment.
So, have we got a deal?

Great Work Pilot, with this equipment I should be able to make my problem go away.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR1ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares, plus [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.WareValue}[/yellow] Credits to cover the cost of the equipment.

Hello {player.name}, we have traced another of {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}}'s shareholders to the {object.name@L2M024.RecoverStation{value@L2M024.RecoverNo}} in {object.sector.name@L2M024.RecoverStation{value@L2M024.RecoverNo}}.\n\n[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
Yes, and a poor investment they turned out to be.
Possibly, however I have a more pressing issue to deal with at the moment.
I've just got word that one of my stations is about to come under attack.\nI'll tell you what, you help protect my station, then the shares are yours.
Yes the station has been destroyed.
Yes, indeed, however if you still want the shares, I have discovered who was behind the attack.\nMake sure they're disposed of and the shares are yours.
Thank you, the station is now safe.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR2ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.
Well done! {actor.name@L2M024 Shares2 Offer.1 L0Mark} has now paid for their crimes.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR2ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.

Alas no more, I foolishly used my strong box containing the shares as collateral in a game of cards recently. I'd dearly like to get it back as it contains other items of sentimental value.\nThe person who has it won't speak to me, but maybe you could try and get it back in exchange for the shares?
Indeed I do. Poor card player that one, very fortunate for me.
Maybe we could trade? You bring me something and we deal.
You bring me this, I give you the strong box.
It's my final offer, take it or leave it.
I have received the ship, thank you. If you dock here I will hand over the strong box.\n\n[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
Thank you for recovering my strong box.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR3ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.
Possibly, or possibly you could help me with a problem.

Several of my trade convoys have been attacked by the Yaki, nothing major, but enough to disrupt my business.\nI have two convoys due to depart from different stations, but currently have no escorts available for them.\nIf you could get them safely to their destinations you can have the shares.

Excellent work pilot, all {value@L2M024 Shares4 Offer.1 L0M83 Convoy Total} Ships made it safely to their destinations.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR4ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.

You managed to get {value@L2M024 Shares4 Offer.1 L0M83 DockedCount} out of a total of {value@L2M024 Shares4 Offer.1 L0M83 Convoy Total} Ships safely to their destination.

I'll give you [green]{value@L2M024.SR4ShareReward}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares for those that arrived safely. The rest you'll have to buy off me for [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR4SharePayAmount}[/yellow] Credits.

[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]

Both convoys have been destroyed!! Call yourself a combat pilot? Get out of here, this mission is over. You'll have to buy the shares off me for [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR4SharePayAmount}[/yellow] Credits.\n\n[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]

What are you playing at Pilot?! I have enough trouble with the Yaki attacking my convoys without you helping them out. This job is cancelled.

The shares you'll have to buy, and the price just doubled to [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR4SharePayAmount}[/yellow] Credits.

[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]

Going get a little tough did it? Well thanks for nothing.

You'll have to buy the shares off me for [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR4SharePayAmount}[/yellow] Credits.

[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
Thank you, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR4SharesBought}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.
You know what my price is.
I've been let down by one of my suppliers, and as a result some of my factories are running short of resources. You get me the resources I need, and the shares are yours.

Great work Pilot, this should keep my factories running for a while.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR5ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares, plus [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR5WareValue}[/yellow] Credits to cover the cost of the wares.

Hello {player.name}.

We've just got word that one of {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}}'s shareholders, a Boron by the name of Molo Do, was recently killed.
Their personal effects have been put up for auction at the {object.name@L2M024.RecoverStation{value@L2M024.RecoverNo}} in {object.sector.name@L2M024.RecoverStation{value@L2M024.RecoverNo}}.

You'd better hurry over there, {value@L2M024.SR6ShareAmount} shares are in Lot 42, listed as assorted papers.

[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
You're a bit late, the auction's almost over.
That's starting now, looks like you were just in time.
Here you go. Lot 42, assorted papers of one Molo Do including [green]{value@L2M024.SR6ShareAmount}[/green] shares in {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}}.
You have insufficient funds in your bank at present to pay for the shares. Please come back when you are able to pay.
Your bank has declined the transfer of money for Lot 42. Please return when you have sufficient funds to cover the cost.
I have decided to go into the Crystals business, and am looking for someone to build me a station and supply it with enough resources to get it running. You do this for me and the shares are yours.

Excellent work Pilot, the station is up and running.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR7ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares, plus [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR7WareValue}[/yellow] Credits to cover the cost of the station and resources.
Pilot, it's crucial that you have 25 units of space fuel for the plan to work. Get some more immediately.

OK Pilot, we're on board.
Our latest intelligence puts {actor.name@L2M024.Rival} in {object.sector.name@L2M024.SR8 TargetShip}, so that would be a good place to start.

[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
Pilot, we all need to be on the same ship if we're going to complete this mission.
I think we must have spooked him and he's jumped away. Let's search the nearby sectors, I don't think he'll have gone far.
We've lost him, probably trying to lose us when he thought we weren't looking. Let's search the nearby sectors, I don't think he'll have gone far.
OK, we've managed to plant the space fuel on {actor.name@L2M024.Rival}'s ship, let's go and tip off the police.\n\n[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]

Great, it looks like {actor.name@L2M024.Rival}'s been arrested, let's get back to {object.name@L2M024.RecoverStation8} in {object.sector.name@L2M024.RecoverStation8}.\n\n[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
{actor.name@L2M024.Rival}'s flying off, something has gone wrong, we'd better find out what.\n\n[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
{actor.name@L2M024.Rival}'s jumped away, something has gone wrong, we'd better find out what.\n\n[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]

That's not good, we're going to have to dispose of him now. You can take care of it yourself, but there may be repercussions.
If you've got some spare Credits, then {actor.name@L2M024.Pirate} on the {object.name@L2M024.SR8 PirateBase} in {object.sector.name@L2M024.SR8 PirateBase} can usually be relied on to provide some assistance to get the job done.

[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
You don't have the Credits to buy our services. Come back when you have enough money.
Thank you for your business. {actor.name@L2M024.Rival} will soon be taken care of.
That's them dealt with, looks like our work here is done. Let's get back to {object.name@L2M024.RecoverStation8} in {object.sector.name@L2M024.RecoverStation8}.
We have recently had a number of customers cancel their parcel delivery contracts with us. Our investigations have discovered that a smaller independent supplier has started to undercut our prices.
The easiest solution would be simply to 'dispose' of them, but that may lead to some awkward questions.\nWe have decided the best course of action is to discredit them.

I have a couple of mercenaries on the way to assist you, what I need you to do is acquire 25 units of space fuel, which we'll plant on the rivals ship, then tip off the local police.\nOnce you have the space fuel come back here to pick up the mercenaries.
It certainly is, can you point him out to us?
They explained that someone must have planted the space fuel in their ship, and gave us a donation for the Argon Police Christmas fund, so we let them off with a warning.
They've made a run for it.
We'll post a bulletin about him being wanted, but he's out of our jurisdiction now.
That won't be a problem, as long as you have the Credits.

It is, but the 'accident' will be in no way traceable back to you.\nYou could try one of the cheaper individuals who offer the same service, but don't blame me if the police trace the hit back to you...

Well done Pilot, news of {actor.name@L2M024.Rival}'s arrest should soon be reaching his customers.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR8ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.

Getting away with bribing a Police Officer would suggest that they have some influential friends.
At least they won't be interfering with our business again.

As promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR8ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.

Resisting arrest, never a good idea with those trigger happy {lookup.race.name@{value@L2M024.SR8 TargetRace}} Police.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR8ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.
So they tried to make a run for it, didn't get very far from what I hear.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR8ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.
I did, however they were on one of my ships when I was moving to a new sector.

The pilot thought they could save some time and tried taking a shortcut across a Xenon sector. The last message we got was that they were abandoning ship.\nThe ship is still there, the pilot we have had no news of yet.\nIf you were to return the ship to me, I'd gladly exchange the shares for it.
So what do you say, do we have a deal?

Yes, so I gather. I however have some better news; the pilot was rescued by a military convoy passing through the sector. They managed to get some of my documents off the ship when they abandoned it, amongst them the shares you were after.
Have them? I believe we had a deal, you return my ship and I give you the shares. I am still a ship down, you replace it and you can have the shares.
I think that's a fair offer, don't you?
Thank you for recovering my ship.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR9ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.
Thank you for the ship.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR9ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.
Select the ship you wish to turn over.\n\n[center][select value='TurnOverShip'] {object.name@L2M024.SR9AbandonedShip} [/select][/center]

Hello {player.name},

I need to speak to you with regards to the {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Corporation.

Please contact me at the {object.name@L2M024.EndStation} in {object.sector.name@L2M024.EndStation}.

[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]

Hello {player.name},

I thought I ought you let you know I have sold {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}}.

With the reputation restored, business going well and the majority of shares back in my possession I was approached by Scionfire who made me an offer for the Corporation.

Well the money was on the table and I got out whilst I could.

Could you please contact {actor.name@L2M024.EndGameActor} at the {object.name@L2M024.EndStation} in {object.sector.name@L2M024.EndStation}, as there are a few loose ends they need to tie up with you.


[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
You're going to need 25 units of Space Fuel before we can start this mission.
You're going to need to clear some cargo space if we're both going to get on board.
Your ship's cargo class is insufficient for this mission.
We'd appreciate being able to breathe whilst on board, you're going to have to get cargo lifesupport or a passenger transport, if we're going to start this mission.
I've been let down by one of my pilots, and I have a tour due to depart. If you help me out, you can have the shares.

Excellent work Pilot, the tour group seem extremely happy with the trip you took them on.\n\nHere are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR5ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares, plus [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024 Shares5 Offer.RewardCr}[/yellow] Credits as promised.
If you still want the shares come and see me, I have another little job you could do for me, one that doesn't involve lifeforms...

Well at least you managed to accomplish that task adequately...
I would invite you to the party, but I'd fear for my guests safety.

I suppose you've earned these, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR5ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares, plus [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR5WareValue}[/yellow] Credits to cover the cost of the wares.
You're lucky I don't subject you to the same fate as those passengers...
I'm sure you do, however I am looking for some supplies to loosen people up, get them in the mood, if you catch my drift...
It certainly will, but can you get the goods?

[center][red]Deed of Sector Ownership[/red][/center]

Standard Galactic Co-ordinates: [yellow]X = 12, Y = 4[/yellow]

Sector Name: [yellow]{sector.name@L2M024.PlayerSector}[/yellow]

Registered Owner: [yellow]{player.name}[/yellow]

Date: [yellow]768-05-{value@L2M024.Playdays}[/yellow]


Signed: [i]Kokalis Tumulis Gustiosanis IX[/i], Sector Registrar.
On behalf of Stellar Cartography, PTNI Headquarters.
I don't understand, I was convinced it would work.
Hello {player.name}, I think I know how to get it to work. Come by the {object.name@L2M024.ResearchStation} and I'll fill you in on the details.

You need to talk to Uckmanckamstras, he definitely has the Cartography Chips we need, all you have to do is collect them.\nThere's a good chance he'll have got his hands on some Hacker Chips as well by the time you get there, if not he'll know who you can get them off of.\nI'll upload the details of where to find him to your ship's computer.

Unfortunately not, the only person I could find with any available is Jennaia Sahkarna, and she won't deal with me due to a minor disagreement.\nI'll give you her details, just don't tell her I sent you.\nIn the meantime if you dock I'll load up your Cartography Chips.
You're going to have to free up some cargo space, 20 units should be enough to do it.
Doubtful. But I can sell you 20 Hacker Chips for 150,000 Credits.
Hello {player.name}, we've finished equipping your ship and it's ready for collection.\n\n[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]
Excellent, it shouldn't take much longer to get things working here. I'll let you know when I'm ready to give it a try.
OK, I think we're ready to attempt the forced connection.
Unfortunately the ship got destroyed before reaching it's destination, can you modify another for me?
Certainly, just deliver another ship and we'll sort it. I'll have to charge you again for our services, I'm sure you understand.
Of course, I'll sort a ship out for you.
OK, let's try again. We're going to have to get a TL class ship to complete the mission.

The station has been destroyed!!
Preliminary data from the scene indicates that you were responsible.

In light of this I have a new deal for the shares.
First I need to replace my {lookup.type.name@{value@L2M024.S2DefendStationType}} at a cost of [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.S2StationCost}[/yellow] Credits.
Next there are set up costs of [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.S2StationSetUp}[/yellow] Credits to get the station running again.
Finally there are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR2ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares, currently valued at [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR2ShareValue}[/yellow] Credits.

You pay me a total of [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M024.SR2ReplaceTotal}[/yellow] Credits and the shares are yours.

[center][select value='Accept'] OK [/select][/center]

A payment of {value.formatted@L2M024.SR2ReplaceTotal} Credits needs to be paid to replace the {lookup.type.name@{value@L2M024.S2DefendStationType}} at a cost of {value.formatted@L2M024.S2StationCost} Credits, set up costs of {value.formatted@L2M024.S2StationSetUp} Credits, and {value.formatted@L2M024.SR2ShareValue} Credits for the shares.
I'm here to pay for the {lookup.type.name@{value@L2M024.S2DefendStationType}} I destroyed.
Purchase and set up of station, plus cost of shares.
Thank you for taking responsibility for your actions.\n\nAs promised, here are the [green]{value@L2M024.SR2ShareAmount}[/green] {3224,{value@L2M024.CorpNameID}} Shares.
We'll get to work on this right away. I'll be in touch when it's ready.

page.title: Common Mission Lines
page.t: Completing this mission will deal a crippling blow to our enemies.
This task is of utmost importance to the war effort.
Completion of this task will aid the war effort immeasurably.
You have been given a {object.class.name@RewardedShip} class {object.type.name@RewardedShip}.

page.title: L2 Generic Assassination
page.t: An ace {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} pilot has been causing us all sorts of trouble; disrupting supplies and plundering freighters. This must stop, by any means necessary.

page.title: L2 Transport Cargo
page.t: As squad leader for some military reserves, it's up to me to keep the lads organised, ready to go and of sound mind. Unfortunately, I think I've pushed them too far and I'd like to make up for it by getting them a little something. I need someone to pick up some bottles of {lookup.typename.name@SS_WARE_DUMMY32}. That's the good stuff!

My name is {actor.name@L2M116 Offer.1 Guide} and I have a food requisition order. Our troops and pilots are not enjoying the cold reaches of the Solar System and morale is getting low. If we could get some {lookup.typename.name@SS_WARE_LFOODSTUFF} it would do them a world of good!

page.title: L2 Build Stations
page.t: Now we have our new station in place, we'd like to get it fully operational as quickly as possible. In order to achieve this we are looking for someone to supply the resources to start production.
In order to maximize profits we need to get our new station into production as soon as possible. We need someone to deliver the necessary resources to get things moving.
Excellent! Transferring your {value@L2M122 Offer A.RewardCr} Credits now.

If you're interested I have another job for you. Contact me at {object.name@L2M122.station} in {object.sector.name@L2M122.station}.

{object.name@L2M122 Offer.1 L0M22 BuiltStation}

page.title: L2 Deploy Object
page.descr: Texts for deploy object generic mission
page.t: You will be reimbursed the cost( of the deployed object).
(End)We are transferring the {value@L2M142.Reward} credits you've earned.
(Partial Success)Well, I suppose it will have to do. {3342,2}

Your time is up and you failed to deploy anything. I hope you know how disastrous this is! I can only hope that the enemy doesn't attack this sector before we've gotten someone more competent to do the job.

page.title: L2 Multiple Transport
page.t: I've made a bit of a mess of the shuttle schedule, and I'm going to need some help to sort it out.\nThe passengers along with their collection point and destination sectors are listed below.\nI need someone with a passenger transport, and would be grateful if you could help me out.

You were supposed to have picked up and delivered all the passengers by now! This mission is cancelled, just let any passengers you bothered to collect off at the next station you dock at and I'll find some one more reliable to do the job.\n\nI will however pay you [green]{value.formatted@L2M181.PartialPay}[/green] credits for the [yellow]{value@L2M181 Offer.1 Passengers Delivered}[/yellow] passengers you managed to deliver.

Looks like my destination has been destroyed! Could you take me to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint {counter@DCount}}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint {counter@DCount}}[/red] instead please.

The station {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger {counter@DCount}} was travelling to has been destroyed! Their destination has changed to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint {counter@DCount}}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint {counter@DCount}}.[/red]
Authorities are investigating {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger {counter@CCount}}'s sudden departure.
One of the stations you were due to collect from has been destroyed in {sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} MissionSector {counter@CCount}}, so there are no passengers left to collect there...
This Mission is cancelled. If you still have passengers on one or more of your ships, please have them dropped off at a station where we can arrange for a reliable pilot to collect them.
Good work Pilot, you seem to have managed to deliver the passengers safely. Transferring your payment now.

Call yourself a professional!! Killing your passengers or selling them into slavery is not a good idea. This mission is cancelled, and I'd appreciate it if you could drop any remaining passengers off at a station... Preferably alive.

What are you playing at Pilot!! I know some of the passengers can be a little obnoxious at times, but shoving them out the airlock is not the answer... This mission is cancelled. If you have any passengers left on board could you drop them at a station and spare them the indignity of a spacewalk...
Thank you {player.name} for agreeing to help me with this task. Here are some fuller details of the passengers and where they need transporting from and to.

{3381,181200}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 1}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 1}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 1}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 1}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 1}.[/red]

{3381,181201}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 2}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 2}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 2}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 2}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 2}.[/red]

{3381,181202}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 3}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 3}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 3}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 3}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 3}.[/red]

{3381,181203}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 4}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 4}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 4}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 4}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 4}.[/red]

{3381,181204}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 5}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 5}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 5}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 5}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 5}.[/red]

{3381,181205}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 6}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 6}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 6}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 6}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 6}.[/red]

{3381,181206}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 7}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 7}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 7}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 7}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 7}.[/red]

{3381,181207}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 8}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 8}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 8}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 8}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 8}.[/red]

{3381,181208}\n\n[yellow]{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Passenger 9}[/yellow] needs collecting from [green]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 9}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} CollectPoint 9}[/green] and taking to [red]{object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 9}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} DeliverPoint 9}.[/red]

page.title: L2 Tour Of A Lifetime
page.t: (Blank, used to create dummy objective entry)

I have a group of {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} PassengerTotal} passengers booked on 'The Tour Of A Lifetime', unfortunately our usual pilot can't make it, so I'm looking for someone with a Passenger Transport to help. The job will involve visiting {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} StationCount} main sectors, where you may be required to dock at a station so the group can have a look around - just make sure they're all on board before departing.\nA bonus will be paid for each additional sector visited during the tour.

I have a group of {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} PassengerTotal} passengers booked on an 'Xtreme Tour Of A Lifetime', but for some unknown reason our usual pilot is unavailable. I'm looking for someone with a Passenger Transport to help. The job will involve visiting all eleven Xenon sectors.
to a minimum of {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} StationCount} sectors.
\053 {value.formatted@L2M182 Offer.BonusCr} Cr. Bonus for each additional sector visited.

You were supposed to have finished the tour by now! This mission is cancelled, just let any members of the tour group off at the next station you dock at and I'll find some one more reliable to do the job..
Warning:\nMembers of the Tour Group are still on the station.
All members of the Tour Group are back on board.
Good work Pilot, you seem to have managed to completed the tour safely. Your payment of {value.formatted@L2M182.TotalPay} is being transferred now.

Good work Pilot, you seem to have managed to completed the tour safely.\nYour flight data indicates you managed only a single additional sector on the tour. A bonus of {value.formatted@L2M182.BonusPay} has been added to the agreed {value.formatted@L2M182 Offer.RewardCr}, making your total payment {value.formatted@L2M182.TotalPay} which is being transferred now.

Excellent work Pilot, you seem to have taken the group on a memorable tour.\nYour flight data indicates you took in an additional {value@L2M182 Offer.1 L0M82 Bonus Sectors} sectors on the tour. A bonus of {value.formatted@L2M182.BonusPay} has been added to the agreed {value.formatted@L2M182 Offer.RewardCr}, making a total payment of {value.formatted@L2M182.TotalPay} Credits, which is being transferred now.
This Mission is cancelled. If you still have passengers on one or more of your ships, please have them dropped off at a station where we can arrange for a reliable pilot to collect them.
Good work Pilot, you seem to have managed to deliver the passengers safely. Transferring your payment now.

Call yourself a professional!! Killing your passengers or selling them into slavery is not a good idea. This mission is cancelled, and I'd appreciate it if you could drop any remaining passengers off at a station... Preferably alive.

What are you playing at Pilot!! I know some of the passengers can be a little obnoxious at times, but shoving them out the airlock is not the answer... This mission is cancelled. If you have any passengers left on board could you drop them at a station and spare them the indignity of a spacewalk...
You are going to have to clear some space if you're going to get the Tour Group on board. You'll need at least {value@L0M82.SpaceNeeded} units of free space to fit everyone in.
You're going to have to make some space for us all to get back on board. If you could clear {value@L0M82.MoreSpaceNeeded} units, I think we should all fit in.

page.title: L2 Dual Convoy
page.t: I have recently lost several convoys to attacks from the {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}}. I have two convoys due to depart shortly.\nI need someone to provide protection for these two convoys.
{lookup.race.name@{value@L0M83.EnemyRace}} Spotted heading for {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M83 Convoy {value@L0M83 Enemies.AttackNo} Leader}.

Two Convoys, {value@L2M183 Offer.1 L0M83 Convoy Total} Ships, and you only managed to get one safely to its destination. I've a good mind not to pay you anything, but I suppose I ought to, here's [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M183.FinalReward}[/yellow] credits for the one you managed to keep safe.

Excellent work pilot, all {value@L2M183 Offer.1 L0M83 Convoy Total} Ships made it safely to their destinations. As promised I'm transferring [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M183.FinalReward}[/yellow] credits to your account.

Half the ships made it to their destinations. By my reckoning half the ships is half the job done, which means half the pay, transferring [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M183.FinalReward}[/yellow] credits to your account now.

Over half the ships made it to their destinations, I suppose the odd ship lost is to be expected. Here's [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M183.FinalReward}[/yellow] credits for the {value@L2M183 Offer.1 L0M83 DockedCount} Ships you got safely to their destination.

Less than half the ships made it to their destinations! I thought you said you could handle the job. Here's [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M183.FinalReward}[/yellow] credits for the {value@L2M183 Offer.1 L0M83 DockedCount} Ships you got safely to their destination.

You managed to get {value@L2M183 Offer.1 L0M83 DockedCount} out of a total of {value@L2M183 Offer.1 L0M83 Convoy Total} Ships safely to their destination. I'm only paying for those that made it, here's [yellow]{value.formatted@L2M183.FinalReward}[/yellow] credits.
Both Convoys have been destroyed!! Call yourself a combat pilot? Get out of here, this mission is over.
What are you playing at Pilot!! I have enough trouble with the {lookup.race.name@{value@L2M183.EnemyRace}} attacking my convoys without you helping them out. This job is cancelled.
Going get a little tough did it? Well thanks for nothing.

page.title: Generic player replies
page.t: I need someone to repair a station.
Can you repair a station for me?
Can you help with station repairs?
You'll have to hurry up, the tour is waiting to depart.
